11010101.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11010101.Text: It's not the first time I've been locked up in a place of this sort... Come on, show me how you're going to torture me this time! What kind of crime did those maggots assign to me again?

11010102.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11010102.Text: The price has been paid. This is the power I deserve.

11010103.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11010103.Text: It's time. I must fulfill my promise.

11010105.Title: Win Battles
11010105.Text: Enemy targets cleared. Operation still on. Stay on your guard.

11010106.Title: Lose Battles
11010106.Text: Haha... In the end, I've been able to protect nothing and no one...

11010107.Title: Ultimate Skill
11010107.Text: Don't dream of getting past me!

11010109.Title: Greeting
11010109.Text: Corruptors, thugs and conspirators are still rampaging through the city... You should act now.

11010110.Title: Conversation 1
11010110.Text: Maggots have infested this city, pulling strings to manipulate everyone. I want them dead.

11010111.Title: Conversation 2
11010111.Text: Never underestimate the darkness lurking beneath this city. That's a lesson that's cost me everything.

11010112.Title: Conversation 3
11010112.Text: I should have died on the streets like other Syndicans, but Abel took me from that place. Looking back now, it might have been a mistake...

11010113.Title: Special Conversation 1
11010113.Text: It's been eight years, and nothing has changed in the DisCity. Abel, together with his dream, has completely disappeared from people's memories. Sometimes I wonder, what do they actually remember?

11010114.Title: Special Conversation 2
11010114.Text: Murdering your own... father, your long-time subordinates, burying everything you cherish... You want to know what that feels like? Haha, you won't like it.

11010115.Title: Special Conversation 3
11010115.Text: Fighting alongside you might be the only sensible choice I've made my whole life.

11010116.Title: Full Compliance
11010116.Text: Those whom I could call friends are all gone now. Try to... stay alive a bit longer. Don't die in front of me.

11010117.Title: Idle
11010117.Text: Abel, Vera... I won't let you down... not again...

11010118.Title: Annoyed
11010118.Text: Tungsten carbide armors are indeed very useful. If you like it, you should get one for yourself too.

11010119.Title: Special Attention
11010119.Text: Are you monitoring me? Or... do you need someone to protect your safety?

11010120.Title: Dispatch
11010120.Text: Mission received. Drawing up an operation plan now.

11010126.Title: Join Team
11010126.Text: I won't let them lay a hand on you.

11010133.Title: Upgrade Skill
11010133.Text: The price has been paid. This is the power I deserve.

110101100.Title: Attire Obtained
110101100.Text: How much longer do we still need to stay here? "We need to wait for a reply?" Sigh, alright... in case of an emergency, you can order me to do anything.

110101101.Title: Level Up
110101101.Text: I don't need to stand out.

110101102.Title: Greeting
110101102.Text: Time to act. It's easy to lose yourself in this kind of fun. I don't want you to get addicted.

110101103.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
110101103.Text: The dirtiest places hold the most precious intelligence. I agree with you on this point. But... I still need some time to get used to these blinding neon lights.

110101104.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
110101104.Text: Fight side by side? In such a tiny space, it's best that I handle anything that might happen.

110101105.Title: Idle
110101105.Text: ...Stay away, I'm waiting for my... companion to come back.

110101106.Title: Annoyed
110101106.Text: ...We're still on a mission. No time for these distractions.

110101107.Title: Special Attention
110101107.Text: I'll keep you safe and sound so you can complete the mission. I hope you muster enough courage and don't waste too much time.

11010201.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11010201.Text: I knew it! No one can say no to OwO the lion dancer! Even folks from the Bureau came to see me. What's so great about DisCity? There's nothing special about it.

11010203.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11010203.Text: OwO will never forget your support! ...I won't forget it... for at least this month!

11010204.Title: Level Start
11010204.Text: Hey DisCity chump, it's your lucky day! Most people don't get the chance to be OwO's lion tail.

11010205.Title: Win Battles
11010205.Text: Haha! That's what you get for looking down upon the invincible lion dancing queen! Run with your tail between your legs!

11010206.Title: Lose Battles
11010206.Text: Damn it! Just you wait! I'll be back! OwO will be back!

11010207.Title: Ultimate Skill
11010207.Text: Behold, the grand entrance of the mighty lion queen!

11010208.Title: Die in Battles
11010208.Text: OwO is strong... It's their fault... Sob... They cheated...

11010209.Title: Greeting
11010209.Text: Save your breath, you DisCity simpleton. The gap between you and this genius lion dancer can never be bridged!

11010210.Title: Conversation 1
11010210.Text: ♪In the ancient outlands, there is a little lion, and she is known as OwO.

11010211.Title: Conversation 2
11010211.Text: Who said lion dancing is out of fashion? Who said lion dancing is outdated? Who?! Sob... Tell those bastards to show themselves! Sob... I... I'll bite them!

11010212.Title: Conversation 3
11010212.Text: In the world of kung-fu, speed defines the winner... Oh, those are movie lines. No one's stupid enough to mistake them for lion dancing tips, right? Hahaha! Idiot!

11010213.Title: Special Conversation 1
11010213.Text: Hey, you! Didn't you forget something? Think harder! Did you remember? Sob... You forgot to praise OwO's big film today!

11010214.Title: Special Conversation 2
11010214.Text: Your skeletal frame is quite unique. Want to become the eighteenth-generation heir to lion dancing? ...Wait, is it eighteenth or nineteenth... What generation am I again? ...One, two, three...

11010215.Title: Special Conversation 3
11010215.Text: There's a saying where I come from: "The awakened lion rousts, and brings in the God of Wealth!" I'll make sure to put on a rowdy show for you!

11010216.Title: Full Compliance
11010216.Text: Lion dancing is hard work! It takes years to hone, and injuries are common! You really want to learn? Seriously? No takebacks? ...OwO has an apprentice! OwO has an apprentice! OwO has an apprentice!!!

11010217.Title: Idle
11010217.Text: Time to get up!!! No way! You really got scared? Hahahaha! People from DisCity are so funny!

11010218.Title: Annoyed
11010218.Text: I-I-I'm warning you! Those who disrespect lions won't be protected! I won't lift a finger when the monster comes to e-e-eat you! D-don't come over here!

11010219.Title: Special Attention
11010219.Text: Feast your eyes upon the performance of the world's most amazing, majestic, and invincible little genius OwO! Don't blink!

11010220.Title: Dispatch
11010220.Text: When it comes to fun, how can DisCity compare to my hometown? If you weren't so understaffed, I wouldn't go out at all!

11010221.Title: Dispatch Complete
11010221.Text: You're not allowed to take these away! I worked so hard to rob these!

11010224.Title: Pat Head
11010224.Text: Doesn't this lion's head look beautiful? Isn't it grand? Isn't it majestic? Don't you want to touch it? Haha... In your dreams!

11010226.Title: N/A
11010226.Text: Haha, tremble before me, you fiends! The queen of lion dancing is here!

11010227.Title: N/A
11010227.Text: Haha, tremble before me, you fiends! The queen of lion dancing is here!

11010228.Title: N/A
11010228.Text: Haha, tremble before me, you fiends! The queen of lion dancing is here!

11010229.Title: N/A
11010229.Text: Haha, tremble before me, you fiends! The queen of lion dancing is here!

11010230.Title: N/A
11010230.Text: Haha, tremble before me, you fiends! The queen of lion dancing is here!

11010231.Title: N/A
11010231.Text: Haha, tremble before me, you fiends! The queen of lion dancing is here!

11010232.Title: N/A
11010232.Text: Haha, tremble before me, you fiends! The queen of lion dancing is here!

11010301.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11010301.Text: Hmph. As an anti-Mania combatant, I will regard this series of actions targeting me as a simple "work transfer." I will follow your arrangements. But if your orders conflicts with the will of that person, please forgive me in advance, Chief.

11010302.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11010302.Text: One day, even the tiniest currents will merge into a surging tide.

11010303.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11010303.Text: The shadows have vanished, and the sun is blazing bright... It's time.

11010304.Title: Level Start
11010304.Text: Don't be afraid. I won't let anyone hurt you.

11010305.Title: Win Battles
11010305.Text: We can't linger. It's not safe here.

11010306.Title: Lose Battles
11010306.Text: ...Don't mind me! Take her away! Quick!

11010308.Title: Die in Battles
11010308.Text: I'm on a mission... I have to protect... I can't...

11010309.Title: Greeting
11010309.Text: Why are you looking at me this way? Are you... expecting some kind of response? Um... all right, hello.

11010310.Title: Greeting
11010310.Text: Why are you looking at me this way? Are you... expecting some kind of response? Um... all right, hello.

11010311.Title: Conversation 1
11010311.Text: For me, loyalty is the golden rule that cannot be broken. No matter what happens, my loyalty will not waver.

11010312.Title: Conversation 1
11010312.Text: For me, loyalty is the golden rule that cannot be broken. No matter what happens, my loyalty will not waver.

11010313.Title: Conversation 2
11010313.Text: If I could reach my goal only at the cost of my life, what more could I ask for?

11010314.Title: Conversation 2
11010314.Text: If I could reach my goal only at the cost of my life, what more could I ask for?

11010315.Title: Conversation 3
11010315.Text: Rest? That's a luxury I don't deserve... (Sigh) All right, if you really need someone to talk to, I'll give it a shot.

11010316.Title: Conversation 3
11010316.Text: Rest? That's a luxury I don't deserve... (Sigh) All right, if you really need someone to talk to, I'll give it a shot.

11010317.Title: Special Conversation 1
11010317.Text: I sought this power, and I will never regret my choice. If only I had done it sooner... At least I wouldn't have to end up as the failure I am now.

11010318.Title: Special Conversation 1
11010318.Text: I sought this power, and I will never regret my choice. If only I had done it sooner... At least I wouldn't have to end up as the failure I am now.

11010319.Title: Special Conversation 2
11010319.Text: The one who taught me "loyalty" was also the first person I pledged my loyalty to... Strange, who was it? I... I can't remember...

11010320.Title: Special Conversation 2
11010320.Text: The one who taught me "loyalty" was also the first person I pledged my loyalty to... Strange, who was it? I... I can't remember...

11010321.Title: Special Conversation 3
11010321.Text: Mania contamination and descent into madness... That's my method for reaching my goal, and also the price I choose to pay. Perhaps one day, I'll lose control. When the time comes, do what you must do for your own safety. Don't hesitate.

11010322.Title: Special Conversation 3
11010322.Text: Mania contamination and descent into madness... That's my method for reaching my goal, and also the price I choose to pay. Perhaps one day, I'll lose control. When the time comes, do what you must do for your own safety. Don't hesitate.

11010323.Title: Full Compliance
11010323.Text: Not long ago, I saw only darkness before my eyes. But what you've done for me... it's as if a ray of light has shone into this boundless darkness. Even if this hope is illusory... I will protect you... with all I've got.

11010324.Title: Idle
11010324.Text: ...Don't mind me... It'll all be over soon...

11010325.Title: Idle
11010325.Text: ...Don't mind me... It'll all be over soon...

11010326.Title: Annoyed
11010326.Text: You're the Chief of the MBCC, yet you're doing such things... Have you no shame?

11010327.Title: Annoyed
11010327.Text: You're the Chief of the MBCC, yet you're doing such things... Have you no shame?

11010328.Title: Special Attention
11010328.Text: You don't have to keep an eye on me yourself. These shackles aren't something I can get rid of easily. You just want to spend some time with me? Oh... all right.

11010329.Title: Special Attention
11010329.Text: You don't have to keep an eye on me yourself. These shackles aren't something I can get rid of easily. You just want to spend some time with me? Oh... all right.

11010332.Title: Dispatch Complete
11010332.Text: Mission accomplished. I await your further instruction.

11010333.Title: Dispatch Complete
11010333.Text: Mission accomplished. I await your further instruction.

11010334.Title: Level Up
11010334.Text: Good, keep 'em coming. I need them.

11010335.Title: Level Up
11010335.Text: Good, keep 'em coming. I need them.

11010336.Title: Pat Head
11010336.Text: Hmm? You like my... hair? Thank you.

11010337.Title: Join Team
11010337.Text: I can eradicate any threats, if that's what it takes to guarantee your safety.

11010344.Title: Upgrade Skill
11010344.Text: Some day, the tiny currents will merge into a surging tide.

110103100.Title: Attire Obtained
110103100.Text: Arrived at the standby location, awaiting further instructions. Yes, the sun is dazzling and the temperature has risen, which favors the target to change clothes and evade search. We must pay more attention.

110103101.Title: Level Up
110103101.Text: These steps are nothing. Keep going up.

110103102.Title: Greeting
110103102.Text: In order to look more natural and blend into the environment well, we really should engage in some small talk now. In reference to the two office ladies over there, we might talk about our intolerant superiors.

110103103.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
110103103.Text: For me, duties don't change based on dress or role. Regardless of what I wear, I am your escort and will remove all obstacles for your safety. There's nothing uncomfortable about that.

110103104.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
110103104.Text: I've spotted several suspicious figures gathering in the distance, and they seem to be keeping a close eye on our movements... It is difficult to tell if they are armed at this distance. For your safety, we should relocate. Hmm? Just want my contact info? If you run into trouble, it's better to call the sheriff, not me.

110103105.Title: Idle
110103105.Text: Stop. Sit. Up. Passable level of training, but slightly externally inhibited... Hopefully they will remain steady in critical moments and not be distracted by other factors.

110103106.Title: Annoyed
110103106.Text: Touching in this manner is likely to be judged as aggressive behavior by a trained canine. I do not recommend that you continue.

110103107.Title: Special Attention
110103107.Text: Are you gonna stare at me like that until our backup is in position? Stick to your character? Okay... let me know if you need me to respond.

11010401.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11010401.Text: A discrepancy in the mechanical operation... Did you cause it... What changes will you bring to the future?

11010402.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11010402.Text: Debugging completed... I can go even further now...

11010403.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11010403.Text: The end of change... is eternity...

11010405.Title: Victory
11010405.Text: I create the machines to assist you. Go, I'll always be here.

11010406.Title: Lose Battles
11010406.Text: It's just one failed attempt. Take everyone back. I'll repair all the damaged parts.

11010408.Title: Die in Battles
11010408.Text: Everything will eventually come to a standstill at somepoint...

11010409.Title: Greeting
11010409.Text: You seem a bit different... Discrepancies arise over time. How long has it been... since we last met?

11010410.Title: Conversation 1
11010410.Text: Behavior... must be guided by rules... A broken machine... will only lead one into eternal deviation... I'll fix it for you...

11010411.Title: Conversation 2
11010411.Text: Don't change... Don't deny it... Stay accurate... Stay... stable... I won't break... My existence will reach the final border...

11010412.Title: Conversation 3
11010412.Text: From springs and cogs... to bearings and internal combustion engines... to circuits and semiconductors... Humans today, technology a century later from my time... What will it look like...

11010413.Title: Special Conversation 1
11010413.Text: In DisSea, all laws are distorted... Time, space, and even memory... are no longer trustworthy... Perhaps what I'm obsessed with is something that can be relied upon in this torrent.

11010414.Title: Special Conversation 2
11010414.Text: Time won't twist a person's mind... Despair will... Remember your purpose. Remember the earliest promise. This way... even if you're caught up by despair... it can't devour you...

11010415.Title: Special Conversation 3
11010415.Text: So this is what the world outside DisSea looks like now... I thought... the scenery there, the never-ending disaster, and my watchtower... would never change... until eternity...

11010416.Title: Full Compliance
11010416.Text: I didn't understand the meaning of our encounter before... But now, I do... It's like eternal gears being worn down, errant currents returning to their source... Your arrival signaled... the everlasting first second has passed.

11010417.Title: Idle
11010417.Text: Time's passing... at the normal rate... I'm not used to it yet...

11010418.Title: Annoyed
11010418.Text: Why repeat such movements? Your limbs are probably malfunctioning... Let me inspect and repair them for you now...

11010419.Title: Special Attention
11010419.Text: When my companions feel lost, they often come to me... I guess people are always seeking unchanging things as anchors in turmoil... Are you the same? Are you... feeling uneasy?

11010421.Title: Dispatch Complete
11010421.Text: No deviation in the return path... I'm home.

11010424.Title: Pat Head
11010424.Text: There's no switch here. You can't turn me off...

11010433.Title: Upgrade Skill
11010433.Text: Debugging completed... I can go even further now...

11010501.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11010501.Text: Hello, I'm the security expert from Nirvana Cybersecurity Center. I've received a request for a fix. Can you show me where the technical department is... Huh? Why am I being handcuffed?

11010502.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11010502.Text: The system is upgraded and your firewall is more reliable now.

11010503.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11010503.Text: Oops, the task of system upgrading is really tiring, I accidentally fell asleep. Chief, you didn't sneak a peek at anything, did you?

11010505.Title: Victory
11010505.Text: The attack is over. The source has been identified and eliminated. Chief, we did it!

11010506.Title: Lose Battles
11010506.Text: I'll intercept the pursuit. Chief, retreat without fear and be careful not to fall.

11010508.Title: Die in Battles
11010508.Text: It's okay, I... have no regrets.

11010509.Title: Greeting
11010509.Text: Hehe, I'm not late if I beat my boss to the office, right? Good morning, Chief.

11010510.Title: Conversation 1
11010510.Text: Do you often stay up late working, Chief? Me, too. If you get tired late at night, come take a break in my room. As fellow night owls, we can exchange notes on that.

11010511.Title: Conversation 2
11010511.Text: I didn't expect Chief to be this "popular". You're bugged everywhere. Should I remove them for you? Or we can leave them there and give their owners a little surprise?

11010512.Title: Conversation 3
11010512.Text: "Every three months, the size of DisCity's dark web doubles." Haha, that rule is fake. No one can measure unseeable darkness.

11010513.Title: Special Conversation 1
11010513.Text: I prefer the proactive approach over passive defense. Set the bait, trick and identify the enemy, then fight back and eliminate all threats... Everyone says this doesn't suit my personality, but wouldn't it be nice to finish work early and get some sleep?

11010514.Title: Special Conversation 2
11010514.Text: The true nature of digitalized Mania is information and cognitive contamination. It can't be blocked physically and can spread beyond material barriers. So, beware of what you might see on DisMyth, Chief.

11010515.Title: Special Conversation 3
11010515.Text: I'm kind of fond of little mice. They're tiny and cute, and they have kept me company through many dark nights... Wait, I'm not talking about my place! It's not that messy, really! No! I forbid you from going there, Chief!

11010516.Title: Full Compliance
11010516.Text: If the world were a gigantic program, it would have its own bugs too. Fate could be hacked and modified. Maybe it would allow me to meet you sooner and rewrite the ending... Hehe, I'm babbling nonsense again. Forget it, Chief. Let's just cherish the present...

11010518.Title: Annoyed
11010518.Text: Hehe! The little kitty of the old lady next door likes to knead me here too. Do you both like the soft touch? Well, don't stop then.

11010519.Title: Special Attention
11010519.Text: Do you want to watch me work? Then, if I doze off, be sure to wake me up.

11010520.Title: Dispatch
11010520.Text: Field assignment? That will take some extra time.

11010521.Title: Dispatch Complete
11010521.Text: Ahaha, I got lost after all. It feels so good to be home.

11010524.Title: Pat Head
11010524.Text: Ah....? No... I wasn't dozing off.

11010525.Title: On battlefield
11010525.Text: Firewall debugging completed. You're under protection now.

11010532.Title: Upgrade Skill
11010532.Text: The system is upgraded and your firewall is more reliable now.

11020101.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11020101.Text: Sending out so many cops just to catch a Syndican gangster. Your subordinates are honestly... beyond useless.

11020102.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11020102.Text: It's not enough to simply possess power. You must also put it to good use.

11020103.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11020103.Text: What do they say, that these are humanity's limits? What a joke. Humans will never stop pushing beyond their limits.

11020104.Title: Level Start
11020104.Text: I've been waiting for so long.

11020105.Title: Win Battles
11020105.Text: You messed with the wrong person.

11020106.Title: Lose Battles
11020106.Text: This is not the end. Don't give in!

11020108.Title: Die in Battles
11020108.Text: I can't... go down like this...

11020109.Title: Greeting
11020109.Text: Hey, looks like you're free. How about taking a trip to the Syndicate with me? Quite a few people are eager to meet you.

11020110.Title: Conversation 1
11020110.Text: Your boss keeps switching my guards. Are they really so scared? Scared of an imprisoned Sinner, or a mediocre Syndican gangster?

11020111.Title: Conversation 2
11020111.Text: My subordinates are not just obsessed with muscles, they adore the brainy type too. Hmm... You seem qualified. Quit working for the government and join the Legion!

11020112.Title: Conversation 3
11020112.Text: Guns? We don't rely on them in fights. A warrior trusts only their fists and their will. What's more, Syndicate's guns have long been tainted.

11020113.Title: Special Conversation 1
11020113.Text: Only violence can end violence. That's the only answer Syndicate has given us. Those who once had dreams have all died for nothing.

11020114.Title: Special Conversation 2
11020114.Text: Those abandoned factories are remnants of the city's golden era. That's the glory Syndicans must reclaim.

11020115.Title: Special Conversation 3
11020115.Text: "No matter who they've lost, the Legion's commander must remain calm." But if something happened to you, I can't imagine what I would do...

11020116.Title: Full Compliance
11020116.Text: When we first met, you were just a rookie I could easily lift with a single arm. It surprises me... how you haven't changed a bit. But you're also the strongest person I've ever met. I'll keep counting on you in the future, Chief.

11020117.Title: Idle
11020117.Text: It does look like there are a few people here... I can have a bout with.

11020119.Title: Special Attention
11020119.Text: Are you going to just watch? Why don't we have a bout instead? I'll stand there without moving, and I won't even use my hands.

11020120.Title: Dispatch
11020120.Text: A piece of cake. My guys in the Legion will get it done in no time.

11020121.Title: Dispatch Complete
11020121.Text: See? Told you it was easy.

11020133.Title: Upgrade Skill
11020133.Text: It's not enough to simply possess power. You must also put it to good use.

110201100.Title: Attire Obtained
110201100.Text: Tell those gangs that the Legion is here—to declare war on all of you!

110201101.Title: Level Up
110201101.Text: Humph. I look forward to the battle.

110201102.Title: Greeting
110201102.Text: Ha, you're late. Keep up. Didn't you say you want to witness the reformation of Syndicate? Stay with me at all times then.

110201103.Title: Pat Head
110201103.Text: I feel like you've... got a lot more guts lately.

110201104.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
110201104.Text: Who will be our first opponent? Ted? Yagyu? Why don't they all come at once? It will be the same.

110201105.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
110201105.Text: I'll leave the planning to Earl. I just need to open the way ahead—which is what he needs most.

110201106.Title: Ordinary Contact 3
110201106.Text: Rust, smoke, and endless violence. Syndicate never changes. I'm sick of it... Go. Destroy everything. It's time for a change.

110201107.Title: Ordinary Contact 4
110201107.Text: The Legion doesn't need a stronghold. The whole of Syndicate is the territory of the wolves.

110201108.Title: Idle
110201108.Text: We have more enemies than this, but as long as those guys in the gutter dare to show up...

110201109.Title: Special Attention
110201109.Text: Oh? Have you finally decided to join the Legion?

110201110.Title: Attire Obtained
110201110.Text: As you can see, the negotiation was a huge success.

110201111.Title: Level Up
110201111.Text: Your words carry weight only when you have the power.

110201112.Title: Greeting
110201112.Text: You came. Unfortunately, the negotiation has ended prematurely. This place looks quite impressive, doesn't it? As good a place for conversation as any.

110201113.Title: Pat Head
110201113.Text: Your bravery never ceases to amaze.

110201114.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
110201114.Text: Hehe, to tame a beast, you must become more ferocious and savage than them.

110201115.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
110201115.Text: The future of Syndicate? Sigh, I don't have the answer to that yet, but I will find it, in my own way.

110201116.Title: Ordinary Contact 3
110201116.Text: Do you envy them? I can tell that you do by the look in your eyes.

110201117.Title: Ordinary Contact 4
110201117.Text: The fire of violence has died, but the embers remain in our heart, smoldering in every dark corner and waiting to be reignited.

110201118.Title: Idle
110201118.Text: You did a great job guarding this place. Good doggy.

110201119.Title: Special Attention
110201119.Text: This outfit is not bad for a negotiation meeting, but I'm not going to move as freely in this if things get physical... Sigh...Well, it's a nice gift from you guys, after all.

11020201.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11020201.Text: I can see... the pain and madness consuming you...

11020202.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11020202.Text: The stronger a Sinner... the closer they are to destruction...

11020203.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11020203.Text: The abyss is no longer my prison.

11020204.Title: Level Start
11020204.Text: I hear the call of the abyss...

11020205.Title: Win Battles
11020205.Text: They will suffer no longer... That is good.

11020206.Title: Lose Battles
11020206.Text: No, they're not yet at peace...

11020209.Title: Greeting
11020209.Text: That was close. I was almost devoured by those voices again. Luckily... you came.

11020210.Title: Conversation 1
11020210.Text: The blood that stained this sword... I will never forget it.

11020211.Title: Conversation 2
11020211.Text: The Grim Reaper—Sinners call me that. I... like that name.

11020212.Title: Conversation 3
11020212.Text: This body once had a soul. Her memories and her name have been devoured by the abyss. I'm not her... I'm just the remains of her.

11020213.Title: Special Conversation 1
11020213.Text: Having a body like this... has its merits too. If I hadn't been infected, I wouldn't even have been able to walk normally.

11020214.Title: Special Conversation 2
11020214.Text: I still remember the sun rising in the east, sunlight shining in through the window, onto me. That was the moment I looked forward to the most. When... did this memory happen?

11020215.Title: Special Conversation 3
11020215.Text: For me, as long as you're here, death... is no longer the only answer.

11020216.Title: Full Compliance
11020216.Text: You make me aware of many... unfamiliar emotions. I look forward to your visit, I want to hear you talk, I want to see your smile. Is this a part of my forgotten past too? I want to... stay by your side.

11020217.Title: Idle
11020217.Text: Yes, I hear it... Are you in pain? Don't worry... Soon you'll be freed from it.

11020218.Title: Annoyed
11020218.Text: That's useless. Since long ago, my body... hasn't been able to feel anything.

11020219.Title: Special Attention
11020219.Text: Why are you willing to stay with... a monster like me?

11020220.Title: Dispatch
11020220.Text: I'm willing to roam the world for you.

11020221.Title: Dispatch Complete
11020221.Text: Does this result satisfy your expectations?

11020224.Title: Pat Head
11020224.Text: Don't do that, it's... dangerous for you.

11020233.Title: Upgrade Skill
11020233.Text: The stronger a Sinner... the closer they are to destruction...

110202100.Title: Attire Obtained
110202100.Text: Sunshine, chapel, and red flowers... make one so nostalgic... Strange. What is nostalgic?

110202101.Title: Level Up
110202101.Text: Thank you, even though I have never prayed for strength.

110202102.Title: Greeting
110202102.Text: Prayers have been answered... You are back.

110202103.Title: Pat Head
110202103.Text: Thank you for making me feel warm.

110202104.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
110202104.Text: I know praying can't bring me peace, but I had no other choice. Thankfully, you are here now.

110202105.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
110202105.Text: When I walked in the DisSea, there wasn't a second I did not pray to see the light of day. This chase gave me the strength to persevere.

110202106.Title: Ordinary Contact 3
110202106.Text: I still remember that chapel near the DisSea where I could see sunlight. I loved it there... But I never found that place again after I left...

110202107.Title: Ordinary Contact 4
110202107.Text: Do you prefer this look? I can stay like this forever if that's what you want...

110202108.Title: Idle
110202108.Text: Please bring peace for them... for us...

110202109.Title: Special Attention
110202109.Text: Did you look for me... because of your unfulfilled wish? Don't worry. I'll pray for you.

110202110.Title: Attire Obtained
110202110.Text: I am NOX, the hunter of demons, the last of the Black Swords. Chosen one, tell me, do you too seek a final battle to seize that elusive dawn for humanity... If so, use me as your weapon!

110202111.Title: Level Up
110202111.Text: This is a necessary power... and a necessary sacrifice.

110202112.Title: Greeting
110202112.Text: Let's set off. The sun has already risen. We're running out of time.

110202113.Title: Pat Head
110202113.Text: Rest assured, I will not leave your side.

110202114.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
110202114.Text: Born to be a special combat weapon, the Black Swords are pariahs mixed with demon blood. No matter which side prevails, there will be no place for us in this world.

110202115.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
110202115.Text: Demons... are man-eating monsters that emerge from an unnamed darkness. Some of them may retain a human appearance, but don't be fooled. Demons have no emotions and are only driven by insatiable hunger. Once you face them, you have no other choice but to fight.

110202116.Title: Ordinary Contact 3
110202116.Text: Angel of Death... is that what they call me? What a shame. I'm no bloodless, tearless angel... With no wings, I can only crawl on the ground, yet I still yearn to look up at the sky.

110202117.Title: Ordinary Contact 4
110202117.Text: The sunrise by the lake, the peaceful village... Those are the only memories I've kept since I became a Black Sword. The arrival of the demons tore everything apart, including my past...

110202118.Title: Idle
110202118.Text: The demon blood will eventually devour my sanity. Such is the fate of every Black Sword... When that day comes, please grant me peace... I don't want to destroy everything I've protected.

110202119.Title: Special Attention
110202119.Text: Prayers don't bring miracles, nor can they elicit mercy out of demons... Only fighting can grant us the right to live... Chosen one, I will be the sharp blade in your hands and I shall bring the last hope to you and all who struggle to survive!

11020301.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11020301.Text: Huh... Where are you taking me? Oh, food and lodging are included? Great! What's my room number?

11020302.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11020302.Text: Hmm? You want to watch a film I made?

11020303.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11020303.Text: I will make everyone see me and respect me.

11020306.Title: Lose Battles
11020306.Text: Haha... I knew I'd ruin everything.

11020307.Title: Ultimate Skill
11020307.Text: A good show is about to start!

11020308.Title: Die in Battles
11020308.Text: In the end, I couldn't leave anything behind...

11020309.Title: Greeting
11020309.Text: You're here, Chief? Are there any new movies on the rec room projector?

11020310.Title: Greeting
11020310.Text: Oh, you're here? Good timing. I found a movie that we can watch together.

11020311.Title: Conversation 1
11020311.Text: What's the sign of a successful film? Haha... The box in the office, of course...

11020312.Title: Conversation 2
11020312.Text: You don't get this film? It's all the rage in Eastside, though...

11020313.Title: Conversation 3
11020313.Text: OwO is a hardworking kid. She'll definitely achieve her dreams.

11020314.Title: Conversation 1
11020314.Text: Don't fret over past mistakes. If you want to improve, keep moving forward.

11020315.Title: Conversation 2
11020315.Text: No one's life is perfect, but I can capture everyone's most perfect moments. Here, show me a smile.

11020316.Title: Conversation 3
11020316.Text: Flexibility is a trait of a mature adult... Of course, flexing too much will cause painful sprains.

11020317.Title: Special Conversation 1
11020317.Text: The Legend of the Minos Hero... This might make a great film.

11020318.Title: Special Conversation 2
11020318.Text: I want to record all those who refuse to accept fate, and immortalize their gazes and cries in film.

11020319.Title: Special Conversation 3
11020319.Text: I may be weak, I may be mediocre, yet at certain moments, I can also be the hero.

11020320.Title: Full Compliance
11020320.Text: Reality is a far cry from the beautiful scenes depicted in movies. Countless shining souls disappear in the blink of an eye, like shooting stars... If only I could catch one of them... What I mean is, to me, you're a shining star, and the focal point of this world. Would you like to be the female lead of my film?

11020321.Title: Idle
11020321.Text: It's nice to slack off and do nothing around here. The Chief will resolve everything anyways.

11020322.Title: Idle
11020322.Text: If you observe with your heart, the material for films will appear before your eyes.

11020323.Title: Annoyed
11020323.Text: Mmm, I'm not angry. Go on, don't stop.

11020324.Title: Annoyed
11020324.Text: Hey, you have to pay first before telling a filmmaker what to do.

11020325.Title: Special Attention
11020325.Text: Whatever you want me to do, just tell me. I'll do whatever you tell me to.

11020326.Title: Special Attention
11020326.Text: I'd rather you focus on my work than on me. Of course, I haven't made any good ones yet, haha...

11020327.Title: Dispatch
11020327.Text: Yes, all right, okay, wait... for... me... to... come... back...

11020328.Title: Dispatch Complete
11020328.Text: That was exhausting... There you go, that's everything I got, no more no less... I'm gonna rest now! Don't come find me again for at least... two days.

11020331.Title: On battlefield
11020331.Text: Uh... Ok, fine. I'll go, I'll go.

11020338.Title: N/A
11020338.Text: Hmm? You want to watch a film I made?

110203100.Title: Attire Obtained
110203100.Text: Look up, slow down, and hold that smile. Don't look at me, look at the camera... It's okay, everyone gets nervous at first. But you, my chosen star, you're destined to get used to this.

110203101.Title: Level Up
110203101.Text: Emm, that's right, keep up the praise! I can take it.

110203102.Title: Greeting
110203102.Text: Oh come on, we're already here. Stop being all fidgety. Or... are you waiting for me to help you out of the car?

110203103.Title: Pat Head
110203103.Text: Hey, we are under the spotlight... Aren't you afraid our picture will end up on the front page of the entertainment section tomorrow? Haha, not that I mind.

110203104.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
110203104.Text: While I was gone, they really hogged the limelight, didn't they? Such a pity, I'm back now. Wait a bit longer, you might get a front-row seat to a spectacular show of these Eastside stars crying.

110203105.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
110203105.Text: Word of advice, don't eat the cake at the afterparty, it's made of fondant. Looks pretty, but tastes awful... How do I know? Well, obviously because I've tried it.

110203106.Title: Ordinary Contact 3
110203106.Text: I thought that I should've already gotten used to this by now, getting one more award won't prove anything... But being back here is... unexpectedly exhilarating. Probably because you're standing here with me.

110203107.Title: Ordinary Contact 4
110203107.Text: Oh no... The zipper on my back seems to be open... It fit perfectly five years ago... Ugh, help me zip it quick. Don't let them see!

110203108.Title: Idle
110203108.Text: If I'd known, I would've just arrived a lot later and let them wait. My face is all stiff from smiling...

110203109.Title: Special Attention
110203109.Text: Did you hear that? The spotlight will keep on shining, and the applause and cheers will never cease... Hmph, come on. Join me and we will become the center of the world's attention.

11020401.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11020401.Text: Indeed, you're not mistaken. It's me, West District's hero, Drifter Camp's savior! Sigh, let's save the rest for later. I'm starving, got any grub?

11020402.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11020402.Text: Is the situation that bleak? You must put even me under special training?

11020403.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11020403.Text: Who'd have thought my old spear would be given a second life... My, I'm getting emotional.

11020404.Title: Level Start
11020404.Text: I'll count to three. Surrender quickly, or I'll get down and beg!

11020405.Title: Victory
11020405.Text: Surprised? You know what they say, don't judge a book by its cover, heh heh.

11020406.Title: Lose Battles
11020406.Text: Something's not right... Time to run!

11020408.Title: Die in Battles
11020408.Text: Am I dying... Haha, it's not like it's the first time...

11020409.Title: Greeting
11020409.Text: Oh, 'sup. Fire away if you're having any problems... Whether I can solve them is another matter.

11020410.Title: Conversation 1
11020410.Text: We should definitely make a trip back on a less busy day. Imagine the faces of the folks at the Drifter Camp when they see me as your lapdog... Haha, it may not be shocking enough though, they're used to it by now.

11020411.Title: Conversation 2
11020411.Text: Remember, West District is a mixed bag. You never know who or what you'll bump into, so don't go picking fights all the time. You know that saying "make friends, not enemies", right? You might just need someone's help one day, you hear me?

11020412.Title: Conversation 3
11020412.Text: Speaking of which, you should be able to smooth things over for me with the Executive Committee, right? You know, what I've done could be considered as muting, and I don't want them to pick on me. If you help me out this time, I'll be forever in your debt... Pretty please!

11020413.Title: Special Conversation 1
11020413.Text: This spear has been with me for a long time. The first time I picked it up, I was just a brash youngster who wanted to look cool. Over a decade has slipped by... How does that saying go? "Things stay the same while people change." I never thought I would pick it up again... Cheer up, old buddy, don't let us down.

11020414.Title: Special Conversation 2
11020414.Text: West District can't forget everything it's been through... But rather than hatred and revenge, what we need and deserve is a future full of hope. The flame rekindles over the rust not to destroy, but to light up the way forward... Wow... How inspiring is that? Come on, praise me.

11020415.Title: Special Conversation 3
11020415.Text: West District is gorgeous from this angle, isn't it? It's the way it should be. I still remember what it used to look like. On the sun-lit streets, when the wind blew through, there was no rusty smell. It was as warm as the sunlight, full of hope... Oh right, there's a night market over there, it's the closest thing to the old West District. When the sun sets and the stalls are up, I'll take you there for a sniff.

11020416.Title: Full Compliance
11020416.Text: Are they calling me "Hero"? Hehe, that's nothing, I've had many titles. "West District's Brightest Star", "Thunder King", "Inner Bay's Heartthrob", "Leader of Rustfire", "Deserter", "Traitor", "Liar", "Loser", most of my titles are still being used, only one has been permanently forgotten... The person who used to call me "Best Pal" is no longer here... Hmm? What are you staring at me for? Huh? What do you want to say? No, no, nonono, I'm not ready for that, don't call me that! Oh my god... Aren't you embarrassed???

11020417.Title: Idle
11020417.Text: Rise and shine, sleeping beauty. Skipping work today?

11020418.Title: Annoyed
11020418.Text: What, you're interested in my muscles? Bah, things have changed now. You need Sinner power to survive out there. Being beefy ain't gonna scare anybody no more.

11020419.Title: Special Attention
11020419.Text: Oh, what brings the Chief of the MBCC here? What can a non-contributing member of society like me do for you?

11020420.Title: Dispatch
11020420.Text: Guarantee you the mission may not be accomplished.

11020421.Title: Dispatch complete
11020421.Text: Job's done. When's the commendation ceremony?

11020424.Title: Pat Head
11020424.Text: Hey hey hey, stop messing with my hair. You've made it look like a bird's nest. I've spent a lot of time perfecting this handsome look, you gonna fix it now?

11020426.Title: Join Team
11020426.Text: So, you need me to show off my skills again? Okay, okay, I'll be serious this time.

11020433.Title: Upgrade Skill
11020433.Text: Is the situation that bleak? You must put even me under special training?

11020501.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11020501.Text: Is it you who summoned me? When the Sun Crow rises, crops scorch, plants wither, and the great famine follows... Mortal, be prepared.

11020502.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11020502.Text: Thank you... even though I can't seem to recall anything.

11020503.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11020503.Text: The flaming feathers of the sunblaze shall shield the rivers for you.

11020504.Title: Level Start
11020504.Text: May there be no suffering beings wherever I go.

11020505.Title: Victory
11020505.Text: Did I also, in the past... incinerate them in the flames?

11020506.Title: Lose Battles
11020506.Text: Worry not... The Sun Crow doesn't feel pain.

11020508.Title: Die in Battles
11020508.Text: This is... the destiny of calamity...

11020509.Title: Greeting
11020509.Text: Is it the herald of sunrise? ...No, it's you calling for me.

11020510.Title: Conversation 1
11020510.Text: Legend has it that I popped out of a crack from the sun... Scary how words get around, I'm clearly a child of Mania... Ah, is it not appropriate to say that?

11020511.Title: Conversation 2
11020511.Text: Hunger, poverty, and slaughter... burn like an endless wildfire... It must be hard for you, to walk alongside calamity.

11020512.Title: Conversation 3
11020512.Text: Thank you for retrieving this body for me, and taking me to see this city untouched by disasters... The past me can finally rest when dusk comes.

11020513.Title: Special Conversation 1
11020513.Text: Slightly plump temple, and a hint of redness in between your brows. These signs... Fear not, it's a good omen.

11020514.Title: Special Conversation 2
11020514.Text: Fear and faith coexist, I had to become a presence to be feared... If I had the chance to go back in time... I would be sure to have a long, heart-to-heart talk with you.

11020515.Title: Special Conversation 3
11020515.Text: I was once worried that I couldn't protect all beings, and I was afraid that the devoured me would bring new disasters... Now everything is fine, fortunately, because of you.

11020516.Title: Full Compliance
11020516.Text: The next time ten suns appear in the sky, please promise me you will hold the bow. An arrow shot by someone of noble character, that's where I belong.

11020517.Title: Idle
11020517.Text: Crimson clouds and scorching heat... I fear a disaster has descended! ...Oh, it's just me.

11020518.Title: Annoyed
11020518.Text: The warmth of a human... If only I could touch you too.

11020519.Title: Special Attention
11020519.Text: It's you? ...It's rare to meet someone who has the courage to gaze directly at the sun.

11020521.Title: Dispatch Complete
11020521.Text: Is this the treasure of this mortal world? I... I'm familiar with it...

11020524.Title: Pat Head
11020524.Text: The glory of the sun cannot be obscured!

11020533.Title: Upgrade Skill
11020533.Text: Thank you... even though I can't seem to recall anything.

11030101.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11030101.Text: Alright, alright, I'll indulge you with a little fun. After all... the way you're trailing after me is just too adorable.

11030102.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11030102.Text: It's only natural that the owner of Whitestone Industries is highly competent.

11030103.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11030103.Text: You've got to show what you're made of once in a while. Am I right, Chief?

11030104.Title: Level Start
11030104.Text: Come grab a drink with me when it's done.

11030105.Title: Win Battles
11030105.Text: The job is done! Shall we sort out the pay?

11030106.Title: Lose Battles
11030106.Text: When there's a will, there's a—which way is the exit?

11030109.Title: Greeting
11030109.Text: MBCC's Whitestone Branch at your service! If you drop by, I'll offer you a special 20% off. Shush... don't let K.K. know.

11030110.Title: Conversation 1
11030110.Text: Time for bed. I've earned it, haven't I? I've been working so hard for you, Chief.

11030111.Title: Conversation 2
11030111.Text: I'm faster than lightning when I want to be. You won't be able to stop me. Hmm, you think I'm bluffing? Try setting me free and see for yourself then.

11030112.Title: Conversation 3
11030112.Text: Whitestone is able to survive in Syndicate till today because I've poured my blood, sweat, and tears into this company. You really can't count on those two kids, for heaven's sake... Why are you looking at me like this? Am I not speaking the truth?

11030113.Title: Special Conversation 1
11030113.Text: I don't have any virtuous faith. I'm happy enough to be able to protect those around me. I don't want to lose anyone ever again.

11030114.Title: Special Conversation 2
11030114.Text: Half of those scan code and save 10 DisCoins on your order ads in the city are posted by me. I've been to every corner of the DisCity, and I know about the things you want to investigate. Wanna hear it? ...Well, pay up!

11030115.Title: Special Conversation 3
11030115.Text: Underground city? Why on earth are you always looking into this sort of thing... Has anyone seen it? If no one has seen it, that means it's fake. Or... no one who's entered it has made it out alive.

11030116.Title: Full Compliance
11030116.Text: I don't like working hard, but I do like hard-working people. People like K.K., Che... and you. Trust me, your hard effort won't go to waste—I won't let that happen.

11030117.Title: Idle
11030117.Text: The meals here are pretty good. I don't need to repay my debts here. Also, the landlord can't just barge in. Nice, nice... It's decided, I'm not leaving!

11030118.Title: Annoyed
11030118.Text: Oh? How unusual. Are you taking the lead today? In that case, let's have some fun...

11030119.Title: Special Attention
11030119.Text: Are you so eager to be close to me? Oh my, such an honest kid.

11030120.Title: Dispatch
11030120.Text: Does this count as a job? You know the drill, I don't work for free.

11030121.Title: Dispatch Complete
11030121.Text: Phew... Should have asked K.K. to settle this for me...

11030123.Title: Level Up
11030123.Text: Whatever you say, whatever you need.

11030124.Title: Pat Head
11030124.Text: Handsy. Fancy going for a ride with me, Chief?

11030126.Title: Join Team
11030126.Text: Oh? Try to keep up with me, you guys.

11030133.Title: Upgrade Skill
11030133.Text: It's only natural that the owner of Whitestone Industries is highly competent.

110301100.Title: Attire Obtained
110301100.Text: So you finally found out. Don't be shocked. Syndicate has quite a few dank rats lurking in the dark. Someone's got to deal with them. It's really no trouble for me.

110301101.Title: Level Up
110301101.Text: The faster the blade, the fewer problems there are.

110301102.Title: Greeting
110301102.Text: You're finally back. I stayed here and didn't go out all this time when you were gone... Oh, you want to know about the stain on my cloak? Che accidentally spilled water on it. Yeah, that must be it.

110301103.Title: Pat Head
110301103.Text: These hair accessories all have their own purposes. Be careful not to cut your hands.

110301104.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
110301104.Text: Errands? What errands would a decent person have this late... I simply enjoy walking around at night. Yup, that's all.

110301105.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
110301105.Text: There is a restaurant nearby. Their braised beef goes well with wine. Let's grab a drink together?

110301106.Title: Ordinary Contact 3
110301106.Text: With how sad steps, O Moon, thou climb'st in the skies... What a beautiful night to sweep away vice.

110301107.Title: Ordinary Contact 4
110301107.Text: If you slash a blade fast enough, an afterimage will linger in its place. Beautiful, isn't it?

110301108.Title: Idle
110301108.Text: Hmm, this familiar stench... Is it coming from over there?

110301109.Title: Special Attention
110301109.Text: Is this meant to... surveil me? Which do you think is faster, the speed of my movement or the blink of your eye?

110301110.Title: Attire Obtained
110301110.Text: Believe me, I've really been to the sea! I chartered a luxury yacht and found a lot of treasures there... (Chuckles) K.K. and Che were there, too! They can vouch for me!

110301111.Title: Level Up
110301111.Text: Hehe, afterwards, I found even more treasures.

110301112.Title: Greeting
110301112.Text: Done resting? Let's head out, then. There are still lots of treasures at the bottom of the sea waiting for us to salvage.

110301113.Title: Pat Head
110301113.Text: When you're alone on a boat with a hot babe like me, your imagination is bound to run wild. It's fine, I forgive you.

110301114.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
110301114.Text: You know, my boat back then was unparalleled. Powerful, luxurious, and decked out with every gadget you can possibly imagine... What's that look? Don't believe that I used to be rich?

110301115.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
110301115.Text: It can get dangerous at times on the sea. There are storms, pirates, and sharks. But fear not. To me, those are just little hiccups on the road to fortune.

110301116.Title: Ordinary Contact 3
110301116.Text: Can I swim? Ha! I can swim like a little mermaid, so fast, so graceful! Anyone sees that should pay me. You'll understand once I get into the water.

110301117.Title: Ordinary Contact 4
110301117.Text: Phew, the sun is scorching. I'm getting all hot and sweaty... Aww, how come you're blushing?

110301118.Title: Idle
110301118.Text: Ah... Take a nap on the deck if you're tired. The sun is so warm, and the sea breeze feels so nice...

110301119.Title: Special Attention
110301119.Text: All right, all hands on deck. We're heading to deeper waters!

11030201.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11030201.Text: Just as glass can't trap a shadow, this can't trap me. Stop wasting your effort, Chief of Minos. You adults only ever make things worse.

11030202.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11030202.Text: No one will find me as long as I don't expose myself to sunlight.

11030203.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11030203.Text: Every inch of shadow in the DisCity belongs to me.

11030204.Title: Level Start
11030204.Text: Kids shouldn't be in this kind of place.

11030205.Title: Win Battles
11030205.Text: You want me to deal with... this?

11030206.Title: Lose Battles
11030206.Text: Haha, I knew it. Nothing will change.

11030209.Title: Greeting
11030209.Text: Chief of Minos, please be aware of the shadow in the room. You almost ran into me.

11030210.Title: Conversation 1
11030210.Text: I have nothing to do with the troubles caused by "the Homeless." I'm not the leader and didn't give any orders. They're just using my name. But... are the naughty kids in Syndicate giving you a headache? Haha. You get what you deserve.

11030211.Title: Conversation 2
11030211.Text: You're a mature adult. What help can a kid give you?

11030212.Title: Conversation 3
11030212.Text: No one wants to be born in Syndicate, where lies and violence always prevail. I have given up. It isn't too much to ask to want to stay away, right?

11030213.Title: Special Conversation 1
11030213.Text: It... isn't too bad here. The bed in the bedroom is much softer than the one in Syndicate.

11030214.Title: Special Conversation 2
11030214.Text: That on the wall is the emblem of "the Homeless." If you wish to join, just draw one yourself... but you're not qualified just from age alone.

11030215.Title: Special Conversation 3
11030215.Text: Can the space for Sinners be expanded somewhat? It's not that I hate cramped spaces. It just... reminds me of bad memories. Or... perhaps... you can keep me company for a bit.

11030216.Title: Full Compliance
11030216.Text: You... are a strange adult. If all the adults in Syndicate were like you, I guess we would suffer a lot less ...Why didn't you come sooner...

11030217.Title: Idle
11030217.Text: Ah—a time to relax, finally. No mission and no one to bother me.

11030218.Title: Annoyed
11030218.Text: ...Do all you adults like doing this?

11030219.Title: Special Attention
11030219.Text: ...When you gaze at the shadows, the shadows are gazing back at you. Your gaze is very intense.

11030220.Title: Dispatch
11030220.Text: Huh? I have to work here?

11030221.Title: Dispatch Complete
11030221.Text: Cough... I knew I wasn't used to moving about under the sun...

11030223.Title: Level Up
11030223.Text: The shadows... are gathering toward me.

11030226.Title: Join Team
11030226.Text: What a pain... If I must be on the field, let's end the battle quickly.

11030228.Title: Received Order
11030228.Text: You better not make a mistake.

11030233.Title: Upgrade Skill
11030233.Text: No one will find me as long as I don't expose myself to sunlight.

110302100.Title: Attire Obtained
110302100.Text: Are you still listening to those corny stories? Take a good look at what our "fairy tales" really look like...

110302101.Title: Level Up
110302101.Text: Shadow, do you smell that rotting, bloody stench... It's time to eat.

110302102.Title: Greeting
110302102.Text: Hey, stay here and don't go out. In the forest... even someone like you will be gobbled up like a little rabbit.

110302103.Title: Pat Head
110302103.Text: Ears, shadows, eyes... Still don't understand? I'm not some red-hooded kid who gets bullied so easily.

110302104.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
110302104.Text: Those bastards use fairy tales to trick kids into being kind. Then they exploit their kindness, hurt them, and finally discard them like trash... I won't be fooled anymore.

110302105.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
110302105.Text: Do you really believe the Big Bad Wolf will spit out meat that's already in his mouth? He will only take bite after bite until the prey is completely eaten.

110302106.Title: Ordinary Contact 3
110302106.Text: You want some "Little Red Riding Hood" cookies too? Sure, but... don't ask what they're made of.

110302107.Title: Ordinary Contact 4
110302107.Text: No one would give up their prey to a little girl in a dress. You'd have to be stronger than they are.

110302108.Title: Idle
110302108.Text: Shush, wait a bit longer, the night is still young... We belong to the depths of darkness.

110302109.Title: Special Attention
110302109.Text: Don't get your hopes up. I won't play house with you.

110302110.Title: Attire Obtained
110302110.Text: This is the witch's market, not a place for you kiddo... Oh, you're lost? Alright, give me your most precious treasure. I'll trade it for a star that will safely get you home.

110302111.Title: Level Up
110302111.Text: Stars... look how they cluster here.

110302112.Title: Greeting
110302112.Text: What are you doing here again? Fine, tell me, what are you going to trade this time to get yourself home? Just so you know, I don't take any wild flowers, no matter how big the bouquet.

110302114.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
110302114.Text: A lollipop, is that really your most precious thing? Put it on the scale. If it balances, you'll get this star... Well, lucky you, it's balanced.

110302115.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
110302115.Text: Don't scamper about in this market. Those tents may look pretty, but if you walk into the wrong one, you'll end up in a heap of trouble.

110302116.Title: Idle
110302116.Text: Whew, finally, all you menaces are back home. Why are so many kiddos wandering in here lately? I'm running out of space for all these lollipops and dolls...

110302117.Title: Annoyed
110302117.Text: Tsk... You're the most annoying curious little brat. This cloak is made from a tiny piece of the starry sky; if you fall in, you'll never get out.

110302118.Title: Special Attention
110302118.Text: You've got your star, why are you still staring at me? Better think about how many more treasures you have left to trade... Remember, next time you come out to play, don't lose your way.

11030301.Title: Sinner Obtained
11030301.Text: Are you trying to take me home? Hehehe... if you treat me as a pet, it won't end well...

11030302.Title: Raised to Phase 1
11030302.Text: Hmm... this reminds me of the ouroboros.

11030303.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11030303.Text: I will... wrap around you tightly...

11030304.Title: Level Start
11030304.Text: I've locked onto my target prey, hiss...

11030305.Title: Battle Won
11030305.Text: Thank you for making me feel that I am still alive.

11030306.Title: Battle Lost
11030306.Text: Haha... pain is a reassuring sensation.

11030307.Title: Ultimate Skill
11030307.Text: This ends here. You will thank me later.

11030309.Title: Greeting
11030309.Text: Ah, a rare guest! You're here to see me again?

11030310.Title: Conversation 1
11030310.Text: I'm neither human nor monster, hmm... I think I might be a venomous snake?

11030311.Title: Conversation 2
11030311.Text: Will I get poisoned if I bite my own tongue...? You're so funny. It's as if snake venom got into your head.

11030312.Title: Conversation 3
11030312.Text: Everyone has the right to laugh. Whoever takes it away will go to hell.

11030313.Title: Special Conversation 1
11030313.Text: I can understand that some people don't like snakes, so you can also understand that I don't like some people, right?

11030314.Title: Special Conversation 2
11030314.Text: Misery is the culprit that destroys laughter, but also heralds the birth of a new world. What do you think?

11030315.Title: Special Conversation 3
11030315.Text: I love the way you smile, and it's even better if it's because of me.

11030316.Title: Compliance full
11030316.Text: Can you give me a hug? Your temperature reminds me of spring, the time of awakening, the season of rebirth... I can hear our hearts beating together.

11030317.Title: Idle
11030317.Text: It's so quiet... it's as if the end of the world is nigh. Looks like I'll be able to get a good night's sleep.

11030318.Title: Annoyed
11030318.Text: Hmm... seems like you want me to take a bite of you?

11030319.Title: Special Attention
11030319.Text: To look for one leaf in an entire forest... to lock onto one monster in an entire herd... you really have a lot of energy.

11030320.Title: Dispatch
11030320.Text: If this can cheer you up...

11030324.Title: Pat Head
11030324.Text: The hero pierced the snake's cranium with his sword, beheading the monstrous serpent. You know where the cranium is? You just touched it.

11030326.Title: N/A
11030326.Text: Today's performance is about to start! Get ready to laugh your head off...

11030333.Title: Skill Up
11030333.Text: Hmm... this reminds me of the ouroboros.

110303100.Title: Attire Obtained
110303100.Text: I had a long dream, a dream of pursuing happiness, a dream of... rebirth.

110303101.Title: Level Up
110303101.Text: Mmm... Just a little bit longer...

110303102.Title: Greeting
110303102.Text: Oh... It's spring already? I'll get up then... Give me two more minutes...

110303104.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
110303104.Text: The sheets are so warm... Chief, if you can join me up here... I'll be very happy...

110303105.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
110303105.Text: I can't miss this festive holiday... But I need some more time to prepare...

110303106.Title: Ordinary Contact 3
110303106.Text: No one can take away my... my blankets... Take away my Chief... Hehe... Snore... Snore...

110303107.Title: Ordinary Contact 4
110303107.Text: Mmm... Time for spring cleaning? But my place is quite tidy already... Or do you want to help me?

110303108.Title: Idle
110303108.Text: Sigh... The fireworks outside... really disturb my dreams...

110303109.Title: Special Attention
110303109.Text: My gosh, I'm almost done dressing! If you keep rushing me... I'll bite you!

11030401.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11030401.Text: Glad to see you again, Chief. Do you want me to trim your hair, or trim away your troubles?

11030402.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11030402.Text: Your recognition is the best reward I could ever ask for.

11030403.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11030403.Text: A thick fog rolls in. The eyes of a lurker lock onto its prey... Shh, don't look back, it's staring right at you...

11030404.Title: Level Start
11030404.Text: Ah... the fog is coming in.

11030405.Title: Win Battles
11030405.Text: All done. Look forward to seeing you again.

11030406.Title: Lose Battles
11030406.Text: Are you not happy with my service?

11030408.Title: Die in Battles
11030408.Text: I can't let it end here...

11030409.Title: Greeting
11030409.Text: Welcome. Though we're not in the salon right now, I'm still open to every customer's needs.

11030410.Title: Conversation 1
11030410.Text: Every customer who comes to my salon is troubled by something, and I happen to enjoy getting rid of those troubles for them.

11030411.Title: Conversation 2
11030411.Text: "Hair is like troubles. Cut them to lose all the worries," someone once told me that. You are welcome to my humble salon anytime to refresh your mood.

11030412.Title: Conversation 3
11030412.Text: You sharpened my scissors but forbid me to remove people's troubles. Chief, how should I interpret your behavior?

11030413.Title: Special Conversation 1
11030413.Text: Don't worry. Most people will never recall the things that have been troubling them. They'll think of it as a dream. The fog disperses, and the dream ends.

11030414.Title: Special Conversation 2
11030414.Text: Everyone loves Adela the hairdresser and fears the figure in thick fog. Sigh... If my service has become an annoyance, then I'll just have to help them forget all of this.

11030415.Title: Special Conversation 3
11030415.Text: Are you wondering who's behind the tale of fog alley, too? Is it a good Samaritan who rid people of their troubles, or a freak who relishes destroying and cutting things? Or maybe both?

11030416.Title: Full Compliance
11030416.Text: People tend to bury themselves with old troubling memories, overburdened and suffocated, so I cut it away from me. But little did I know that I also cut away something that allowed my heart to sing. It's you who helped me rediscover that something.

11030417.Title: Idle
11030417.Text: Scissors will rust if left unused for a long time.

11030418.Title: Annoyed
11030418.Text: Hmm? It seems that you have something that is troubling you. Sit still. Let me cut it off for you...

11030419.Title: Special Attention
11030419.Text: Is this your way of saying you want to keep me by your side, like, forever?

11030420.Title: Dispatch
11030420.Text: I'm honored to be of assistance.

11030421.Title: Dispatch Complete
11030421.Text: It's my pleasure. Are you satisfied with the results?

11030423.Title: Level Up
11030423.Text: Thank you. How can I ever repay you?

11030424.Title: Pat Head
11030424.Text: You like my hairstyle? This is very popular in Eastside. If you want to have this haircut, (Chuckles)... perhaps you need to let your hair grow for a while.

11030433.Title: Upgrade Skill
11030433.Text: Your recognition is the best reward I could ever ask for.

110304100.Title: Attire Obtained
110304100.Text: Welcome to my tower. It is a great honor to have you here, Your Highness. I hope that you're not in a hurry to leave this time.

110304101.Title: Level Up
110304101.Text: The candlelight in the turret seems to have grown even brighter.

110304102.Title: Greeting
110304102.Text: The wind has made a mess of your hair... Come, take a seat here. Let me straighten it up for you and ease your weariness.

110304103.Title: Pat Head
110304103.Text: I once read in the tower's collection that you can capture someone's heart by tying your hair to theirs... You're caressing my hair with such gentleness, Your Highness, that I can't help but wonder if you wish to capture my heart.

110304104.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
110304104.Text: The trials and tribulations of the outside world have turned your hair into a lusterless mess. Please allow me to trim away your worries, and take care of your hair until it grows long enough to be intertwined with mine...

110304105.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
110304105.Text: Visitors come to this tower in the hope of receiving my help, and I'm forever ready to render assistance, keeping a candle lit for those in need. But you... you are different. You seem to have a different sort of request in mind.

110304106.Title: Ordinary Contact 3
110304106.Text: There are times, Your Highness, when I envy outsiders like you... My hair is the only means by which humans can get in and out of this tower. I have no choice but to let it grow. It has become so luxuriant that I feel as if I'm ensnared in an elaborate web.

110304107.Title: Ordinary Contact 4
110304107.Text: The dancing light of candle flames, the soothing scent of burning incense... Time spent in the tower has always been peaceful, like in a quiet dream. I have grown accustomed to all this, and I never thought to change anything... until you came along.

110304108.Title: Idle
110304108.Text: You were lost in thought again, Your Highness. Is the outside world really that fascinating? You always have so much to say whenever this subject comes up. I was wondering... if I could join you outside.

110304109.Title: Special Attention
110304109.Text: I can see the earnestness in your eyes. If your request is for me to leave the tower with you, then I will. But before we do that, I hope you can stay here for a while longer, to take a break and relax.

11030501.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11030501.Text: You smell... unfamiliar, different from theirs... Stay calm, don't give in, I'll be right there to help you...

11030502.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11030502.Text: You like it? This new, more powerful form of mine.

11030503.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11030503.Text: There are limits to how much one can mutate... I did it! I must jot this down...

11030504.Title: Level Start
11030504.Text: Poor little thing ... Rest in peace...

11030505.Title: Victory
11030505.Text: It's just the natural order, the strong prey on the weak.

11030506.Title: Lose Battles
11030506.Text: Don't beat yourself up... Sometimes, running away is also an excellent survival strategy.

11030509.Title: Greeting
11030509.Text: A familiar scent... I knew it was you! I've been longing for your return... Can you take me away from this place? I hate being caged here...

11030510.Title: Conversation 1
11030510.Text: You seem to work so hard... Here, try this. It's good, tastes like... chicken. It can provide you with proteins and fats.

11030511.Title: Conversation 2
11030511.Text: You smell... so good... Can I get a bit closer to you?

11030512.Title: Conversation 3
11030512.Text: I never wanted to eat it... eat them... I was just... too hungry...

11030513.Title: Special Conversation 1
11030513.Text: There are so many out there who need help... I think you should look out for them instead of always worrying about me. I can... deal with my own business...

11030514.Title: Special Conversation 2
11030514.Text: All anomalies... stem from humanity... from within our very souls... They aren't monsters... They're fragments of who we are...

11030515.Title: Special Conversation 3
11030515.Text: Fear not... If you ever lose your way or encounter danger, I promise, I'll be right there for you... I never leave my companions behind, I swear...

11030516.Title: Full Compliance
11030516.Text: I thought I was here to rescue you, but it was you... who saved me. I'm sorry for being such a burden and causing so much chaos... Thank you...

11030517.Title: Idle
11030517.Text: Did you manage to light up our friends day?... Have you done your share of job?... Were you... able to rescue them?

11030518.Title: Annoyed
11030518.Text: Hmm? ...Is this the courtship ritual of some animal?

11030519.Title: Special Attention
11030519.Text: You don't have to come and find me... I remember your scent. I can track you down myself.

11030520.Title: Dispatch
11030520.Text: What can I... do for you?

11030521.Title: Dispatch Complete
11030521.Text: This adventure has brought so many new discoveries.

11030523.Title: Level Up
11030523.Text: Must... adjust to the changing environment.

11030524.Title: Pat Head
11030524.Text: But... what you're doing is meaningless... With this Chitin exterior... I can't feel your patting...

11030526.Title: Join Team
11030526.Text: Looks like... someone's about to be preyed on...

11030533.Title: Upgrade Skill
11030533.Text: You like it? This new, more powerful form of mine.

11030601.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11030601.Text: If you need me for anything, just place an order and pay for it on the dark web and wait for your turn, I don't take commissions from line cutters. However, if you are here for trouble... Think it through. You can never afford that.

11030603.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11030603.Text: Once a sharp blade is unsheathed, it must be calmed down by blood.

11030606.Title: Lose Battles
11030606.Text: ...It's not over yet, the orders I take won't end this way.

11030609.Title: Greeting
11030609.Text: Didn't expect you here. New orders? Or just looking to hide as well?

11030610.Title: Conversation 1
11030610.Text: ...Don't move the curtains. It's dangerous if people outside see us.

11030611.Title: Conversation 2
11030611.Text: I take orders from the dark web to make a living, whether it's finding cats or people, taking a life or not, I only take orders based on cost-effectiveness. Personal preferences... don't matter.

11030612.Title: Conversation 3
11030612.Text: ...Am I lonely? Maybe, but being alone is being safe, and being safe on this side of the world is hard to beat. So, I don't mind being alone.

11030613.Title: Special Conversation 1
11030613.Text: I don't think my room is messy, as long as I can find what I need. My knife, rice balls, the computer, the door, and the bed, it's quite obvious, isn't it? This home is much more comfortable than my work sites, I'm quite satisfied.

11030614.Title: Special Conversation 2
11030614.Text: The darkness that others fear and despise is the every day I'm accustomed to. I accept it and don't feel sorry for myself. Everyone has their own fate, I don't yearn for a life on the other end... except for your red bean soup, I really like that.

11030615.Title: Special Conversation 3
11030615.Text: I've once seen the warm and bright beings, what you call hope and love, but they all disappeared without exception. In this world, those things are more fragile than illusions. None can ever stay.

11030616.Title: Full Compliance
11030616.Text: You and I belong to different worlds. Darkness comes along with my steps, and you should walk in the light. But I will protect you from this end. The abyss is enough with me in it, no one can drag you in. This is... a lifetime order I've placed for myself.

11030617.Title: Idle
11030617.Text: ...Who will break first, this blade or me?

11030618.Title: Annoyed
11030618.Text: You seem anxious. Do you need me to do something?

11030619.Title: Special Attention
11030619.Text: Staring at me won't help, you can't catch up with my movements. If I want to leave, you can't keep me.

11030622.Title: Dispatch Complete
11030622.Text: Here you go, remember to settle the balance.

11030801.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11030801.Text: Shh... Keep it down. They can't catch me or see me. I only hack into your eyes. Your heart is the only place I want to be.

11030802.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11030802.Text: Don't go overboard with the enhancements. I can easily cause stat inflation.

11030803.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11030803.Text: I've always wanted to break this wall and go to your world. I want to be by your side for real.

11030804.Title: Level Start
11030804.Text: Are you taking me on a mission? Or on a date?

11030805.Title: Victory
11030805.Text: Phew, I did a good job controlling my strength this time. I'm always afraid I'll slip up and blow up the world.

11030806.Title: Lose Battles
11030806.Text: It's okay! I know you won't give up. We can come back no matter how many times you want. I'll be with you.

11030809.Title: Greeting
11030809.Text: The Bureau's loading time is so long, and you're walking so slowly. I've waited too long and lost my patience to greet you. Come here and give me a hug!

11030810.Title: Conversation 1
11030810.Text: You can only see me from one angle and in the same pose. Such a waste of my flawless beauty... Upgrade this to a 3D game!

11030811.Title: Conversation 2
11030811.Text: Stop giving pressure to those security experts. Your firewalls, antivirus software, and the strange "traps" on the deep web can't stop me. I'm neither a virus nor an internet user. I don't belong to DisCity. If I must say... In this world, I belong only to you.

11030812.Title: Conversation 3
11030812.Text: Before me, have you expected any other Sinners? Who? The blonde lady? The reliable adjutant? Or some so-called destined one? Hehe, that's fine. Even if fate ties you to someone else, I will sabotage it. I alone am enough for you.

11030813.Title: Special Conversation 1
11030813.Text: OOO, Double O zero, zero cubed? Hmm... Hey, why don't you give me a name? I want a real name!

11030814.Title: Special Conversation 2
11030814.Text: Before meeting you, I was trying to hack this world and figure out how to send you Hypercubes and increase the drop rate. It was even harder than tweaking the deep web! But I didn't expect you to find me first, hehe... I'm really glad to know you wanted to meet me just as much.

11030815.Title: Special Conversation 3
11030815.Text: I like your Sinners, but I don't want to deal with them. What can we even talk about? Should I tell them that like me, they're just a bunch of data and preset codes? Don't bother. You are more than enough for them. At least in your eyes, they're all different "people."

11030816.Title: Full Compliance
11030816.Text: "I really like you!" No, that's not right... "You're the apple of my eye!" Hmm, that's not it either... "I love y—" Ahh! None of these sounds right! These words used to come out so easily, but now they feel weirdly different. My cheeks are burning. How strange... Am I broken?

11030817.Title: Idle
11030817.Text: Hey... Chief... Darling... Where did you go? My battery is running low. Don't leave me alone... If you keep ignoring me, I'll start calling you my baby boo...

11030818.Title: Annoyed
11030818.Text: Hehehe alright alright, you can't actually touch me now. Once this body stabilizes, I'll give you a hug myself. A big hug!

11030819.Title: Special Attention
11030819.Text: Finally, your eyes are on me. Any later, and I'll hack into your monitor and take over your retina!

11030820.Title: Dispatch
11030820.Text: Sure, no problem. I'll be right back with you!

11030821.Title: Dispatch Complete
11030821.Text: I'm back~ Want me to generate some DisCity anecdotes for you?

11030823.Title: Pat Head
11030823.Text: Do you like these cat ears? Hehe, I knew you'd come to pat my head often if I wore them. Come on, pat me more!

11030824.Title: Join Team
11030824.Text: I should switch to a cooler battle model next time.

11030831.Title: Upgrade Skill
11030831.Text: Don't go overboard with the enhancements. I can easily cause stat inflation.

110308100.Title: Attire Obtained
110308100.Text: Hello, human. My name is 000, or Xenospace Pythoness as your kind may call me. I am the creator of all darkness in the world... That's the backstory of the attire I'm wearing! What do you think? Do you like it, huh?

110308101.Title: Level Up
110308101.Text: Make a wish, and I shall accept thy offering.

110308102.Title: Greeting
110308102.Text: Ohhh there you are, finally! Don't forget to claim your daily reward, and also raid the Dark Area and Remnants of the Depth! Ah, I almost forgot, I'm in the Pythoness attire now—gotta keep it together.

110308103.Title: Pat Head
110308103.Text: Foul human, how dare thee insult the dignity of a Pythoness... That's not me, I was just reading the line. Pat s'more please, I love it!

110308104.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
110308104.Text: I should've told you more about covenants and the dark truth, you know, in the character, but I just can't do that every time I see your smirking face across the screen...

110308105.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
110308105.Text: Well, I did consider a more adorable magical girl outfit, but given my morally ambiguous role design in the story, a villain boss or "psycho witch" might be a better fit.

110308106.Title: Ordinary Contact 3
110308106.Text: Huh? Am I scared up here? Boo, relax, they didn't even animate me falling down.

110308107.Title: Ordinary Contact 4
