110308107.Text: Ahem, thou voyager, trudging from afar, in want of only the cruel dark truth. Aye, do you loath it and feel vengeful to upend the world? Then make an everlasting covenant with me... What I mean is, keep me on the main screen, and don't you ever change it!

110308108.Title: Idle
110308108.Text: Are ya asleep? Well... I really really like you, so much so that I'm gonna sneak a kiss now! Mwah~ No reaction at all? Guess you are truly asleep now... Bummer...

110308109.Title: Special Attention
110308109.Text: Now that you've entered the Pythoness's dimension, you must be prepared to stay with me forever, right? Not a word? Cool, I will take it as a yes.

11040101.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11040101.Text: MBCC's technology is kind of lagging behind, Chief. How can you expect to jail me with this kind of equipment? Why don't you do a system upgrade? I can get it done for you in the blink of an eye.

11040102.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11040102.Text: Here comes the hero! Ahem... How did I do? I've been wanting to say that line for a while.

11040103.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11040103.Text: Controller center is successfully connected. Summer is ready. Time to go save this dark world!

11040104.Title: Level Start
11040104.Text: My skirt will get dirty in this kind of place.

11040105.Title: Win Battles
11040105.Text: Evil will eventually be vanquished. Hmm... That's a pretty sick line too.

11040106.Title: Lose Battles
11040106.Text: Aargh... There must have been something wrong with the Ring Weapon's parameter settings. Let's try one more time!

11040107.Title: Ultimate Skill
11040107.Text: Full system locked on, clear area!

11040108.Title: Die in Battles
11040108.Text: No... I haven't even had... my graduation...

11040109.Title: Greeting
11040109.Text: Hi, Chief! While you were away, I came up with a new idea... Have you ever thought about replacing an arm or a leg with a more functional one? Or maybe... upgrading your brain?

11040110.Title: Conversation 1
11040110.Text: Watch closely. This is the Ring Weapon, not a Mania weapon. They are fundamentally different. Give me a break. How could I possibly make an inferior product like that?

11040111.Title: Conversation 2
11040111.Text: A scientific genius needs loads of sugar to sustain her thinking, and chocolate is the best choice. What's more, it's a perfect match for a high school girl. What I'm trying to say is that... Can you approve my purchase application already? I promise to give you some!

11040112.Title: Conversation 3
11040112.Text: The only weakness of that robot is its looks! It's different from those common models! Stop mocking it, or I'm gonna get mad. And apologize to the model!

11040113.Title: Special Conversation 1
11040113.Text: Friends? I don't need them. Who says high school girls must have friends? Don't you think weird, gorgeous, mysterious robot-geek genius at school works better as a character concept?

11040114.Title: Special Conversation 2
11040114.Text: This place is like heaven compared to the Ring Research Institute! I can decorate my room as I like and set my schedule freely. Above all, I can watch anime anytime and anywhere I want!

11040115.Title: Special Conversation 3
11040115.Text: It sucks having to go into battle myself. My skirt has gotten dirty a few times. But seeing as it's your request... Alright, I'll do it for you. In return, you'll be my test subject for a day, deal?

11040116.Title: Full Compliance
11040116.Text: I've noticed there have been a few moments when you looked pretty heroic... Hey, are you interested in becoming a giant robot pilot? I already have a rough design in mind!

11040117.Title: Idle
11040117.Text: Let's begin today's workout routine! Breathe in, breathe out. Awesome! What a perfect diaphragmatic breathing exercise. Goal reached. Time to head back and eat some ice cream, woo-hoo!

11040118.Title: Annoyed
11040118.Text: No workout today... Let me be a couch potato for just one day...

11040119.Title: Special Attention
11040119.Text: Are you curious about me? Hehe, I want to observe you closely too.

11040120.Title: Dispatch
11040120.Text: Eh... I've got an errand to run?

11040121.Title: Dispatch Complete
11040121.Text: If it weren't for the Ring Weapon... I would have died of exhaustion...

11040124.Title: Pat Head
11040124.Text: Hmm? What is it? You didn't fully grasp the topic I explained just now? Well, well... If it's for you, I can repeat it as many times as you want.

11040133.Title: Upgrade Skill
11040133.Text: Here comes the hero! Ahem... How did I do? I've been wanting to say that line for a while.

110401100.Title: Attire Obtained
110401100.Text: "You want my treasure? Then find it in WhiteSands!" Hehe, what do you think?! Isn't this line perfect in this situation?

110401102.Title: Greeting
110401102.Text: The claw strength is up to standard. Let me try them on the Chief! Ahem... Morning, Chief! Wanna go experiment... explore WhiteSands?

110401103.Title: Pat Head
110401103.Text: Oh? Wanna try this too? Ha, looks like you can't resist the charm of this "Summer's special sand-proof hat" either, Chief.

110401104.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
110401104.Text: The ritual of treasure hunting should come first, of course! ...I don't think it's too hot to wear this much! Do you not believe in the 30 cooling modules installed in the clothes?!

110401105.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
110401105.Text: Chocolate—Chocolate—Hmm? There's none left... I can't believe it's gone so fast! Sigh, I should've brought more.

110401106.Title: Ordinary Contact 3
110401106.Text: If you put a propeller on your head, then a solar panel and steering system, and finally a battery, you can replace my drone and become the most intelligent detector in WhiteSands! So? Wanna try?

110401107.Title: Ordinary Contact 4
110401107.Text: Ah... Let me rest for a bit... I just finished checking the power system of the sand boat... I'm too tired to move...

110401109.Title: Special Attention
110401109.Text: Huh? Why, it's Chief! Look at you... Are you here to find the treasure buried in WhiteSands?

110401110.Title: Attire Obtained
110401110.Text: Ring substance engine pressure, check. Electronics and navigation system, check. Exterior, check. Enhanced Ring weapon for air combat, Summer 1... Lift off!

110401111.Title: Level Up
110401111.Text: For the blue and pure sky!

110401112.Title: Greeting
110401112.Text: How are you feeling, Chief? Isn't it just awesome to fly around in the sky?

110401113.Title: Pat Head
110401113.Text: I wanted to make this back when I was at the Ring Research Institute! But those old geezers kept turning me down, saying they didn't have enough budget. Hehe, but I know Chief is the best!

110401114.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
110401114.Text: Woohoo! It's working pretty well! We're gonna make it to their prom on time.

110401115.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
110401115.Text: Um? New message. "Keep an eye on the altitude. Be careful not to damage the equipment." Come on, give me some credit.

110401116.Title: Ordinary Contact 3
110401116.Text: Of course I warmed up before the test flight. I've done two whole sit-ups!

110401117.Title: Ordinary Contact 4
110401117.Text: You say the armor is not thick enough? Hehe... won't be a problem, as long as we don't get hit.

110401118.Title: Idle
110401118.Text: Um... Vegetables and fruits grown from seeds that went to space can be unusually large. Chief, do you think it's possible that cocoa made from beans that went to space tastes sweeter? Hehehe...

110401119.Title: Special Attention
110401119.Text: Alas, just relax, Chief! There are sixteen smart flight modules built into your gear. You could take a long nap in the mid air, and still wouldn't have to worry about falling to the ground.

11040201.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11040201.Text: Handcuffing your own boss... You've got balls, rookie. Come on then, show me what you have on me.

11040203.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11040203.Text: You don't deserve to see sunlight, filthy sewer scum!

11040204.Title: Level Start
11040204.Text: Let me see how you flee like rats.

11040205.Title: Win Battles
11040205.Text: Good job. Let's go back and celebrate.

11040206.Title: Lose Battles
11040206.Text: Retreat. I can't waste the valuable lives of my subordinates here.

11040208.Title: Die in Battles
11040208.Text: Somebody... will carry on this will...

11040209.Title: Greeting
11040209.Text: You're late, rookie. Any progress on the mission?

11040210.Title: Conversation 1
11040210.Text: Do you like my cane? I'll let you borrow it. Beware though, there are quite a few hidden parts inside... Don't injure yourself.

11040211.Title: Conversation 2
11040211.Text: Crawl into darkness, bloody your hands... My subordinates do not need justice. Loyalty is their greatest virtue.

11040212.Title: Conversation 3
11040212.Text: What do they call the 9th Agency? A bunch of spiders in the shadows, a gang of merciless lackeys? Hmm... I like that. Their hatred comes from fear, and fear... is the favorite weapon of spies.

11040213.Title: Special Conversation 1
11040213.Text: Don't stress over the protocol. You have free rein to do whatever you see fit. Be confident. You work under me.

11040214.Title: Special Conversation 2
11040214.Text: I wish... for world peace. Can you believe it?

11040215.Title: Special Conversation 3
11040215.Text: Are you curious about this little accessory on my temple? You don't have to know what it is. It's nothing more than... my occasional vanity.

11040216.Title: Full Compliance
11040216.Text: Never ask me for truths, rookie. Some truths can only be traded for with blood. Some day, I'll carry them to the grave. As for you... you'll live on. I'll let you live on, with my city, through the dark night, into the dawn of a new day.

11040217.Title: Idle
11040217.Text: Hmm... Who should I get rid of next?

11040218.Title: Annoyed
11040218.Text: Are you sure? Losing your job and losing your life are both rather inconvenient consequences.

11040219.Title: Special Attention
11040219.Text: Just staring at me won't get you the intelligence you're after. What, need me to teach you some torture skills, rookie?

11040220.Title: Dispatch
11040220.Text: Oh? You want me to tend to this matter personally?

11040221.Title: Dispatch Complete
11040221.Text: Want firsthand intelligence? Come get it in my office tonight.

11040224.Title: Pat Head
11040224.Text: Wanna try on this hat, or try my bullets?

110402100.Title: Attire Obtained
110402100.Text: Everything is progressing smoothly. But I must say, your presence... makes this party even more interesting.

110402101.Title: Level Up
110402101.Text: Let me enjoy this party even more.

110402102.Title: Greeting
110402102.Text: I don't want to hear your report. That's for tomorrow. Enjoy the party—that's the most important task at hand.

110402103.Title: Pat Head
110402103.Text: Prairie gentian, yellow iris, camellia... Which flower shall I adorn my hair with?

110402104.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
110402104.Text: You came too early, rookie. Is it because you don't trust me, or... you want to watch me complete the mission with your own eyes? I hope your answer is the latter.

110402105.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
110402105.Text: Looks clear but tastes zesty—this is what's special about Mitsumasa, the liquor that Kenichi Yagyu is most proud of. Just like Syndicate gangs... seemingly innocuous on the surface, but with sharp blades hidden underneath. Don't you think so, rookie?

110402106.Title: Ordinary Contact 3
110402106.Text: Some truths can only be exchanged for blood, but this time... I don't want to make too much of a ruckus.

110402107.Title: Ordinary Contact 4
110402107.Text: Don't be so nervous, rookie. You won't get any intelligence with that sullen face... Come, sit and have a drink with me. Show some respect to this party and its host by enjoying it.

110402108.Title: Idle
110402108.Text: Please give my friend a glass of orange juice—she can't handle such a strong drink.

110402109.Title: Special Attention
110402109.Text: All the intelligence is here. If you want it, come and stay with me after the party... to sort out the information, of course.

110402110.Title: Attire Obtained
110402110.Text: Well, it seems that scurvy didn't take you down. That's my first mate for you. Now, everyone, back to your stations. Hoist the anchor, and raise the sails. The "Madame Maelstrom" is setting sail again!

110402111.Title: Level Up
110402111.Text: This ship could use all the extra firepower we can get.

110402112.Title: Greeting
110402112.Text: You're awake, first mate. Still savoring the aftertaste of yesterday's revelry? Relax, I'm not accusing you. Obey orders, enjoy yourself, and fight to your heart's content... These are the only rules on this "Madame Maelstrom".

110402114.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
110402114.Text: City... special agency... the 9th Agency? What are you yapping about? Chef, there's something off with that barrel of tequila. Dump it all into the sea.

110402115.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
110402115.Text: The storm's brewing. First mate, tell the crew to change course for the nearest safe harbor... Save our courage for the enemies. There's no point in fighting the sea itself... It will get you nothing but a broken mast.

110402116.Title: Ordinary Contact 3
110402116.Text: Paradeisos? Don't worry, they won't bother me... You want to know about my relationship with them? Well, those who know that secret are either on the throne or at the bottom of the sea. Which one do you plan to be?

110402117.Title: Ordinary Contact 4
110402117.Text: One of these days, I'll hand over this hat, along with this ship, to you. But before that, you've got to prove your worth. Understood?

110402118.Title: Idle
110402118.Text: Dare slack off and nap in front of your captain? You're bold, my dear first mate.

110402119.Title: Special Attention
110402119.Text: Welcome back, my first mate. How are things on that island? How many are stationed there? How many cannons do they have? Excellent scouting. Seems like our prey is about to show its weak spot.

11040301.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11040301.Text: I'd rather chat with you in the cemetery than in the interrogation room... you lie inside while I sit outside. I think our chat will be much better that way.

11040303.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11040303.Text: Want to join... our tea party?

11040304.Title: Level Start
11040304.Text: Did you hear the bell tolling? The ceremony is about to begin.

11040305.Title: Win Battles
11040305.Text: Don't worry, the elegy is already playing.

11040306.Title: Lose Battles
11040306.Text: It's okay, its not time for eternal sleep yet.

11040308.Title: Die in Battles
11040308.Text: Everyone... eventually ends up in an oaken casket...

11040309.Title: Greeting
11040309.Text: Hello Chief. Let us both celebrate and mourn the fact that we are still alive today.

11040310.Title: Conversation 1
11040310.Text: If you need a band... go find a musician named Dudu. Mention my name and maybe she'll give you a discount.

11040311.Title: Conversation 2
11040311.Text: Syndicate needed a grand farewell to usher in another perfect rebirth.

11040312.Title: Conversation 3
11040312.Text: Rest beneath the ground, glide with the wind, or drift along the tide? It doesn't really matter, my friend. They are just one necessary step to salvation.

11040313.Title: Special Conversation 1
11040313.Text: Those who're inside caskets do not pine for the weeping of mourners. Their tears will only wash away the last of their traces and drown out their cries.

11040314.Title: Special Conversation 2
11040314.Text: Only when there is an eternity of silence, the stupidity, boredom, and vileness of life will be changed into something intriguing... However, there is something different about you.

11040315.Title: Special Conversation 3
11040315.Text: I cannot personally preside over my own funeral, but I will leave you my last word. Will you accept it?

11040316.Title: Full Compliance
11040316.Text: You intrigue me more than the dead. Please forgive me for burdening you with my darkness, loneliness, and desperation... Even upon death, I will stay by your side.

11040317.Title: Idle
11040317.Text: Pray? I don't do such... useless things.

11040318.Title: Annoyed
11040318.Text: Do you like me this much? Too bad I can't blow fragile bubbles inside my skull.

11040319.Title: Special Attention
11040319.Text: What do you see through my eyes?

11040320.Title: Dispatch
11040320.Text: Want to go for a walk in the cemetery with me?

11040321.Title: Dispatch Complete
11040321.Text: Hmm, yes... I heard a lot of little secrets.

11040323.Title: Level Up
11040323.Text: I can tell that you really need me.

11040324.Title: Pat Head
11040324.Text: Skulls typically hold the most information because human brains tend to think about their unsettled business upon death.

11040325.Title: On battlefield
11040325.Text: Got to face that boring, breathing bunch again...

110403100.Title: Attire Obtained
110403100.Text: Since the moment you stepped into the forest, you've belonged to me. I shall grant you eternal slumber. As for me, I will get everything I want.

110403101.Title: Level Up
110403101.Text: I shall give you riper fruit.

110403102.Title: Greeting
110403102.Text: Good, come and eat the fruit I offer you... You'll receive the sweetest salvation.

110403103.Title: Pat Head
110403103.Text: The rainbow has seven colors, and God created the world in seven days. The seven gems on my crown allow me to hear discarnate whispers. If that's also what you want... come and try to snatch my crown.

110403104.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
110403104.Text: Someone once presented me with a magic mirror that speaks only the truth. Guess whose existence I discovered from its mouth?

110403105.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
110403105.Text: I'm not the ruler of this place. I simply provide lost travelers with a place to rest forever.

110403106.Title: Ordinary Contact 3
110403106.Text: Snow covers tracks, apples arouse desires, and ebony safeguards secrets... What do you wish to decorate your resting place with?

110403107.Title: Ordinary Contact 4
110403107.Text: Close your eyes, and you shall see the boundless darkness of the forbidden forest... But fear not. Give me your hand, and I shall take you to where you ought to be.

110403108.Title: Idle
110403108.Text: This forest is not silent. After all, they have been talking to me from six feet under.

110403109.Title: Special Attention
110403109.Text: Since you're so curious about me... stay and become part of my collection.

11040401.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11040401.Text: The crimson full moon rises... You used the unknown to catch me... You... are the black hole of secrets I long for.

11040402.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11040402.Text: Have you... solved the inscrutable riddle about me?

11040403.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11040403.Text: Break all the shackles and peer into my deepest secrets.

11040404.Title: Level Start
11040404.Text: There's nothing I wish to seek here.

11040405.Title: Win Battles
11040405.Text: This mission... might be worth something, but barely...

11040406.Title: Lose Battles
11040406.Text: This mission has become meaningless. Don't waste any more time...

11040407.Title: Ultimate Skill
11040407.Text: The red heat shall devour everything!

11040408.Title: Die in Battles
11040408.Text: The stars... shall ultimately die in darkness.

11040409.Title: Greeting
11040409.Text: No, no... Argh! I-is that you? Oh good... you came.

11040410.Title: Conversation 1
11040410.Text: I want... I want to unearth all the unknowns of the world, and watch as 100 billion suns collapse into black holes of doom...

11040411.Title: Conversation 2
11040411.Text: Quick... hurry. Let me go seek and explore and research and devour all the secrets... until they completely vanish from my consciousness.

11040412.Title: Conversation 3
11040412.Text: It's howling and tormenting me... and pushing me to get all your secrets...

11040413.Title: Special Conversation 1
11040413.Text: Me...? I survived by devouring secrets of the unknown... Yeah, that's all...

11040414.Title: Special Conversation 2
11040414.Text: I shall always remember... how that red star fell into the sea... It brought forth endless knowledge, secrets, affairs and mysteries... Ah, how intriguing it is.

11040415.Title: Special Conversation 3
11040415.Text: I went to that place in search of the unknown... It really satisfies me, but I think, you can make me feel the same way.

11040416.Title: Full Compliance
11040416.Text: Quantum fields attract and distort space-time, while you and your secrets... attract me... I can't help but be drawn to you, and fall... I cannot escape, yet... I have no regrets.

11040417.Title: Idle
11040417.Text: Instead of lingering by my side, why not come a bit closer...

11040418.Title: Annoyed
11040418.Text: No need to tell me what this move means... I don't want to know.

11040419.Title: Special Attention
11040419.Text: It's extremely dangerous to gaze at the Black Hole... It won't respond to you. It'll just rip you apart and devour you...

11040420.Title: Dispatch
11040420.Text: I don't want to be too far away from you.

11040421.Title: Dispatch Complete
11040421.Text: The things that are already known to humans are worthless.

11040424.Title: Pat Head
11040424.Text: Do you also want to break through mankind's greatest defenses and peek into their secrets?

11040425.Title: On battlefield
11040425.Text: If you want to use me, be careful.

11040432.Title: Upgrade Skill
11040432.Text: Have you... solved the inscrutable riddle about me?

110404100.Title: Attire Obtained
110404100.Text: This is a gathering of the stars... In this vast emptiness, the only ones attending the feast are me... and you...

110404101.Title: Level Up
110404101.Text: The more the stars burn, the brighter they shine...

110404102.Title: Greeting
110404102.Text: Climb up the stairs and join me... If you stop just for these bouquets, you'll miss out on the spectacular view of the starry sky...

110404103.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
110404103.Text: That celestial body encircling us is the mere shadow of the same star... A black hole hides it well by warping and refracting the light... But now, I'll guide you to fully perceive its existence.

110404104.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
110404104.Text: The stars converge in the cosmos, and I yearn to uncover all their secrets... Even if it means becoming one of them, torn apart for closing the distance... I simply can't resist...

110404105.Title: Idle
110404105.Text: It's getting closer... The red full moon...

110404106.Title: Annoyed
110404106.Text: If you wish to get closer to me, instead of tangling with my hem, why don't you... tell me your secrets.

110404107.Title: Special Attention
110404107.Text: Are you looking upon this sea of stars... or are you looking... at me?

11040501.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11040501.Text: It must have been very hard on you, you poor thing. You've done well. I'll take it from here, and everything will be all right.

11040502.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11040502.Text: Not satisfied with my performance? I should work harder in the future? Sure, if it's what you want me to do.

11040503.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11040503.Text: Okay, that's enough, you've traveled too far. Go back, before it's too late.

11040504.Title: Level Start
11040504.Text: You want me to come along? Sure. I'd be glad to go with you.

11040505.Title: Victory
11040505.Text: My work here is done. I wish you good luck.

11040506.Title: Lose Battles
11040506.Text: It's all right. Just a little mistake. I'm an expert at fixing things.

11040508.Title: Die in Battles
11040508.Text: Heh, I'll take my leave... See you on the other side...

11040509.Title: Greeting
11040509.Text: Hello there, ready for the busy day ahead? Do you need my help, or do you want my encouragement instead?

11040510.Title: Conversation 1
11040510.Text: My job is to fix mistakes. I receive requests for help, analyze the situation, formulate plans, and execute them. I don't hate this job. It's just... many unnecessary costs could be avoided if everybody acted more cautiously. My point is, you should be cautious out there, Chief. I hope that you will never require my services as the "Hush."

11040511.Title: Conversation 2
11040511.Text: I'm neither a good fighter, nor do I have any special powers. The only thing that protects me from harm is my Schorl. Of course, from now on, it'll protect you too. I know you don't trust the ones behind it, but you'll find a way to take advantage of its power, right?

11040512.Title: Conversation 3
11040512.Text: You want me to work "under" you? I suppose I can do that. I can do whatever you want me to do, only at the cost of everything you have, or a flower that has freshly come out of its bud.

11040513.Title: Special Conversation 1
11040513.Text: I have nothing to ask of you, except that... you must take better care of yourself. Keeping you safe is no easy task. But, if push comes to shove, I might have to make the best use of your life in the right time and right place.

11040514.Title: Special Conversation 2
11040514.Text: Shh... I'm counting your heartbeats. Sixteen, seventeen, eighteen... Mm, it's fun. Your heart is full of fascinating emotions. How about you? Would you be able to understand the language of my heart?

11040515.Title: Special Conversation 3
11040515.Text: I've worked for many, and many have worked for me. But you... you are truly different, one of a kind. You can achieve more, you can make a much bigger difference than me. So... stay here with me, don't leave me, don't walk away.

11040516.Title: Full Compliance
11040516.Text: Tell me about the books you like, and music, movies, places, and the people you are fond of... Yes, I want to know more about you, learn more about your world. I want to have the image of you burned into my mind before your fate catches up with you, before you meet your solitary end.

11040518.Title: Annoyed
11040518.Text: Okay, okay... This is a "virgin" territory for you, huh? Now, give me your hand. I'll teach you how to do it properly. Try to remember the steps.

11040519.Title: Special Attention
11040519.Text: Do you have to stare at me like that? All right then, I'm gonna do the same to you.

11040520.Title: Dispatch
11040520.Text: Hmm, that's new... Can you assign more people for me?

11040521.Title: Dispatch Complete
11040521.Text: Don't worry, it's been a smooth trip. These good lambs have done a wonderful job.

11040524.Title: Pat Head
11040524.Text: Oh, you want a reward too?

11040525.Title: On battlefield
11040525.Text: Oh, I don't have much to contribute on the front line. I'll count on you guys.

11040532.Title: Upgrade Skill
11040532.Text: Not satisfied with my performance? I should work harder in the future? Sure, if it's what you want me to do.

110405100.Title: Attire Obtained
110405100.Text: Seems like you're really not cut out for "social events" like this one. Don't worry, I know you've tried your best. Leave the rest to me.

110405101.Title: Level Up
110405101.Text: I'll never forget what you've done for me.

110405102.Title: Greeting
110405102.Text: Eastside nights all unfold like this one, I'm all too familiar with this scene. It's like deja vu, isn't it... Who'd want to get stuck in this limbo if they didn't have their hidden agendas?

110405103.Title: Pat Head
110405103.Text: Can't hold back your desires even at a time like this? My, aren't you an adorable child.

110405104.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
110405104.Text: Both flattery and curses are but the frivolous chatter of those who look up to you. Don't let it get to your head. After all, you're not one of them.

110405105.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
110405105.Text: Most Eastsiders are immersed in a dream they'll never wake up from. You and I are the only exceptions. The word "dream" has had nothing to do with us since a long time ago.

110405106.Title: Ordinary Contact 3
110405106.Text: This soirée... these spotlights and flowers, celebrities and tycoons... and even myself... We're all just the side dishes. You're the only entrée of tonight.

110405107.Title: Ordinary Contact 4
110405107.Text: Too many mistakes have happened in DisCity. Even I can't deal with them all. But you... you're different. You shoulder everyone's hopes and dreams... Just go ahead and do what you have to do. Don't worry about making mistakes. I'll cover for you...

110405108.Title: Idle
110405108.Text: In the end, regardless by whom, I'm bound to be abandoned... I won't blame you. After all, it's your destiny.

110405109.Title: Special Attention
110405109.Text: You like being with me? Hehe... Don't worry. I won't leave.

11040601.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11040601.Text: Welcome to Fortuna! Oh, pardon me. That's how I used to start conversations. Old habits die hard. But many do seem to have an acting talent here... Shall we have a chat about that soon?

11040602.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11040602.Text: Don't just stare at me. Enjoy the show!

11040603.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11040603.Text: Come on, let's have a drink to celebrate the perfect ending of the grand finale!

11040604.Title: Level Start
11040604.Text: My dear, time for you to shine on stage!

11040605.Title: Win Battles
11040605.Text: The curtain fell on the perfect show! Such a fascinating story!

11040608.Title: Die in Battles
11040608.Text: All dreams vanish at this moment...

11040609.Title: Greeting
11040609.Text: Hmm, you came right when I thought of you. Well done! You deserve the praise.

11040610.Title: Conversation 1
11040610.Text: If it's what you wish, a word from me can promote you from an understudy to the main cast... But you must repay me for my investment.

11040611.Title: Conversation 2
11040611.Text: Drop the formality with me... You don't need your sanity here, my dear. Just enjoy yourself and make bold choices!

11040612.Title: Conversation 3
11040612.Text: Let me teach you the way to survive in this theater... Give your love to all, but never all your love to one.

11040613.Title: Special Conversation 1
11040613.Text: The theater is indeed an intricate thing. The seats in the boxes are red velvet. The chairs in the hall are the cheapest material. But just like how a play treats the audience equally, when the tickets are sold out, even the city councilors will have to rush to sit on the floor.

11040614.Title: Special Conversation 2
11040614.Text: Imagine how boring it'll be if we all follow the predetermined path! Everyone needs to let loose and go a little crazy at some point... No matter who you become and where you go in the future, that moment will be an irreplaceable memory.

11040615.Title: Special Conversation 3
11040615.Text: A kiss is a wonderful but fleeting thing. When it fades, reality hits and the madness dries up. Some people accept it, others spiral. I wonder, if it were you, what unexpected choices would you make?

11040616.Title: Full Compliance
11040616.Text: Every moment with you, the next step always seems unpredictable. You are my most cherished dancer, my most beautiful singer. I'd let the flames swallow the entire theater, and we'd be acting out the utmost frenzy until we turn to ashes.

11040617.Title: Idle
11040617.Text: I love watching those kids on stage, seeing them so eager to drop everything and choose a different life... Hmm, how I enjoy these moments.

11040618.Title: Annoyed
11040618.Text: It's truly dazzling, but for me, it's just some old tricks...

11040619.Title: Special Attention
11040619.Text: Do you prefer me over those pretty, adorable young ones? Hehe... You're bold and untamed, and that's what I like about you.

11040620.Title: Dispatch
11040620.Text: Sigh, how come I still need to go to social occasions personally...

11040621.Title: Dispatch Complete
11040621.Text: What a spectacle! Here, I even brought you a little souvenir.

11040623.Title: Level Up
11040623.Text: Oh my, flowers for me? Have you mistaken me for some big name on stage? But sure, I'll accept them.

11040624.Title: Pat Head
11040624.Text: Don't be naughty... Now is not the time for that...

11040625.Title: On battlefield
11040625.Text: If this scene could be reenacted, what would be your choice?

11040632.Title: Upgrade Skill
11040632.Text: Don't just stare at me. Enjoy the show!

110406100.Title: Attire Obtained
110406100.Text: Each play is a carefully woven dream, inviting you to immerse yourself in lives yet unlived and emotions yet unfelt. I'm convinced that you won't be disappointed by today's play, a play that promises to transport you to a vibrant, luminous dream of yesteryear.

110406101.Title: Level Up
110406101.Text: Thank you for your kind words. Let's hope today's premiere is a success.

110406102.Title: Greeting
110406102.Text: Hahahahaha. We'd long expected a visit from an esteemed guest such as yourself. It's only appropriate for me to welcome you personally.

110406103.Title: Pat Head
110406103.Text: It took me a long time to get my hair just right. If you mess it up, you'll have to fix it.

110406104.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
110406104.Text: This new play is a period piece about the fate of ordinary people against a backdrop of changing times... Oh, I shouldn't tell you anything more about the play. It's better to experience and explore the story as it unfolds, don't you think? I wouldn't want to spoil the surprise for you.

110406105.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
110406105.Text: Yes, staging a play is no easy task. It involves hammering the finer points of the script into each actor, adjusting lines and blocking based on rehearsals, checking the props and lighting over and over again... However, since every child in the troupe is giving their all for this play, there is no reason for me to slack off. I will not let their hard work go to waste, nor will I let the audience down.

110406106.Title: Ordinary Contact 3
110406106.Text: Oh, you like this fan too? Well, take it, as a keepsake. I made this prop myself; it's one of a kind. I'd like to gift it to you...

110406107.Title: Ordinary Contact 4
110406107.Text: You know the style of Fortuna... To make the viewing experience even more immersive, every audience member comes to the theater dressed up in fitting attire. I'm no exception. How about I take you backstage, so that you can change into an outfit that matches with mine before we watch the play together?

110406108.Title: Idle
110406108.Text: The show is about to start. Let's hurry up. You don't want to miss the opening.

110406109.Title: Special Attention
110406109.Text: Stare at me all you want for now, but when the show begins, you should direct all your attention to the stage, so as to feel the actors' devotion to their art from this VIP box with the best view. I've reserved it especially for you.

11040701.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11040701.Text: Ladies and gentlemen, this is the blow-by-blow video footage of me being captured by the MBCC! Hey, Chief, look at the camera—three, two, one, cheese!

11040702.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11040702.Text: Carrying a camera around every day is like a workout routine. Take a look at my mini biceps! Cute, huh?

11040703.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11040703.Text: Bad guys hiding in the dark, show your true selves in front of the screen! I command you, in the name of the MBCC Chief, look at the camera!

11040704.Title: Level Start
11040704.Text: Camera is ready! Come on, give us a smile!

11040705.Title: Victory
11040705.Text: Guess what I caught on camera? Ta-da! It's the moment they got blown to smithereens! Cool, huh? I'm going to frame it and hang it above my bed.

11040706.Title: Lose Battles
11040706.Text: It's so, so embarrassing. Please delete that last part. Please, please, please...

11040708.Title: Die in Battles
11040708.Text: Camera, my camera, I'll leave it to you...

11040709.Title: Greeting
11040709.Text: Friends, new and old, I'm your reporter buddy! With me here is the famous Chief of the Minos Bureau of Crisis Control! Don't be shy, Chief, say hello to everyone!

11040710.Title: Conversation 1
11040710.Text: Hey, you know what? I just had a nightmare where the editor-in-chief was nagging me to hand in a news article. It was terrifying! Thank goodness I'm unemployed now.

11040711.Title: Conversation 2
11040711.Text: A baddie sneaking around, the justice reporter comes to town, I capture him on tape, I'm sending it out... Tie him up, cut him down,... Lalala...♪

11040712.Title: Conversation 3
11040712.Text: I know I have to pay for what I did. I've been ready to face the consequences of my actions since I arrived at the Bureau. Punish me, if you so wish. I shall take whatever might come... Could you hit that record button for me first? Thanks!

11040713.Title: Special Conversation 1
11040713.Text: Apple juice cleanses the soul of all sins, chases away negativity, brings about clarity; it is a source of enlightenment, the deconstruction of the truth, and the creative juice I need to come up with an unconventional take for my next news report. I made up all the things I just said. So, would you like to join me for a glass of apple juice?

11040714.Title: Special Conversation 2
11040714.Text: No news, sooooo dull! Chief, how about we get some "pets" to spice things up? Here is an idea: We lock up those sticky-fingered guys, put them on running wheels, threaten them with a stun gun if they slack off! They're just some nasty scumbags. If we accidentally kill one or two, that will be a great contribution to society!

11040715.Title: Special Conversation 3
11040715.Text: Exposing the sex scandals of celebrities is child's play. What really gets my blood pumping is digging into those dingy, seedy corners to hunt down the degenerates who think they've escaped punishment, reveling in their murky hideouts. I want to drag those contemptible vermin out of their cesspits and expose them under the blazing sun until they're dried up. Ah, just picturing them as crispy specimens fills me with satisfaction!

11040716.Title: Full Compliance
11040716.Text: Hey Chief, quick interview time! Any thoughts on your love life? What's your ideal partner like? Is it someone gentle or super energetic? And would you consider someone who rocks a high ponytail and runs around with a camera all day? You know, someone like... me?

11040717.Title: Idle
11040717.Text: Apple juice rules! Cheers! Chief? Wait, there are so many of you! One Chief, two Chiefs, three Chiefs... Haha, they're all mine!

11040718.Title: Annoyed
11040718.Text: W-what are you doing?! Are you...? Oh stop, stop! The cameras are still rolling!

11040719.Title: Special Attention
11040719.Text: Finally, we have come to this exciting moment. Let's give it up for the winner of this year's Best News Award! Drumroll... Reporter Bianca from the MBCC TV!

11040720.Title: Dispatch
11040720.Text: Coming! Let me put on some lipstick first... What? The broadcast van has left?!

11040721.Title: Dispatch Complete
11040721.Text: This one is for you, this one too... Eh, why does it feel like I've made a trip for nothing?

11040723.Title: Level Up
11040723.Text: You're totally egging me on to uncover even juicier news, aren't you? Gosh, I'm so touched...

11040724.Title: Pat Head
11040724.Text: I once caught someone doing the same thing at a crime scene. This suspect put their hand on their enemy's neck, and then... Snap! I've got a high-definition video here. Wanna watch it with me?

11040726.Title: On battlefield
11040726.Text: Ready? We're going on TV now!

11040733.Title: Upgrade Skill
11040733.Text: Carrying a camera around every day is like a workout routine. Take a look at my mini biceps! Cute, huh?

11050101.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11050101.Text: The time is ripe, so I've come to meet you. My dear... partner in crime.

11050102.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11050102.Text: Power is a shortcut to a goal, but... it's not the only means.

11050103.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11050103.Text: I've already reached the summit. Does the view here... meet your expectations?

11050104.Title: Level Start
11050104.Text: I wonder what surprises await me here.

11050106.Title: Lose Battles
11050106.Text: I've almost forgotten the taste of failure...

11050108.Title: Die in Battles
11050108.Text: I can't... go down like this...

11050109.Title: Greeting
11050109.Text: Dramatic changes are coming our way. What will be your course of action today? I'm intrigued, Chief.

11050110.Title: Conversation 1
11050110.Text: You can treat me as a prisoner, or you can treat me as a partner... Think about it. Money is not the only thing Quinn can offer you. There is much more beyond your imagination.

11050111.Title: Conversation 2
11050111.Text: I like playing chess. On the chessboard, we focus only on each other, racking our brains to corner the other person. What pure pleasure.

11050112.Title: Conversation 3
11050112.Text: I know you're the straightforward type, but don't wear your heart on your sleeve. Try to make your behavior more... unpredictable.

11050113.Title: Special Conversation 1
11050113.Text: The DisCity is such a wonderful place. It's the center of the world, the future of humanity... Is it willing to take me in?

11050114.Title: Special Conversation 2
11050114.Text: Money and status, trust and friendship, even fear and threat... All of these are bargaining chips for loyalty, and I can sustain this trade indefinitely.

11050115.Title: Special Conversation 3
11050115.Text: I'd hate to face you in battle, but... if that day really came, I'd expect nothing less than a satisfying fight from you.

11050116.Title: Full Compliance
11050116.Text: You... are mine. My pawn, my collectible, with whom I share all my secrets. Never betray me... No one can betray me.

11050117.Title: Idle
11050117.Text: Play a game of chess with me... Don't turn me down so quickly. I'll give you a head start this time.

11050118.Title: Annoyed
11050118.Text: If there is something you desire, just tell me honestly. You and I, we don't need to play this game.

11050119.Title: Special Attention
11050119.Text: Are you meeting me as a challenger, a negotiator, or... a close friend? Regardless of your answer, I'm glad.

11050120.Title: Dispatch
11050120.Text: Hmm... Alright, show me what you've been planning.

11050121.Title: Dispatch Complete
11050121.Text: The deed is done. How are you going to pay me for my service? How about... paying with yourself?

11050123.Title: Level Up
11050123.Text: You can never have too much power at your disposal.

11050124.Title: Pat Head
11050124.Text: How nostalgic. I was once treated so tenderly by some too, but... they're all gone from this world now.

11050126.Title: Join Team
11050126.Text: Getting my hands dirty could be fun.

11050133.Title: Upgrade Skill
11050133.Text: Power is a shortcut to a goal, but... it's not the only means.

110501100.Title: Attire Obtained
110501100.Text: Whether the tide ebbs and flows, one can see it all here—Chief, why don't you take a seat and enjoy the view?

110501101.Title: Level Up
110501101.Text: Vacations have always been the privilege of victors. Those who are powerless to control the circumstances cannot afford to relax.

110501102.Title: Greeting
110501102.Text: You have come at just the right time. Now is the perfect time to challenge your destined nemesis.

110501103.Title: Pat Head
110501103.Text: Hmm? I don't take provocations from opponents lightly. As punishment, I'm going to make you... count the waves with me.

110501104.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
110501104.Text: Dark tides churn beneath the sea's deceptively calm surface. Huge tidal waves could hit at any time... However, for me, "danger" is just an afterthought to business.

110501105.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
110501105.Text: Each and every sunrise is unique, yet people arrogantly assume they are always looking at the same sun... Thanks to their stupidity, Quinn is where it is today.

110501106.Title: Ordinary Contact 3
110501106.Text: A toast to the dawn we forged together. Cheers!

110501107.Title: Ordinary Contact 4
110501107.Text: Do you like the neckline of this swimsuit? Don't underestimate it. This silky fabric sheathes not just an alluring beauty, but a femme fatale who never misses a kill.

110501108.Title: Idle
110501108.Text: It's rare to have a chance to be alone with you like this. I'm a bit tipsy. Want to do something other than play chess?

110501109.Title: Special Attention
110501109.Text: Are you watching the sunrise over the sea, or something else? No need to avert your gaze. I don't mind.

110501110.Title: Attire Obtained
110501110.Text: Who are you? The look in your eyes... You weren't sent by my "dear" big brothers or sisters, I presume? So... are you here to seek cooperation with me? All right then, make your pitch.

110501111.Title: Level Up
110501111.Text: No one would complain about having too many trump cards up their sleeves. I'm no exception.

110501112.Title: Greeting
110501112.Text: I hope you've spent your time away honing your skills. I don't want a partner who can't keep up with me intellectually.

110501113.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
110501113.Text: I'm up against the legitimate children in the Campbell family. I have next to nothing going for me in comparison with them. Now, do you still want to be on my side? Hehe, that's interesting. I'm starting to suspect that you have some ulterior motive.

110501114.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
110501114.Text: My father doesn't interfere in our rivalry. It's a Campbell's duty to prove their superiority. "The winner takes it all." That's the only rule of the game.

110501115.Title: Idle
110501115.Text: Are the people around here always this laid-back? Heh, the Campbells never put their feet up and relax at this age.

110501116.Title: Annoyed
110501116.Text: (Sneers) This is why you wanted to cooperate with me, isn't it? That's the oldest trick in the book.

110501117.Title: Special Attention
110501117.Text: All right, stay here with me for a while. I'll break the plan down for you.

11050301.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11050301.Text: I never hesitate to step towards a companion... Take me with you, my little monster.

11050302.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11050302.Text: How I wish to see what has become of my soul now.

11050303.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11050303.Text: Seeing me like this, what do you have on your mind now? I wish to hear it from you...

11050304.Title: Level Start
11050304.Text: I've already seen through you. Save your futile struggle and surrender...

11050305.Title: Win Battles
11050305.Text: Upright Chariot. I knew the victory would be ours.

11050306.Title: Lose Battles
11050306.Text: Well, accidents happen in battles... It can't be helped...

11050307.Title: Ultimate Skill
11050307.Text: I will read your mind and everything else... I will see through your soul!

11050308.Title: Die in Battles
11050308.Text: At long last... my soul is freed...

11050309.Title: Greeting
11050309.Text: According to the crystal, I'll be the first person you'll see today...

11050310.Title: Conversation 1
11050310.Text: The white desert is like a pure dreamland where immaculate flowers bloom...

11050311.Title: Conversation 2
11050311.Text: You seem to be really fond of my ability... Do you want to have your fortune read? Relax, whatever you want to know... I have an answer for you...

11050312.Title: Conversation 3
11050312.Text: Never ask where they're from. Never ask where they'll go. Those are my rules of fortune-telling... Well, unless I answer those questions first...

11050313.Title: Special Conversation 1
11050313.Text: The souls from the Black Ring possess true and pure beauty. They are not ugly at all. On the contrary, those humans who confine themselves... don't you think they look more ridiculous?

11050314.Title: Special Conversation 2
11050314.Text: I hear that you're looking into my past? Why don't you just ask me? Hmm... Which version do you want to hear?

11050315.Title: Special Conversation 3
11050315.Text: I have visited the realm of truth in my dreams. I hope that... one day, you will appear there as well.

11050316.Title: Full Compliance
11050316.Text: Now, I can take off all my disguises and show you my truest self... Hmm, what is it? All I did was lose a few pieces of clothing, are you shy?

11050317.Title: Idle
11050317.Text: Shh... I'm communicating with the souls.

11050318.Title: Annoyed
11050318.Text: Are you satisfied with physical touch alone? Why don't you let me teach you... how to embrace each other's soul?

11050319.Title: Special Attention
11050319.Text: You give me so much attention... Wanna run away with me, my dear little monster?

11050320.Title: Dispatch
11050320.Text: Hmm, is it the land of truth and purity before us?

11050321.Title: Dispatch Complete
11050321.Text: I feel most at ease around you.

11050323.Title: Level Up
11050323.Text: The true form of the soul is so elusive, yet so fascinating...

11050324.Title: Pat Head
11050324.Text: Ha, that's exactly how those novice fortune-tellers touch the crystal ball.

11050326.Title: Join Team
11050326.Text: Oh, those who are lost... Get in line if you want to have your fortune read...

11050328.Title: Received Order
11050328.Text: Aye... Since it's coming from you...

11050333.Title: Upgrade Skill
11050333.Text: How I wish to see what has become of my soul now.

110503100.Title: Attire Obtained
110503100.Text: Finder of the legendary magic lamp of WhiteSands, you've summoned me. As a reward, I can grant you a wish.

110503101.Title: Level Up
110503101.Text: These kitties quite enjoy your petting.

110503102.Title: Greeting
110503102.Text: Poor lamb, have you lost your way in the desert? Fret not... Just follow me.

110503103.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
110503103.Text: Those who share the water of life under WhiteSands' moon will meet again on the other side. Emm... You gaze... Do you want to raise a glass with me?

110503104.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
110503104.Text: Charming her prey with her tame and lovely appearance. Luring them with their desires into her trap. Taking a fatal bite into the veins... Hmm? I'm only talking about... this adorable sand cat.

110503105.Title: Idle
110503105.Text: How many nights have passed already?

110503106.Title: Annoyed
110503106.Text: A heedless stroke at the cat's tail may come with consequences...

110503107.Title: Special Attention
110503107.Text: As long as you stay by my side forever, I can grant you... any wish.

11050401.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11050401.Text: The mission has been judged as a success! Hero, time to celebrate. You can take me away now.

11050402.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11050402.Text: Aha, that's more like it! This is what the "Game Master" deserves!

11050403.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11050403.Text: From now on, I shall dictate the rules of the game!

11050404.Title: Level Start
11050404.Text: The game has begun! Come pick out a way to change your fate!

11050405.Title: Win Battles
11050405.Text: Congratulations on clearing the level! Heroes, go claim your bounty!

11050406.Title: Lose Battles
11050406.Text: Ouch... It hurts... I knew that team would be hard to lead...

11050409.Title: Greeting
11050409.Text: The forces of darkness are about to descend upon the world... Hero, it's time to embark on your journey!

11050410.Title: Conversation 1
11050410.Text: Have no fear! Tell me what you want to do next.

11050411.Title: Conversation 2
11050411.Text: Everything "interesting" in this world comes from "imagination," so you don't need to restrain yourself in front of me. Do you understand?

11050412.Title: Conversation 3
11050412.Text: Not everyone can complete my games... But you look like someone with potential. Want to try it out?

11050413.Title: Special Conversation 1
11050413.Text: "Good," "neutral," and "evil"... Which one do you think I am? Or rather, which one do you want me to be?

11050414.Title: Special Conversation 2
11050414.Text: They all say that dragons are selfish and greedy, but I think... It's just because no one dares to become close with them...

11050415.Title: Special Conversation 3
11050415.Text: As long as you hold a dragon-slaying gun in your hand, it's a symbol of justice, even if the gun is broken. So... what are you going to do to an evil dragon like me?

11050416.Title: Full Compliance
11050416.Text: I'm addicted to dark and thrilling imagination, yet I fear the frosty loneliness there... Thank you for defeating me... Thank you, for being by my side.

11050417.Title: Idle
11050417.Text: Sometimes, the "world" wants to take a break, too... Let's get some rest.

11050418.Title: Annoyed
11050418.Text: You acted without approval... This world will punish you.

11050419.Title: Special Attention
11050419.Text: Are the treasures you seek in my eyes?

11050421.Title: Dispatch Complete
11050421.Text: I got a lot of items! Want to see what they are? As long as I'm here, nothing bad will happen.

11050423.Title: Level Up
11050423.Text: It's only fun when you have trade-offs for your base attributes.

11050424.Title: Pat Head
11050424.Text: You like my horn, too? Let me tell you about it! It was during a harsh, cold winter... Hey! Where are you going?

11050425.Title: On battlefield
11050425.Text: I'll show you a good game.

11050426.Title: Danger!
11050426.Text: Danger lies ahead. If you need to continue onwards, please roll the dice.

11050432.Title: N/A
11050432.Text: Aha, that's more like it! This is what the "Game Master" deserves!

110504100.Title: Attire Obtained
110504100.Text: As night falls, ghostly lanterns flicker to life. The ancient castle of the dragon will reopen its dusty gates, beckoning the chosen warriors with its secrets and treasures... Hehe, how's that? Immersive enough?

110504101.Title: Level Up
110504101.Text: Gaze from the Devil takes effect, Luck +1!

110504102.Title: Greeting
110504102.Text: The clock has struck midnight. No time to dawdle! Embark on a brand new adventure alongside the dark demon from the Land of Oblivion! Uh-huh, that means me, your guide!

110504103.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
110504103.Text: These pumpkins are too cute? Umm, maybe they do look a little... Hold on! The game we're playing today is horror themed! They are obviously appalling! How can they be cute!

110504104.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
110504104.Text: Hmm? Candy? D-don't think you can buy me off with a measly two pieces of candy! I'm a demon, and demons are meant to cause trouble! You know that, right?

110504105.Title: Idle
110504105.Text: Dear traveler, please don't let your guard down. The rocky path is full of temptations and traps, and the red-winged demon will eventually reveal her dragon's claws and teeth.

110504106.Title: Annoyed
110504106.Text: Ahh! Don't pull my tail! Acting without permission is not allowed! Not even to your guide! ...What kind of punishment you'll face, you ask? Hmph, take... a... guess?

110504107.Title: Special Attention
110504107.Text: What are you looking at me for? Hurry up! Huh? You're not really scared, are you? Relax, if you're in any danger, I'll make an exception and provide you with a little extra help... but don't tell anyone about this!

11050501.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11050501.Text: Hey, hey, hey, I'm just a humble writer. What have I done that could get me arrested? Or... did I expose your secret?

11050502.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11050502.Text: Thanks for coming. I'll write an excellent story this time.

11050503.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11050503.Text: Hmm, this is a moment that will make history.

11050504.Title: Level Start
11050504.Text: Hopefully I'll find some interesting news material.

11050505.Title: Win Battles
11050505.Text: MBCC's Sinners Achieve Overwhelming Victory! That's a nice headline, isn't it?

11050506.Title: Lose Battles
11050506.Text: Cough... Just as tough as some interviewees I've dealt with in the past...

11050508.Title: Die in Battles
11050508.Text: Haha... Will my death... be remembered...?

11050509.Title: Greeting
11050509.Text: Huh? I'm not pulling an all-nighter to write. I'm staying up so I can see you as soon as you come.

11050510.Title: Conversation 1
11050510.Text: My ghostwriting fees are cheap. Tell me, what do you want me to write? Gossip? Celebrity scandals? Or perhaps... a love poem?

11050511.Title: Conversation 2
11050511.Text: A wacko? You know, most of us poets are a bit wacky.

11050512.Title: Conversation 3
11050512.Text: It's just an article. Does it really matter whether it's true or not? Anyway... another spill of ink won't make a difference to Syndicate.

11050513.Title: Special Conversation 1
11050513.Text: I know about every change here every day. Do you know what it's falling into now? Take a guess?

11050514.Title: Special Conversation 2
11050514.Text: I don't write stories about missing dogs and cats. I want to write about... the MBCC's chief being lovesick and not leave my tiny newspaper office!

11050515.Title: Special Conversation 3
11050515.Text: Words have a natural power in them. Their every pulse becomes my resistance against this world.

11050516.Title: Full Compliance
11050516.Text: I record everything in Syndicate with a quill. Obviously, when you came to me... Oh, excuse me. I wanted to describe it with a line of poetry, but I don't quite have it. You'll have my sincerity, at least.

11050517.Title: Idle
11050517.Text: What a boring day. It's the best time to present a limerick to the world.

11050518.Title: Annoyed
11050518.Text: Is this some new way to make me write faster? In that case, I'm not taking that job from you!

11050519.Title: Special Attention
11050519.Text: It seems like you care a lot about me! Are you worried about your image in my story? Relax, it's perfect.

11050520.Title: Dispatch
11050520.Text: I used to love covering news outdoors, until I got shot in the knee...

11050521.Title: Dispatch Complete
11050521.Text: I'm exhausted... But I've found some useful material. After all, something interesting is always happening somewhere in the world.

11050523.Title: Level Up
11050523.Text: Raven's happy. I-I...I mean the bird.

11050524.Title: Pat Head
11050524.Text: That's not a scar... It's my medal, my medal for becoming a wacko.

11050525.Title: On battlefield
11050525.Text: Who put a glass and roses on my grave?

11050527.Title: Received Order
11050527.Text: You sure know how to order me around.

11050532.Title: N/A
11050532.Text: Thanks for coming. I'll write an excellent story this time.

110505100.Title: Attire Obtained
110505100.Text: Oh my, are you the end of my thousand-year-long waiting, the observer who adores me? Want my autograph?

110505101.Title: Level Up
110505101.Text: Tell me, what secrets do you want to hear?

110505102.Title: Greeting
110505102.Text: Thirsty for the future of this world or the Paramartha of past history? Come, let me take you on a quest. Hmmm, where did the previous owner put that book...? Huh? The previous? Haha... Did I say "previous owner"? You must've heard me wrong... Haha.

110505103.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
110505103.Text: When in trouble, come to the library. It has the answers to all.

110505104.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
110505104.Text: Don't be surprised if you see a crow reading here. It could be the previous owner returning to patrol her treasures.

110505105.Title: Idle
110505105.Text: The rules dictate that I can only answer the questions that this library has answers to, and you can only ask 3 questions each turn, so query after careful thought.

110505106.Title: Annoyed
110505106.Text: Hey hey hey, this is a dress made by the rules of the world! You... Tsk, Etti rented this dress for me. It's very expensive. Be careful not to tear it!

110505107.Title: Special Attention
110505107.Text: Are you curious about who I am? Do I look like someone you are very familiar with?

11050601.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11050601.Text: Hello, wandering souls. Come and pick up this "Call at 3 AM." Wandering around on a lightless night, are you trying to say something to me?

11050602.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11050602.Text: The midnight chime sounded. Come, stay with me...

11050603.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11050603.Text: I will turn everything you give me into a cage that binds you...!

11050604.Title: Level Start
11050604.Text: The phone is ringing, my dear. I'm right behind you...

11050606.Title: Lose Battles
11050606.Text: The phone keeps ringing non-stop... Gimme a break...

11050609.Title: Greeting
11050609.Text: What story will you share with me today?

11050610.Title: Conversation 1
11050610.Text: If you can't sleep, why not tune in to my broadcast, "Call at 3 AM". I hope it can bring some gentleness into your night.

11050611.Title: Conversation 2
11050611.Text: People always look for something they desire, something that soothe them in me. How sad... Ah, but, I'm looking forward to you being a guest on my show.

11050612.Title: Conversation 3
11050612.Text: I can take all the emotions others flood me with, and grind them with my mind and heart into a smiling voice on the airwaves.

11050613.Title: Special Conversation 1
11050613.Text: Humans are such amazing creatures. After that electrifying moment of locking eyes, you and I no longer look the same for each other.

11050614.Title: Special Conversation 2
11050614.Text: If it weren't for all those rumors and legends, I could read poems or tell a story to the sound of the midnight rain... then greet the first ray of dawn after a rainy night...

11050615.Title: Special Conversation 3
11050615.Text: "Her silhouette slowly approaches you from behind, envelops you, and finally... embraces you...!" Oops, did I startle you? Don't be scared... it's just me.

11050616.Title: Full Compliance
11050616.Text: My views have been overturned, and my world has been changed, but I know... this is not misfortune. Thank you for becoming the fissure in this world to free me from my shackles...

11050617.Title: Idle
11050617.Text: A Little Poem, line 27: "If the world could be changed by dreaming, then I would sleep in this dream and never wake up, until the joyous world of my imagination has been created."

11050618.Title: Annoyed
11050618.Text: You want me to stay with you this much...? Don't worry... I'll call you tonight.

11050619.Title: Special Attention
11050619.Text: Don't be so nervous. I can stay on the line with you. You just continue with what you're doing, and I'll be here with you. If you still feel ill at ease... how about I sing a song for you?

11050620.Title: Dispatch
11050620.Text: Let me see, what's different about your world.

11050621.Title: Dispatch Complete
11050621.Text: This is all that I can give you.

11050623.Title: Level Up
11050623.Text: Come, come closer... a little bit more.

11050624.Title: Pat Head
11050624.Text: Do you want to know how much I've missed you?

11050625.Title: On battlefield
11050625.Text: The phone is ringing, my dear.

11050627.Title: Received Order
11050627.Text: All right, I will follow your orders.

11050632.Title: Upgrade Skill
11050632.Text: The midnight chime sounded. Come, stay with me...

110506100.Title: Attire Obtained
110506100.Text: You finally woke up! How do you feel right now? Still dizzy or nauseous? Thank goodness you're all right. You passed out from heatstroke. I was scared out of my wits... Luckily, I was close by, so I rushed to bring you back to rest.

110506101.Title: Level Up
110506101.Text: Thanks for the cold drink. Let's cool off together. Cheers!

110506102.Title: Greeting
110506102.Text: If you're still feeling unwell, how about I keep you company and talk to you for a while? My voice might make you feel better.

110506103.Title: Pat Head
110506103.Text: Are you worried I might come down with heatstroke too? Hehe... don't worry about me. I'll be fine.

110506104.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
110506104.Text: Have you ever heard of the "inside-out cooling method"? It's said that listening to creepy stories is a good way to cool down in summer. Let's give it a go. Well, I happen to have a story about this very beach. It's always bustling during daytime, but when night falls, strange things happen. Just the other night, a staff member was patrolling the grounds when...

110506105.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
110506105.Text: Don't stray from the safe area while you're in the water, and remember to do a proper warm-up before going in for a dip. See those guys over there? Like you did earlier, they jumped into the water without warming up first and ended up with cramps in their legs. The other lifeguards are rescuing them now...

110506106.Title: Ordinary Contact 3
110506106.Text: Still feeling hot? Okay, this towel may help. I've soaked it in cold water and wrung it out. Here, let me wipe your forehead and neck to cool you down... Feeling better now?

110506107.Title: Ordinary Contact 4
110506107.Text: No. You're not fully recovered yet, so it's not a good idea for you to go back in the water, not even with a lifebuoy. If you're feeling bored, why don't you play with this little octopus plushie? You'll find it very satisfying to squeeze it.

110506108.Title: Idle
110506108.Text: Even though you can't go in the water for now, it's still nice to just lie here under a parasol, watching the clouds drift by, feeling the breeze on your cheeks, and listening to the waves, don't you think?

110506109.Title: Special Attention
110506109.Text: Why do you keep staring at me? You're at the seaside. Shouldn't you be enjoying the sea view? Well, if you really want to talk with me some more, we can take a walk along the beach after my shift. All right then, wait for my call.

11050701.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11050701.Text: You... It's you?! You saw the firelight, didn't you? I knew you would. Hehe, I've been waiting for you... for so long.

11050702.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11050702.Text: I see it... the fire that will be lit.

11050703.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11050703.Text: I... am alight... Excellent! They can finally come back...

11050704.Title: Level Start
11050704.Text: It's too dark... I'll start a fire here.

11050706.Title: Lose Battles
11050706.Text: D-don't come any closer... Go away!

11050707.Title: Ultimate Skill
11050707.Text: This is the guidance of the flames!

11050709.Title: Greeting
11050709.Text: You're back... Did you find them? No...? Just asking; don't be nervous. At least, I'm still here...

11050710.Title: Conversation 1
11050710.Text: My eyes are blind to what you see, but they see what you cannot... They see the rising red moon, they see the descending illusion... If you wish to get out of here alive, you must follow my guidance. Do you hear me?

11050711.Title: Conversation 2
11050711.Text: The voice I heard... told me to light the torch. It said, it's the only way to bring you guys back... It didn't lie to me; not completely, at least. You came back...

11050712.Title: Conversation 3
11050712.Text: The people here... they're always saying bizarre things that make no sense to me... Can you understand them...? W-what do they want? You'll protect me, right?

11050713.Title: Special Conversation 1
11050713.Text: No one has ever treated me this way... Why? Why did you guys take me in when you know nothing about me? And you're sharing your food with me, protecting me, even though you clearly don't believe what I've told you...

11050714.Title: Special Conversation 2
11050714.Text: I also hate... that supreme being... But the supreme being does exist, just up ahead, in the direction you're heading. Why... Why don't you guys believe me?

11050715.Title: Special Conversation 3
11050715.Text: Please don't go any further... That's a trap. If you do, the darkness will consume every one of you. I know you don't want to trust the words of a liar... but this time I'm really telling the truth...

11050716.Title: Full Compliance
11050716.Text: It's all your fault... Because of you, I forgot how to survive on my own... Being left alone in a place like that was terrifying... Stay with me. Don't leave me again. I don't want to be left alone anymore...

11050717.Title: Idle
11050717.Text: Shh! Don't make a sound! The supreme being is watching us... I can sense it.

11050719.Title: Special Attention
11050719.Text: Once again, you ventured into the darkness and found me. I knew you would; it was predestined. I knew that no matter how long it took, you would find your way back to me...

11050720.Title: Dispatch
11050720.Text: This is the supreme being's will too...

11050724.Title: Pat Head
11050724.Text: Stop...! You must not... defile the priestess!

11050726.Title: On battlefield
11050726.Text: There is nothing to fear. I'm here to show you the way...

11050730.Title: Normal Attack
11050730.Text: A sound of she swinging her torch.

11050733.Title: Upgrade Skill
11050733.Text: I see it... the fire that will be lit.

11060101.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11060101.Text: You've woken me from reverie. I should thank you, but... where else does a dancer without a stage belong?

11060102.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11060102.Text: It is my destiny to comfort more souls with this power. I won't run away from it anymore.

11060103.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11060103.Text: This is not yet the end. Until my life burns out, my dance will go on.

11060104.Title: Level Start
11060104.Text: The battered soul is singing, leading the way for us.

11060105.Title: Win Battles
11060105.Text: The revelry is over. Rest in peace, I will take you home.

11060106.Title: Lose Battles
11060106.Text: The music ends, the dance stops, the crowd vanishes...

11060109.Title: Greeting
11060109.Text: Whenever I'm lost in reverie, you'll show up and pull me back to reality... Hello, Chief. Welcome back.

11060110.Title: Conversation 1
11060110.Text: With the purest admiration for art in the audience, and the utter beauty in the world to interpret, I do not feel lonely.

11060111.Title: Conversation 2
11060111.Text: Insatiable desire, a siege by Corruptors, and a dark prison cell, which one is real imprisonment?

11060112.Title: Conversation 3
11060112.Text: The body can speak for me, expressing gratitude, joy, struggle, and pain... Unfortunately, not everyone can understand it.

11060113.Title: Special Conversation 1
11060113.Text: Ugly monsters? Please don't speak of them like that. Those beings known as Corruptors are my most loyal audience.

11060114.Title: Special Conversation 2
11060114.Text: The center of a Black Ring is like the depths of the sea. In a place so serene, you can listen to your heart clearly.

11060115.Title: Special Conversation 3
11060115.Text: A brutal beast will not know how to love, so... please never turn into one.

11060116.Title: Full Compliance
11060116.Text: Certain emotions can only be expressed through dance. Come, give me your hand, follow my tempo... Can you... feel it, Chief?

11060117.Title: Idle
11060117.Text: Shh... Listen, that's the sound of your heart. Lub dub, lub dub... It's dancing too.

11060118.Title: Annoyed
11060118.Text: Are you... lonely? It's okay. I don't like to be touched by others, but you're the exception.

11060119.Title: Special Attention
11060119.Text: Such clear eyes... It must be wonderful to dance to the gaze from such a pair of eyes.

11060120.Title: Dispatch
11060120.Text: The sound of the wind... is a dance gifted to us by nature.

11060121.Title: Dispatch Complete
11060121.Text: I'm back. It was... a good experience.

11060123.Title: Level Up
11060123.Text: I feel... light as a feather?

11060124.Title: Pat Head
11060124.Text: Hmm? Would you like to... dance with me?

11060126.Title: Join Team
11060126.Text: I can hear it... the prelude of the dance...

11060133.Title: Upgrade Skill
11060133.Text: It is my destiny to comfort more souls with this power. I won't run away from it anymore.

110601100.Title: Attire Obtained
110601100.Text: Swaying bells and heavy drumbeats... Come, let's dance. Let's dance on this snowy night!

110601102.Title: Greeting
110601102.Text: Every day without dance is a letdown to life. So... Come and dance with me, will you, Chief?

110601103.Title: Pat Head
110601103.Text: Hmm...? This is an updo I specifically did for this dance. Do you... like it?

110601104.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
110601104.Text: The steps, the emotions, the body, the mind... Each element is essential. It's not merely a dance, but also a hymn to the soul.

110601105.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
110601105.Text: The strong emotions in this dance complement the atmosphere of the festival perfectly... Can everyone feel it?

110601106.Title: Ordinary Contact 3
110601106.Text: It's been a long time since I last saw such pure smiles after a performance. It truly feels wonderful...

110601107.Title: Ordinary Contact 4
110601107.Text: How I wish time could stop at this moment tonight forever... Hmm... I'm indeed very greedy.

110601108.Title: Idle
110601108.Text: I was touched by the power and generosity in this dance during the practices. May all your pain and unhappiness be gone after watching this dance.

110601109.Title: Special Attention
110601109.Text: Now that you're looking at me, please don't turn your gaze away. I will deliver my emotions to you through my dance.

110601110.Title: Attire Obtained
110601110.Text: Painful but elegant, each feather has its own story. This is a dance dedicated to you and you alone...

110601111.Title: Level Up
110601111.Text: Let's spread our wings to our heart's content.

110601112.Title: Greeting
110601112.Text: Chief, this dance is very difficult. Those without proper training should not try the jumps and twirls.

110601113.Title: Pat Head
110601113.Text: You still want to try it...? Hmm, the final scene where I get lifted up... I think you can manage it.

110601114.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
110601114.Text: Black and white, light and darkness... are but two sides of the same coin. Just like Odette and Odile, whom I portray. In the prince's eyes, they've always been the same person.

110601115.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
110601115.Text: The scattered black feathers push the entire performance to its climax. Beauty and destruction are only a step away. This is the fate of beauty.

110601116.Title: Ordinary Contact 3
110601116.Text: Chief, who do you think I resemble more now? The innocent Swan Princess Odette, or the unbridled Black Swan Odile?

110601117.Title: Ordinary Contact 4
110601117.Text: Back then, people didn't want to see me portray Odile. They wanted to see absolute joy and beauty from me. I was more like the perfect white swan in their hearts, rather than a dancer...

110601118.Title: Idle
110601118.Text: Everyone knows that the soul and biggest challenge of this dance is Odile's thirty-two consecutive fouettés. Yet under your gaze, I completed it effortlessly...

110601119.Title: Special Attention
110601119.Text: How I wish we could be enveloped by music and dance, and savor this moment in bliss and freedom, forever.

11060201.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11060201.Text: Keep going ahead and you'll see the Gate of Hell. Are you here to welcome me, or to bid farewell to me?

11060202.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11060202.Text: A good piece of work needs to be polished and refined carefully.

11060203.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11060203.Text: The present me is finally able to breathe life into them...

11060204.Title: Level Start
11060204.Text: There, there. It's normal to get scared...

11060205.Title: Win Battles
11060205.Text: The contorted faces and terrified screams are truly irresistible.

11060209.Title: Greeting
11060209.Text: Hello, Chief. Did you have fun last night?

11060210.Title: Conversation 1
11060210.Text: I've always been devoted to nature, but this world is no different than hell to me.

11060211.Title: Conversation 2
11060211.Text: Artist? Do I deserve this title in your opinion?

11060212.Title: Conversation 3
11060212.Text: Only when you're most frightened will you follow your most primal instincts... That's the true colors of humans.

11060213.Title: Special Conversation 1
11060213.Text: Sculpture is not a superficial art. It's a form of creation that touches bones and flesh and forms the shape of life.

11060214.Title: Special Conversation 2
11060214.Text: My chisel and hammer will surely carve through those hypocritical illusions and subvert everything!

11060215.Title: Special Conversation 3
11060215.Text: If I could... I wish to frame your terrified face just for myself to admire... Haha, don't be scared, it's only an idea.

11060216.Title: Full Compliance
11060216.Text: If you call me the witch of the night, then don't blame me for peeking into your heart. I wish to see life that erupts from the inside out. It will germinate, grow, and bloom into a flower named love...

11060217.Title: Idle
11060217.Text: Since I'm free... Why don't I carve a few flowers on these ugly iron bars?

11060218.Title: Annoyed
11060218.Text: Alright, I've memorized it. I'll carve holes on you later according to the order of your touches just now.

11060219.Title: Special Attention
11060219.Text: Okay, okay. You're already eye-catching enough... What? You won't believe me unless I actually take out my eyeballs and give them to you?

11060220.Title: Dispatch
11060220.Text: Go out to find inspiration? Can I come back before the evening?

11060221.Title: Dispatch Complete
11060221.Text: I've found my inspiration. Now, let the Witching Hour begin.

11060224.Title: Pat Head
11060224.Text: What? Do you want to nurture some artsy vibe as well?

11060225.Title: On battlefield
11060225.Text: Do you want a brand from me?

11060232.Title: Upgrade Skill
11060232.Text: A good piece of work needs to be polished and refined carefully.

110602100.Title: Attire Obtained
110602100.Text: Welcome to the sculptor's nest, my most secret garden. Herein lies fears and struggles, distortions and pain... as well as boundless love.

110602101.Title: Level Up
110602101.Text: With a flash of lightning and a speeding heart, Venus is born from my hands.

110602102.Title: Greeting
110602102.Text: As soon as I prayed to the sculpture to meet you, you appeared before my eyes. Do I have a unique power of making wishes come true?

110602103.Title: Pat Head
110602103.Text: Did the artist make the hat special, or did the hat become the symbol of the artist?

110602104.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
110602104.Text: It's the greatest joy to carve out the imagination with my own hands.

110602105.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
110602105.Text: Fix your gaze on the sculptures. If you can't look fear in the eye, you might get crushed by it...

110602106.Title: Ordinary Contact 3
110602106.Text: For convenience's sake, I added many practical little pockets on my clothes to hold carving tools.

110602107.Title: Ordinary Contact 4
110602107.Text: Why is this work unfinished? Hehe... Maybe "she" needs someone who loves "her" to make up for the missing half of her heart...

110602108.Title: Idle
110602108.Text: Thump, thump, thump... You hear that? I'm sculpting heartbeats.

110602109.Title: Special Attention
110602109.Text: I can't work properly if you keep staring at me like this... Hmm? Do you want to model for me or something?

110602110.Title: Attire Obtained
110602110.Text: The jade emits warm haze, its body transparent. Your emotions and thoughts live through the carved jade. What do you seek from me, young carver?

110602111.Title: Level Up
110602111.Text: You're developing an eye for good rough stones. Keep it up~

110602112.Title: Greeting
110602112.Text: Let's see. What kind of jade piece do you want to carve today?

110602113.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
110602113.Text: Raw jade born under the moon is always hidden in rubble. Ordinary carvers often overlook its true value. Will you become a skilled carver with such acumen?

110602114.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
