110602114.Text: A gentleman's character is often compared to the quality of jade. People wear limpid jade accessories to demonstrate their virtue and good manners... Hmm, judging by your demeanor and skills, you'll be a piece of pure jade.

110602115.Title: Idle
110602115.Text: These discarded raw stones are good for carving a few simple accessories to ease this boredom.

110602116.Title: Annoyed
110602116.Text: Never pass jade with your hands. I won't remind you again.

110602117.Title: Special Attention
110602117.Text: Have you decided? What kind of ornament do you want me to carve this jade into?

11060301.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11060301.Text: I'm so glad that you've brought me to this grand feast. Ah... I can smell an intoxicating sweet aroma in every corner!

11060302.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11060302.Text: That's not enough to satisfy me...

11060303.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11060303.Text: If it's for the pursuit of the ultimate savor, I am willing to be dined on.

11060307.Title: Ultimate Skill
11060307.Text: I smell the sweet fragrance of souls!

11060308.Title: Die in Battles
11060308.Text: Ha... Hahaha... Tear it up, gobble it down...

11060309.Title: Greeting
11060309.Text: The green fairy flew by. First, I see reality, then fear, and at last... I see you.

11060310.Title: Conversation 1
11060310.Text: Eating is not simply an act of "swallowing". Once you learn how to "savor" a dish, it'll turn into a wonderful experience. So, face your desire for food honestly and satisfy it the best you can!

11060311.Title: Conversation 2
11060311.Text: I've acquired many extremely rare ingredients before. Some of them cost as much as a house, but still... none could compare to those sweet grapes I've once had.

11060312.Title: Conversation 3
11060312.Text: When you were born into a high position, everything you see is covered in a blurry haze. But if you search hard enough, you may just find those souls who glitter brilliantly.

11060313.Title: Special Conversation 1
11060313.Text: I've always had an overly obsessive and passionate preference for things that can satisfy my taste, and it so happens that my status can sate my willful obsession.

11060314.Title: Special Conversation 2
11060314.Text: Honorable humans give off a fascinating, irresistible aroma... They're like great black grapes that ferment into ruby-hued wine, so tempting for my palate.

11060315.Title: Special Conversation 3
11060315.Text: Warm juice exploding on the tip of the tongue, caressing the mouth, sliding down the throat into the stomach... This is how you make me feel. I'm sorry... It looks like simply staying by your side no longer satisfies me. I wish... we could truly become one.

11060316.Title: Full Compliance
11060316.Text: Your soul is a mix of dreams and reality, art and life. Before it matures, I'm willing to bear the searing hunger and tame the urge to kiss your lip. Until this plump, mouth-watering fruit blooms before my eyes and offers itself to me...

11060317.Title: Idle
11060317.Text: Sigh... I haven't got much of an appetite.

11060318.Title: Annoyed
11060318.Text: The cunning visitor from the abyss has been waiting to prey on those... dishonest beings.

11060319.Title: Special Attention
11060319.Text: You seem to be looking forward to dining with me too, don't you?

11060320.Title: Dispatch
11060320.Text: Do I need to... do it myself?

11060324.Title: Pat Head
11060324.Text: For some ingredients, this part, indeed, is the most flavorful. Do you think so?

11060325.Title: On battlefield
11060325.Text: Thank you for your warm invitation.

11060332.Title: Upgrade Skill
11060332.Text: That's not enough to satisfy me...

110603100.Title: Attire Obtained
110603100.Text: Welcome to the paradise of bliss and abundance. Only here can your unique and rich soul be nourished... Come, won't you share a drink with me?

110603101.Title: Level Up
110603101.Text: Fruity and full-bodied... Truly a fine wine.

110603102.Title: Greeting
110603102.Text: Earth-sprung honey, horn-poured raindrop, and Limnio kissed by thunder, blended into this cup's swirling ambrosial nectar... Drink, and share with me this unparalleled pleasure.

110603103.Title: Pat Head
110603103.Text: Hehe, don't worry, I'm still sober. One must know their limits to enjoy this light-headed rapture...

110603104.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
110603104.Text: Why hesitate? If you are still tethered by worldly troubles, why not take some of this adorable fruit? It will make you forget all your sorrows and burdens... You will certainly love it.

110603105.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
110603105.Text: No one can resist pleasure. Slowly, they will be marinated in joy and mature in indulgence... until every blood vessel is flowing with the fruity fragrance. A different kind of decadent and luxurious taste...

110603106.Title: Ordinary Contact 3
110603106.Text: Do you also think it's lacking something? Indeed, the finest drink demands the most exquisite ingredient for the pinnacle of sensory delight. Like a soul as sharp and unwavering as yours...

110603107.Title: Ordinary Contact 4
110603107.Text: Compared to humans, animals have much simpler desires. This adorable one here knows exactly what it wants and longs for nothing more. Human desires, however, are complex and insatiable... Is this evolution or degeneration?

110603108.Title: Idle
110603108.Text: Relax, there is no rush. Neither hunger nor thirst exist here. You may take your time to savor every detail before making your decision. Unlike the harsh mortal world... everything here is forgiving, especially to you.

110603109.Title: Special Attention
110603109.Text: Are you waiting for me to do it? I see... My warmth and breath are your perfect accompaniment for this wine and fruit.

11060401.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11060401.Text: Feel honored I'm willing to walk into this place. I'd like to have a little garden outside my room. Thanks.

11060402.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11060402.Text: I recognize your hard work, my child.

11060404.Title: Level Start
11060404.Text: Who will bloom under my sword today?

11060405.Title: Victory
11060405.Text: The splash of petals is incomparably gorgeous.

11060406.Title: Lose Battles
11060406.Text: I'll spare your life for now...

11060407.Title: Ultimate Skill
11060407.Text: Bloom here, till the day you wither!

11060408.Title: Die in Battles
11060408.Text: This will be... the grandest flower shower...

11060409.Title: Greeting
11060409.Text: I hope we're both free from work today, so we can stay here... and rest a whole day...

11060410.Title: Conversation 1
11060410.Text: I cherish and care for every flower in the Garden. I hope my nurture will give them leaves sharp enough to cut through hardships, so their souls can bloom into the most beautiful flowers...

11060411.Title: Conversation 2
11060411.Text: Rules can't confine the wish to bloom. A sprout born in the dark will eventually break them into pieces.

11060412.Title: Conversation 3
11060412.Text: Working for pay is only the most basic way of life. The client gains convenience while I gain happiness. I enjoy my life much better than those who hustle for unrealistic, empty goals.

11060413.Title: Special Conversation 1
11060413.Text: Those who like flowers pick them. Those who love flowers water them... But I won't mind if you pick me and take me home.

11060414.Title: Special Conversation 2
11060414.Text: Don't give me those contrived moral lessons. In this world, nothing means more than the most simple words "I want to."

11060415.Title: Special Conversation 3
11060415.Text: A kind and lovely lady like me will wash the dirt off those stems and nurture them properly, so they can be reborn as exquisite flowers in their next lives... Oh, how admirable am I!

11060416.Title: Full Compliance
11060416.Text: Flowers in bloom wither in the end. When the day comes, I long to rest in the immortal, deep-blue abyss of yours... May the poppies bloom on your chest like a scarlet blaze... The mark of my genuine affection...

11060417.Title: Idle
11060417.Text: Touched by no one. Loved by no one. Though tortured by loneliness, it'll bloom even more brightly.

11060418.Title: Annoyed
11060418.Text: Don't think you can get away with anything just because of my affection for you. Or else... You'll be the next to lie in the soil of my garden.

11060419.Title: Special Attention
11060419.Text: Sigh... I know, I'm pretty, that's why you can't keep your eyes off me.

11060420.Title: Dispatch
11060420.Text: I can't pick up my jacket. Can you put it on me, please?

11060421.Title: Dispatch Complete
11060421.Text: Ask someone else to do it next time. It's so not for me.

11060423.Title: Level Up
11060423.Text: Look at me. Am I not good enough for you?

11060424.Title: Pat Head
11060424.Text: Like this flower? Or... You wanna see how it got tinted red?

11060426.Title: On battlefield
11060426.Text: Flowers will bloom wherever I go.

11060428.Title: Received Order
11060428.Text: Are you giving orders to me?

11060433.Title: Upgrade Skill
11060433.Text: I recognize your hard work, my child.

110604100.Title: Attire Obtained
110604100.Text: The moment I opened my eyes, I saw you running toward me. I know that it's your constant watch that has made this grand blossom special.

110604102.Title: Greeting
110604102.Text: I haven't seen you for a while, but why are you suddenly so clingy like my flowers? Well, I'm perfectly fine! See? The breath of life you gave me will last long.

110604103.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
110604103.Text: The place that used to be a prison for me has now become a garden in full bloom. Flowers aren't a symbol of my death, but of my rebirth.

110604104.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
110604104.Text: Don't be all gloomy in my garden. You want to upset my flowers too? Rest assured. I won't leave without saying goodbye again.

110604105.Title: Idle
110604105.Text: I always thought I could take on the world on my own, but after everything I've been through, I feel that... it's a comfort to have you all by my side.

110604106.Title: Annoyed
110604106.Text: Oh? You'd like to have a go? Be my guest. But... I'm afraid I'll have to take your lap as my new seat.

110604107.Title: Special Attention
110604107.Text: The new garden has many rare flowering plants that can't be found even in DisCity, like purple water lilies, dancing-lady orchids... Hmm? You only want to see poppies? Well, in that case, you can just look at me.

11060501.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11060501.Text: Is this the Minos Bureau of Crisis Control? This time, will the burden named "Eve" be introduced to a different story?

11060502.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11060502.Text: No miracles will happen to me anymore, right?

11060503.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11060503.Text: If even a broken body can push beyond its limits, what about a shredded photo? Why can't it be mended then...

11060504.Title: Level Start
11060504.Text: Why bring me along? I'll only be a burden to everyone.

11060509.Title: Greeting
11060509.Text: You're here too... Don't mind me, I'm just looking for a peaceful place to stay.

11060510.Title: Conversation 1
11060510.Text: My wheelchair always makes me "set foot" in faraway places when I'm unaware... It's probably searching for a place called "home".

11060511.Title: Conversation 2
11060511.Text: Do you like the chimes of the clock after midnight? I love them. Once it rings, one can pretend dream and reality are the same thing.

11060512.Title: Conversation 3
11060512.Text: I used to think toys would always be by the owner's side. But plastic weathers, porcelain breaks, metal rusts, and people grow up... Turns out "change" is the only constant.

11060513.Title: Special Conversation 1
11060513.Text: I once held the sweetest candy in the world, but it's been too long, now it tastes more bitter than medicine. Thank you for reminding me of that sweetness, even just a little.

11060514.Title: Special Conversation 2
11060514.Text: Can I get a share of your smile and hope? I might have started yearning for the world in your eyes... So bright, so warm...

11060515.Title: Special Conversation 3
11060515.Text: If there really exists a night that never dawns, will you be there with me? In the endless night, we can count the stars together... and dream a never-ending dream.

11060516.Title: Full Compliance
11060516.Text: The fairy tale says "your beloved one is always by your side, you just can't see her"... I reckon the fairy tale is lying again, because this time I see you.

11060517.Title: Idle
11060517.Text: There, there, little bear, Eve's here, and always will be... But, Eve won't hear the same words said to her anymore...

11060518.Title: Annoyed
11060518.Text: If such contact can satisfy your curiosity, do as you please. Don't pity me, of all the things I've lost, my legs are the least important.

11060519.Title: Special Attention
11060519.Text: Thanks for hanging out with me. If you don't mind, could you push me outside for a bit? The fresh air helps take my mind off things for a while

11060520.Title: Dispatch
11060520.Text: There are only limited places a wheelchair can reach. I suggest you do not expect too much from me.

11060521.Title: Dispatch Complete
11060521.Text: I'm back. If I'm not needed for anything else, please let me rest alone for a while.

11060523.Title: Level Up
11060523.Text: Why won't you give up on this useless body...

11060524.Title: Pat Head
11060524.Text: Your hand, can it stay a bit longer? I fear this warmth will be fleeting, just like before...

11060526.Title: Join Team
11060526.Text: It's time for the toys to meet new friends.

11060533.Title: Upgrade Skill
11060533.Text: No miracles will happen to me anymore, right?

11060601.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11060601.Text: Good to see you're well, Chief. Is bumping into you here a matter of destiny, coincidence... or a manipulated incident?

11060602.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11060602.Text: How do you want me to repay you for helping me like this?

11060603.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11060603.Text: The bell tolls, playing the rites of the people, praising the voices of humanity... The so-called "sacred sign" has always existed between you and me.

11060606.Title: Lose Battles
11060606.Text: It seems that I, a mere scholar, can't stand up against the heavenly calamity anyways...

11060607.Title: Ultimate Skill
11060607.Text: The smoke has risen. Now, play your heart out.

11060608.Title: Die in Battles
11060608.Text: Is this written in my fate... huh, how I hate it...

11060609.Title: Greeting
11060609.Text: Got some good news, Chief. Want to hear it? I drew a fortune for you. You'll meet a very kind benefactor today... What are you looking for? Isn't it obvious that I'm right in front of you?

11060610.Title: Conversation 1
11060610.Text: Gods can't help you with your workload or relieve your stress, but maybe I can. Why don't you give it a try by asking nicely?

11060611.Title: Conversation 2
11060611.Text: Some people long for those bizarre and magical stories, and some fear those miracles beyond human power... So, which one are you, Chief?

11060612.Title: Conversation 3
11060612.Text: A good fragrance, a collection of thoughts, a heart that seeks the truth—that's all a mythologist needs.

11060613.Title: Special Conversation 1
11060613.Text: If there really are gods and ghosts in the world, why hasn't anyone ever answer those pious wishes? But if they never existed... then where do people's prayers go...

11060614.Title: Special Conversation 2
11060614.Text: Did you see it? The sun rises and sets... the ordinary daily life that is yearned for by some is right here...

11060615.Title: Special Conversation 3
11060615.Text: I've told you so many legends now, it's only fair that I also hear some from you. But I don't like to share. I want stories you've never told anyone before, some secrets only known to the heavens, earth, you, and me.

11060616.Title: Full Compliance
11060616.Text: You've given me truth, trust, strength, and a place to belong. I've really taken advantage of you. From now on, let me take my time to pay you back.

11060617.Title: Idle
11060617.Text: Did you know, the Sun Crow can actually swim... Shh! This is a highly confidential heavenly secret. Don't let anyone hear it.

11060618.Title: Annoyed
11060618.Text: Stop messing around... My incense burner might just come alive and swallow you whole!

11060619.Title: Special Attention
11060619.Text: Legend has it that if you bow three times and kowtow nine times towards the direction of the sunset, a wish can be granted... Oh, you didn't fall for it?

11060620.Title: Dispatch
11060620.Text: Such a bustling and glamorous foreign land. Aren't you afraid I might be tempted away by this dazzling world?

11060621.Title: Dispatch Complete
11060621.Text: I'm back empty handed... Just kidding, here you go~

11060623.Title: Level Up
11060623.Text: So this is the craftsmanship of the great DisCity?

11060624.Title: Pat Head
11060624.Text: In my hometown, casually touching other people's heads could lead to... Nevermind, it's better if you don't know.

11060626.Title: On battlefield
11060626.Text: Hmm... I must take this seriously now.

11060633.Title: Upgrade Skill
11060633.Text: How do you want me to repay you for helping me like this?

11060701.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11060701.Text: Oh my, what a dull and gloomy place this is! Why don't we all forget our worries and have a good time? Let's do what the animals do: wear nothing, think about nothing, and just live in the moment!

11060702.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11060702.Text: I wish our bond will be more unbreakable~

11060703.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11060703.Text: Sleep and sink into this blue in total tranquility... Who will shatter this fanciful reverie?

11060704.Title: Level Start
11060704.Text: Are you here to entertain me? That's great!

11060705.Title: Victory
11060705.Text: What a pitiful sight! So many broken legs and arms. That's one big mushy mess...

11060706.Title: Lose Battles
11060706.Text: How dare you cause trouble on my island?

11060709.Title: Greeting
11060709.Text: Hehe, I like how we're tied up together now by this red string. If I want to, I can simply pull this string and take you to a happy land that only belongs to the two of us.

11060710.Title: Conversation 1
11060710.Text: Here on Elysiland, whatever you want to do can be satisfied! You can fall in love, you can feast and drink, pick up fights, or just lie around and do nothing. As you wish! Everything here is unrestricted, and the only thing that matters is to have fun!

11060711.Title: Conversation 2
11060711.Text: What's so good about the outside world? Can you be this free out there? Can you be this happy? I have so many friends here; I'm not lonely at all. I don't want to go outside and neither do you. Stay here with me!

11060712.Title: Conversation 3
11060712.Text: If you open your eyes in the depths of the sea, you'll see... Never mind. No one ever dares to do that.

11060713.Title: Special Conversation 1
11060713.Text: Those fools. They were having a good time with me underwater, but as soon as they heard someone calling their names from above, they swim as hard as they can until they get back to the shore. And I'm all alone again...

11060714.Title: Special Conversation 2
11060714.Text: Both the sky and sea should be boundless, right? But why is my Elysiland surrounded by invisible walls? Is it because I still don't have enough friends here? Yes, that must be it!

11060715.Title: Special Conversation 3
11060715.Text: Dive into the water with me. Let the water embrace you, merge with it. Listen to my heartbeat, be one with me...

11060716.Title: Full Compliance
11060716.Text: No bait, no hook, but you successfully caught a beautiful little fish. She's happy, because now not only does she own the underwater world but also a smile, a hug, a person connected to her. Hold my hand. Let's go watch the sunrise together! I won't turn into foam or sink to the bottom of the sea. I'll always be here.

11060717.Title: Idle
11060717.Text: "Fighting is meaningful, and so is resisting." "This time, it's my turn to protect you..." Your data is so interesting. I'm saving it.

11060718.Title: Annoyed
11060718.Text: Mmm... Why don't you rub harder? Come on, give it a try.

11060719.Title: Special Attention
11060719.Text: You really like me, don't you? Keep looking at me like this, okay?

11060720.Title: Dispatch
11060720.Text: We can just send Manty. It's better at finding island treasures than me.

11060721.Title: Dispatch Complete
11060721.Text: Manty is back! And it has brought you a gift. Looks like it likes you as much as I do!

11060723.Title: Level Up
11060723.Text: I like the way you're treating me. Give me more~

11060724.Title: Pat Head
11060724.Text: Let me tell you a secret: you have been a prisoner in my mind for a long time.

11060733.Title: Upgrade Skill
11060733.Text: Thank you... even though I can't seem to recall anything.

11110101.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11110101.Text: I don't like being locked up... Say, how much do I need to pay to get out of here?

11110103.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11110103.Text: From now on, no one can hurt us. No one.

11110106.Title: Lose Battles
11110106.Text: Oh... This feels worse than being rejected...

11110108.Title: Die in Battles
11110108.Text: How has it... come to this?

11110109.Title: Greeting
11110109.Text: Yo, you're back. It's been a while since I last saw you. I was a little concerned.

11110110.Title: Conversation 1
11110110.Text: Why do people always find me arrogant? I'm only honest about being rich.

11110111.Title: Conversation 2
11110111.Text: Look at the fire in this emerald. Isn't it gorgeous? In fact, unrefined, its clarity was just so-so, but good faceting techniques work magic.

11110112.Title: Conversation 3
11110112.Text: The kids here are all adorable, but why won't any of them take my money?

11110113.Title: Special Conversation 1
11110113.Text: I wonder how my kitties are doing at home... Can I bring them here, Chief? There aren't that many of them, just... a little over a hundred.

11110114.Title: Special Conversation 2
11110114.Text: I believe I exist in this world for the gems... But am I truly as dazzling as they are?

11110115.Title: Special Conversation 3
11110115.Text: What would you say if I want to be your sugar mama, Chief? I'm serious.

11110116.Title: Full Compliance
11110116.Text: This is an inheritance distribution agreement. Come sign your name on it... If something happens to me one day, take care of the kids... and Sitri, with this money. Got it?

11110117.Title: Idle
11110117.Text: Sitri, sweetheart, you know what to do when they come, don't you?

11110118.Title: Annoyed
11110118.Text: That reminds me, I've never paid to have somebody's limbs cut off. I'd like to try it sometime.

11110119.Title: Special Attention
11110119.Text: You've come to meet me specifically? Are you short on cash these days, Chief?

11110122.Title: Dispatch Complete
11110122.Text: I'm back. Look, I've brought everyone souvenirs.

11110124.Title: Pat Head
11110124.Text: Oh, aren't you going to tickle my chin too? Who knows, I might purr a little for you.

111101100.Title: Attire Obtained
111101100.Text: Welcome to my estate! Chief... You're my rare and precious guest, just make yourself at home. It'll be so boring if you're too nervous.

111101101.Title: Level Up
111101101.Text: The night is long. Wanna do something fun?

111101102.Title: Greeting
111101102.Text: Let's have a drink? Relax, Chief... It's only pomegranate juice.

111101103.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
111101103.Text: Come closer, let me hear your breaths closely... Oh... you sound just like a kitten.

111101104.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
111101104.Text: Legend has it that if you keep chanting "Countess Chelsea, take me as your sugar baby" at a mirror in this room, no matter where I am, I'll immediately appear. Don't you want to try it?

111101105.Title: Idle
111101105.Text: Sitri, you're not eating your meals properly again today... Are the diamonds not to your taste? Sigh... Got it, I'll fetch you a few of your favorite boulder opals now.

111101106.Title: Annoyed
111101106.Text: You're finally getting bolder, Chief. Can I treat this as a love confession from you?

111101107.Title: Special Attention
111101107.Text: Time to close the curtains and enjoy this night with just the two of us.

111101110.Title: Attire Obtained
111101110.Text: Did you lose this Golden Axe, or this Gemstone Axe? Don't be shy! You can take both if you like!

111101111.Title: Level Up
111101111.Text: Ah... Just as I thought, when the water becomes clear, one's mood is also lifted.

111101112.Title: Greeting
111101112.Text: Haha... You don't need to pretend that you dropped something into the lake. I can give you anything you want, but on one teensy little condition... that is, to stay with me forever~

111101113.Title: Pat Head
111101113.Text: This flower crown is a precious gift from the spirits under the lake. What do you think? Much prettier than those accessories priced with a string of zeros, right?

111101114.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
111101114.Text: For those who don't suit my taste, even if every word they say is true, they are not worthy to take my collection.

111101115.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
111101115.Text: Every day, there are things that are forgotten, discarded, or lost. They slip right into the lake and come to me. So, what kind of things slipped through your fingers?

111101116.Title: Ordinary Contact 3
111101116.Text: Your palm is dry and warm... I love this feeling! Name your price. How many gems it takes for you to hold my hand like this forever?

111101117.Title: Ordinary Contact 4
111101117.Text: The water in the lake is my limbs, my heart, my dress... When you stir it, you are also touching me... Hehe, what, you don't believe me? I can really merge with the water~

111101118.Title: Idle
111101118.Text: Sitri, you went playing treasure hunt at the bottom of the lake again? You've dug up all these centuries-old things... Come here, let me wipe your paws.

111101119.Title: Special Attention
111101119.Text: If you're interested in me, just say it. I can take you to my home right now. Don't worry, I've already prepared your room at the bottom of the lake. I specially decorated it with pearl curtains and a bed made of gems. You'll definitely love it.

11110201.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11110201.Text: Cinnabar, former supervisor of the private military company Serpent Eye. Anything concerning security, I should be of help.

11110202.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11110202.Text: So this is how you hone your abilities... Sinners sure are special.

11110203.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11110203.Text: No more necessary sacrifices. This power will protect everyone.

11110206.Title: Lose Battles
11110206.Text: I'll hold them off, you get out of here now. Run!

11110208.Title: Die in Battles
11110208.Text: No... Not yet, not when they're still here...

11110209.Title: Greeting
11110209.Text: Welcome back, Chief. There have been no irregular activities in the Bureau while you were away.

11110210.Title: Conversation 1
11110210.Text: As of now, I have a 100% assignment completion rate. You may rest assured that I will keep you safe.

11110211.Title: Conversation 2
11110211.Text: My seniors at Serpent Eye are the best teachers I've ever had. The things they've taught me are way more useful than the professional knowledge taught in the police academy.

11110212.Title: Conversation 3
11110212.Text: This is a GH-2 Shield Generator, custom-made high-end stuff from the Research Institute, very reliable. One thing though, it's got a ton of parts inside, hence a real pain to repair.

11110213.Title: Special Conversation 1
11110213.Text: I was once lost too, about what I should protect, and how to do it. But after that incident, I've found my answer.

11110214.Title: Special Conversation 2
11110214.Text: In the past, besides protecting the big shots of Paradeisos, I often did safety assessment for large organizations. As for MBCC... things are more complicated. My previous experience is not quite applicable here.

11110215.Title: Special Conversation 3
11110215.Text: I've never protected anyone over such a long period. It's like I'm your personal bodyguard. But well... I do like this job.

11110216.Title: Full Compliance
11110216.Text: Ever since leaving Serpent Eye, I haven't met any comrades I can count on in a long time... It is my honor to fight beside you.

11110217.Title: Idle
11110217.Text: Hmm... Where did I put my bulletproof plate?

11110218.Title: Annoyed
11110218.Text: Please keep an appropriate distance... I can't perform my tasks properly if you do that.

11110219.Title: Special Attention
11110219.Text: Do you need close protection? Understood.

11110221.Title: Dispatch
11110221.Text: No problem. I'll get it done in no time.

11110222.Title: Dispatch Complete
11110222.Text: Mission accomplished. Hit me up whenever you need me.

11110232.Title: Upgrade Skill
11110232.Text: So this is how you hone your abilities... Sinners sure are special.

111102100.Title: Attire Obtained
111102100.Text: It's an honor to take part in this escort mission to the Rust. I've been looking forward to spending more time with you... Sorry... I... I just wanted you to know how happy I am.

111102102.Title: Greeting
111102102.Text: There you are, Chief. Everything is ready. We can go now.

111102103.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
111102103.Text: Please tell me if you're tired. Don't worry. I'll clear a safe resting area for you.

111102104.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
111102104.Text: Be careful! Rockfalls and landslides are common around the Rust. Please stay close to me.

111102105.Title: Idle
111102105.Text: Get some rest, Chief. No matter how long you need, I'll be by your side.

111102106.Title: Annoyed
111102106.Text: You seem out of breath. Did you notice anything unusual?

111102107.Title: Special Attention
111102107.Text: The Rust is indeed dangerous. But don't worry, I won't let any harm come to you—it's my duty.

111102110.Title: Attire Obtained
111102110.Text: Traveling by horse might seem a bit... too much, but it's a gesture from Miss Faye. She insisted we uphold the prestige of the MBCC... I can't just disregard her kind intentions.

111102111.Title: Level Up
111102111.Text: I've been honing my horsemanship. It won't be a bumpy ride, I promise.

111102112.Title: Greeting
111102112.Text: It's time, Chief. I'm here to escort you to the party. Tonight, I'm the knight only for you.

111102113.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
111102113.Text: Would you like to pet him? It's okay, he's a gentle boy. Here, try riding him. Don't worry, I'll protect you.

111102114.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
111102114.Text: This look sacrifices a bit of functionality for aesthetics and does look a bit constricted and cumbersome... But rest assured, I will make sure you are unscathed no matter what happens.

111102115.Title: Idle
111102115.Text: Shh, easy there... Are you feeling thirsty?

111102116.Title: Annoyed
111102116.Text: Ahem... Please don't mess up these decorations. It's a little time-consuming to wear them. After the party is over, I will take them off and give them to you, you can examine them however you want.

111102117.Title: Special Attention
111102117.Text: This outfit suits me? Thanks... I'm glad to know you like it.

11110301.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11110301.Text: I can sleep here all the time, right? Wow! It's got so much space inside. Not even a breath of wind can get in! It's much better than camping. Great, I finally have a place to stay!

11110302.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11110302.Text: Thank you! This will allow me to finish the map quicker!

11110303.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11110303.Text: One day, I will place beacons in every corner of WhiteSands. I'm confident of it now!

11110304.Title: Level Start
11110304.Text: Don't worry. Fieldwork is my strong suit.

11110305.Title: Win Battles
11110305.Text: Great! Now a safety beacon can be placed here too!

11110306.Title: Lose Battles
11110306.Text: Hurry! This way! We can duck through.

11110309.Title: Greeting
11110309.Text: Hello! I thought you got lost and was about to look for you.

11110310.Title: Conversation 1
11110310.Text: If you encounter a sandstorm, look for a beacon nearby... like this one in my hand. Hide next to it, then you should be able to survive it.

11110311.Title: Conversation 2
11110311.Text: Why do you keep catching those... they are called desert bandits, right? They hardly ever hit me with a gun. Sometimes they would ask me to be their guide and give me fresh water after getting them to places. I think they are nice people.

11110312.Title: Conversation 3
11110312.Text: Hehehe, I'm not as impressive as you said, at least not as good as Dad and Grandpa. I learned all my geography knowledge from the book grandpa wrote.

11110313.Title: Special Conversation 1
11110313.Text: Your food here is so delicious. Especially the broth—I would never have thought putting large chunks of meat and water together would taste so much better than roasting scorpions and lizards!

11110314.Title: Special Conversation 2
11110314.Text: There are a few very strange places in WhiteSands with people looking stern and carrying guns everywhere. I get kicked out every time I go in for a break—but it's so spacious inside. How mean.

11110315.Title: Special Conversation 3
11110315.Text: I always thought if I placed beacons all over WhiteSands, my dad would come back. But it's been seven years... I will finish his and Grandpa's plan, then I will go find him.

11110316.Title: Full Compliance
11110316.Text: The starry sky over WhiteSands is incredibly stunning, especially when there's a meteor shower... Let's go see it together when we have the chance. There's an awesome viewing spot that only I'd know.

11110318.Title: Annoyed
11110318.Text: Do you want my hat? But this one is very worn-out. Let me make a new one for you.

11110319.Title: Special Attention
11110319.Text: You want me to stay here with you? Sure! By the way, when are we going back to WhiteSands? I have a lot of work to do there.

11110322.Title: Dispatch Complete
11110322.Text: No need to pay me. I don't need it. I'm glad I can help.

11110323.Title: Level Up
11110323.Text: Wind and sand can't stop me!

11110332.Title: Upgrade Skill
11110332.Text: Thank you! This will allow me to finish the map quicker!

11110401.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11110401.Text: What are you doing? I'm a serious businessman. If you keep this up, I'm calling my lawyer! Help! Help! Assault! ...Of course I know lawyers can't come here. You really have no sense of humor...

11110402.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11110402.Text: There's nothing fun about becoming strong in and of itself, but after becoming strong, you will have more ways to seek out fun.

11110403.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11110403.Text: You give me things all day without taking any of my money... What's in it for you? Could it be that you want me? You gotta be careful then, because I will ultimately leave after I've had my fun...

11110404.Title: Level Start
11110404.Text: Hey, want to know what you can buy from me... with your life?

11110405.Title: Win Battles
11110405.Text: Woohoo! I made a killing this time!

11110406.Title: Lose Battles
11110406.Text: I lost a fortune! I'm not coming back.

11110407.Title: Ultimate Skill
11110407.Text: Everything of yours is mine now!

11110409.Title: Greeting
11110409.Text: Hey, when can I go out? If I don't find some clients soon, my factory is going to go bankrupt... Alternatively, you can place some orders with me.

11110410.Title: Conversation 1
11110410.Text: You gotta make friends to succeed in business, and to make friends, you gotta have fun with them. Who wouldn't seal a deal with you after having loads of fun together?

11110411.Title: Conversation 2
11110411.Text: When you have money, flies will swarm around you. But flies can also be fun, don't you think?

11110412.Title: Conversation 3
11110412.Text: I have a friend, a painter, who admires my physique and uses me as a canvas. Body art! You understand art? Though it smudges off with one wipe of detergent, I like to keep my friend happy. That way, maybe he'll buy a decade worth of paints from me...

11110413.Title: Special Conversation 1
11110413.Text: I haven't been out for so long. My factory has taken a huge hit as a result. Chief, how will you compensate me?

11110414.Title: Special Conversation 2
11110414.Text: I don't view greed as a sin. To feel satisfied when you get what you want, to feel happy when you see things go your way... Isn't this human nature?

11110415.Title: Special Conversation 3
11110415.Text: Talking about money is the most boring part of business. I prefer something else... like offering a deal that cannot be refused, then watching the other person hand over something they cherish deeply with a look of utmost pain and despair... Now that is addictive.

11110416.Title: Full Compliance
11110416.Text: I've been wondering what your deepest desire is... what must I rob you of to enjoy a look of remorse and despair on your face? But I give up, because you are just like me. There is a bottomless void in your heart... Hahahaha.

11110417.Title: Idle
11110417.Text: I haven't sealed a single deal since coming here?! No... I gotta find Faye tomorrow... She's beautiful inside and out. Surely she will do something about this!

11110418.Title: Annoyed
11110418.Text: 200 for one time... Just kidding, I wouldn't dream of sealing such a petty deal with you! If you sign this contract, feel free to touch whenever you want! It's all on me!

11110419.Title: Special Attention
11110419.Text: Are you here to discuss business? Wait a bit, I'm busy watching this livestream. Hehe, this girl ain't bad. Let me send her some gifts...

11110421.Title: Dispatch
11110421.Text: What a coincidence! I happen to have a friend there. Leave it to him!

11110422.Title: Dispatch Complete
11110422.Text: Hello? Oh, it's done? Great! Chief, it's done over there! Everything went according to plan!

11110423.Title: Level Up
11110423.Text: I don't need to pay for this? Are you serious?

11110425.Title: N/A
11110425.Text: You go to such dangerous places just for fun? Wow, you have my respect.

11110427.Title: N/A
11110427.Text: It's on me! Nothing will go wrong.

11110432.Title: N/A
11110432.Text: There's nothing fun about becoming strong in and of itself, but after becoming strong, you will have more ways to seek out fun.

11110501.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11110501.Text: You took the trouble to bring me all the way here... Is it because you are insecure with that face of yours? Don't worry, at least your eyes are not bad.

11110502.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11110502.Text: I don't mind getting stronger, but is it really necessary?

11110503.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11110503.Text: Mirrors can reveal the human heart. Tell me, what reflection do you see in my mirror? A human figure, or just greed and lust?

11110504.Title: Level Start
11110504.Text: Come. Let me see if you're still salvageable.

11110505.Title: Win Battles
11110505.Text: Don't laugh too hard, or else your eyes will get wrinkles.

11110506.Title: Lose Battles
11110506.Text: A deserter and a stray. What a match made in heaven.

11110508.Title: Die in Battles
11110508.Text: I have to... bring her back...

11110509.Title: Greeting
11110509.Text: Your eyes are as pretty as always. Calm down... with these shackles around, I won't do anything to you.

11110510.Title: Conversation 1
11110510.Text: Keep everything where it should be. You can't even do that?

11110511.Title: Conversation 2
11110511.Text: What beautiful proportions. This face is clearly their greatest asset. Why are they in a rush to sell it?

11110512.Title: Conversation 3
11110512.Text: My mirror reveals one's greatest desires, yet I can't seem to see yours. Chief, is there really nothing you desire... or are they not to be seen?

11110513.Title: Special Conversation 1
11110513.Text: In Eastside, where people live and die for entertainment, a pretty face is a ticket to the party. Yet there is a price to pay to realize this dream. We're both in this game for something we want.

11110514.Title: Special Conversation 2
11110514.Text: The star of tomorrow? Ha, you like that mass-produced trash? I don't even need my power to know what they want. It's always the same look... They're worse than Corruptors. At least Corruptors are each hideous in their own ways.

11110515.Title: Special Conversation 3
11110515.Text: Appearances can be tweaked and changed, but eyes cannot. Eyes become worthless once the light in them dies out... but yours are different. Want to give them to me? I'll try to be as gentle as possible.

11110516.Title: Full Compliance
11110516.Text: You remind me of someone... Sincere, passionate, and with scorching eyes only for me. May I keep your eyes forever, too?

11110517.Title: Idle
11110517.Text: ...All I'm missing is a pair of eyes. Wait a bit longer. I'll bring you back soon...

11110518.Title: Annoyed
11110518.Text: I want you to be close to me... but not this close. Control yourself and mind your manners. Adjutant Nightingale hasn't left yet.

11110519.Title: Special Attention
11110519.Text: Am I the most special one in your eyes?

11110520.Title: Dispatch
11110520.Text: Services other than surgery? That's not included in the price. Remember to pay separately in full.

11110521.Title: Dispatch Complete
11110521.Text: Hmm? This trash makes you happy?

11110522.Title: Level Up
11110522.Text: That's all? This is just some cheap stuff.

11110523.Title: On battlefield
11110523.Text: You've got some nerve to show me all those hideous things.

11110530.Title: Upgrade Skill
11110530.Text: I don't mind getting stronger, but is it really necessary?

111105100.Title: Attire Obtained
111105100.Text: What sort of face are you looking for? One that launches a thousand ships? Name your heart's desire. I shall fulfill it.

111105101.Title: Level Up
111105101.Text: My works have been "superficial", but from now on, I'll be able to capture the essence of the subject.

111105102.Title: Greeting
111105102.Text: You come here every day. Which skin here has caught your fancy? Heed my words: None of these monotonously beautiful faces is worthy of those stunning eyes of yours.

111105103.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
111105103.Text: To become a great skin painter, one must have seen beauty and ugliness in their endless variations, and touched countless bones with their infinite details. Otherwise, you can't fool the discerning eyes of shrewd mortals and will thwart the fulfillment of your customer's obsession.

111105104.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
111105104.Text: Here is my rule: I paint all the features on the skin, except for the eyes. You use your own when you're back in the world of the living, however beautiful the other features I've created are. Ah, they have it right when they say that eyes are the window to the soul. What I wouldn't give for a pair of eyes like yours! So rare and so pure they are...

111105105.Title: Idle
111105105.Text: The cheekbone area needs a touch-up... Ah, still not as good as I hoped. Perhaps the bone structure itself is flawed. I need to start over.

111105106.Title: Annoyed
111105106.Text: Will you stop tugging at my sleeve? You're making my hand tremble. If the buyer goes home with a pockmarked face, they might visit your bedside in the middle of the night to give you a dressing-down.

111105107.Title: Special Attention
111105107.Text: You like watching me work? You can watch, but you'd better not disturb me, or... I might claim your most striking feature for myself.

11110601.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11110601.Text: You guys at MBCC are so petty. I just mentioned on my stream that I'm a Sinner, and within an hour you're knocking on my door! (Looks around) Ahem... But this place looks pretty nice. Should be a good place for streaming!

11110602.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11110602.Text: Hey, how come this training dummy can't take a hit...

11110603.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11110603.Text: Hmph... How could a mere MBCC stop a genius like Nino Sama? It's just a simple signal connection... Huh?! EDGE warning email?

11110604.Title: Level Start
11110604.Text: Follow Nino Sama well and don't get blown away by the wind!

11110605.Title: Victory
11110605.Text: Ha, worthless mobs, what makes you think you can beat me?

11110608.Title: Die in Battles
11110608.Text: Am I going to... sleep alone again...

11110609.Title: Greeting
11110609.Text: Ta-da, it's Nino's game time, live at 7 p.m. every day! You'll get some amazing gameplay with sharp commentary here. Come and follow me!

11110610.Title: Conversation 1
11110610.Text: Sigh... There's no good games lately, I'm even thinking about replaying "Codename: Dark." The graphics look like they're from the last century, but it's not so bad once you get into it. Hmm... just like blue cheese, smells bad but tastes good!

11110611.Title: Conversation 2
11110611.Text: Where am I streaming right now? Ahaha... I'm at home, of course! Those guys at MBCC are useless, they can't keep me! (Turns off the mic and whispers) Shh! Don't say anything!

11110612.Title: Conversation 3
11110612.Text: Ahhh... I'm so mad! Why is this DisMyth admin banning me, and during my live stream at that! All I did was repost the silly things she said years ago, why doesn't she do anything when other people do it?! She's targeting me!

11110613.Title: Special Conversation 1
11110613.Text: Un-understood... I can't resist Chief's command... As long as you have the shackles, I'll do no matter what you... you don't want me to do! Hahaha, I'm just messing with you! Look at you, so nervous, what a wimp!

11110614.Title: Special Conversation 2
11110614.Text: Seriously?! You are that bad, huh? Use counter attack with the shield! Give me the controller. I'll clear it for you! Let go! Let go! If you don't let go, I'm going to get on top of you and teach you how to play!

11110615.Title: Special Conversation 3
11110615.Text: When I'm with you, even if we don't do anything, I never feel bored... Hmmm... I didn't realize the day flew by this quickly. Could you lend me your shoulder to lean on, and please don't leave me before I fall asleep, okay?

11110616.Title: Full Compliance
11110616.Text: Ah, don't close this yet! There are... some things that are a bit awkward to say to your face... I might be able to be more serious if we talk like this. I-I'm being really honest here! I know I tease you and complain a lot. But it's all because I want you to pay more attention to me... After all, I-I'm really afraid of being alone... If there's no one to talk to me, to keep me company, I'd definitely die of loneliness... Don-don't laugh! I'm being serious!

11110617.Title: Idle
11110617.Text: You seem pretty free today, don't you have work? All finished? Hmph, you can watch me stream on this VIP seat then.

11110618.Title: Annoyed
11110618.Text: Cut it out. I'm streaming! ...Ahem, sorry, my pet just snuck in. Where was I? Can someone remind me?

11110619.Title: Special Attention
11110619.Text: Hehe, I knew it. You don't like being alone. You want me to keep you company, right?

11110621.Title: Dispatch
11110621.Text: You need me to run errands for you again? Sigh... let's just say I'm too soft-hearted.

11110622.Title: Dispatch Complete
11110622.Text: Here, these are the things you wanted. Hey! They're not for free, say "Thank you for your kindness, Nino Sama".

11110623.Title: Level Up
11110623.Text: That's not enough. I should be able to fight a hundred Corruptors at least.

11110625.Title: Join Team
11110625.Text: It would be a waste not to let me live stream such a fun event!

11110626.Title: Danger!
11110626.Text: I told you not to run off!

11110627.Title: Received Order
11110627.Text: Ah... Ah, okay, okay, I get it!

11110632.Title: Upgrade Skill
11110632.Text: Hey, how come this training dummy can't take a hit...

11110701.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11110701.Text: Oh fu... ahem, who are you looking for? Syndicate gang? Sinner? I wouldn't dare touch these businesses! How could a refined girl like me be involved with the Iron Gang, haha.

11110702.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11110702.Text: I really gotta practice harder, or those kids are gonna have a real laugh.

11110703.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11110703.Text: Now, I am powerful enough to take lead of the family, standing proud, in front of my peers.

11110704.Title: Level Start
11110704.Text: Stay back. Don't poke your head out.

11110705.Title: Victory
11110705.Text: Weren't ya causing a scene back then? Well then why don't you continue!

11110706.Title: Lose Battles
11110706.Text: Think you're tough? I dare you to come to the back door, you and me!

11110708.Title: Die in Battles
11110708.Text: At least... this time... I didn't run away...

11110709.Title: Greeting
11110709.Text: You're back? Did you get the fluffy thing you promised me? Just had a big figh... big party with them, the decorations on my umbrella were all torn off.

11110710.Title: Conversation 1
11110710.Text: You've been to so many places, tell me, what are the girls in Eastside wearing lately?

11110711.Title: Conversation 2
11110711.Text: Hmm... the wound is covered with a cute band-aid, and the collar torn during the fight is pinned with a pretty brooch, now I should look fine... Oh fu—Ah! Hello, Chief! Since when were you here?

11110712.Title: Conversation 3
11110712.Text: Now that I think about it, my life wasn't too far from ordinary. It's just eating, chatting, fighting with rival gangs, working out, sleeping...

11110713.Title: Special Conversation 1
11110713.Text: You should know by now that I'm the heir to the Iron Gang, but don't worry, I won't go anywhere. After all, if I go back all of a sudden, I might bring them even bigger trouble...

11110714.Title: Special Conversation 2
11110714.Text: When you go on a mission to Syndicate, if you see those brats doing something bad, you can use my name to teach them a lesson! But don't use real weapons, after all, they're my boys...

11110715.Title: Special Conversation 3
11110715.Text: Being found out to be a Sinner in Syndicate is really troublesome, I have to do a dozen more fights every day. I can endure people looking for trouble, but my boys did nothing wrong to bear this with me... So I told myself: run, run to a place where no one knows you.

11110716.Title: Full Compliance
11110716.Text: I used to be a coward who only hid under the umbrella and relied on others to protect me... But now, you gave me the courage to face everything on my own, and to find a way to protect the family with my own strength. From now on, I will carry this umbrella, stand firm, and protect everyone I care about.

11110717.Title: Idle
11110717.Text: Hair, good, accessories, good, cute umbrella, good, mindset, good~ Today, I remain the cutest ******* little girl in Syndicate!

11110718.Title: Annoyed
11110718.Text: These jingling and jangling shits are kinda cute, but they ******* dangle too much!

11110719.Title: Special Attention
11110719.Text: Wha... what you looking at? Is there... something weird about me?!

11110721.Title: Dispatch
11110721.Text: Chief, let's talk this over, can we, like, not go to Syndicate? That place... uh, it really scares me! Definitely not because I'm afraid of being seen by someone...

11110722.Title: Dispatch Complete
11110722.Text: That was nothing scary! Got some loot for ya!

11110723.Title: Level Up
11110723.Text: That'll show ya!!! Um, I mean... how impressive!

11110725.Title: Join Team
11110725.Text: Huh? Are they even a match for me?

11110732.Title: Upgrade Skill
11110732.Text: I really gotta practice harder, or those kids are gonna have a real laugh.

11120101.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11120101.Text: You... are the one who imprisoned us. I remember your scent, I'll spot you wherever you are.

11120102.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11120102.Text: Be honest, do you want me, or a beast?

11120103.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11120103.Text: Now that you've granted me power, don't let me loose again—one moment will be too much.

11120104.Title: Level Start
11120104.Text: Get ready. There will be blood.

11120105.Title: Win Battles
11120105.Text: Too soon, you scum, you gave up too soon!

11120106.Title: Lose Battles
11120106.Text: Let me go. It's not over yet! Let go!

11120109.Title: Greeting
11120109.Text: I knew it was you. I recognize your footsteps.

11120110.Title: Conversation 1
11120110.Text: They wanted my arms, wanted my blood, wanted me to tear everything down. They wanted to create a monster, and I was the masterpiece.

11120111.Title: Conversation 2
11120111.Text: My blade has sliced many. Among them, Hella is not the strongest, but she's the toughest.

11120112.Title: Conversation 3
11120112.Text: In that blood-boiling moment, the body acts on instinct. Don't think, forget whoever you've torn apart, simply—enjoy it. That's how I'm designed.

11120113.Title: Special Conversation 1
11120113.Text: Chains? They're nothing. I'm used to them. Also, I can get rid of them anytime I want.

11120114.Title: Special Conversation 2
11120114.Text: I don't care how others call me. But I do like Ninety-Nine... It's the first name I've ever been given.

11120115.Title: Special Conversation 3
11120115.Text: I don't remember much about Parma. Only Hella's voice in the dark. She kept talking to me, telling me about Syndicate, what's above the ground, people. She said she'd take me with her.

11120116.Title: Full Compliance
11120116.Text: You're the second person I've wanted to kill but couldn't. From now on, I'll keep on fighting for you, until the day I die.

11120118.Title: Annoyed
11120118.Text: What... Do you want a fight?

11120119.Title: Special Attention
11120119.Text: Yeah, keep an eye on me, like how I'm watching you.

11120124.Title: Pat Head
11120124.Text: Are you... trying to comfort me?

11120126.Title: Join Team
11120126.Text: I can feel my blood boiling.

11120133.Title: Upgrade Skill
11120133.Text: Be honest, do you want me, or a beast?

111201100.Title: Attire Obtained
111201100.Text: I'm... Parma's living weapon, Ninety-Nine. Fight... Give me orders, I only need to fight...

111201101.Title: Level Up
111201101.Text: I'm stronger now... I'll give them a quick death.

111201102.Title: Greeting
111201102.Text: You're here... When does the next fight start?

111201103.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
111201103.Text: Fight, fight endlessly, until one side falls...

111201104.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
111201104.Text: Pain distracts you, so if you want to survive, you must get used to pain.

111201105.Title: Idle
111201105.Text: You seem to be here all the time. What's your purpose?

111201107.Title: Special Attention
111201107.Text: If it's not for a fight, what are you here for? Am I useful in other ways?

11120201.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11120201.Text: I like... the soft touch, the rotting smell, and the crunching sound of things breaking apart, hehehe... Chief... can you satisfy me?

11120202.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11120202.Text: This chainsaw is razor-sharp... better be careful... hahahaha!

11120203.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11120203.Text: Hehehe... I can smell the Rust.

11120204.Title: Level Start
11120204.Text: Where? Corruptors, monsters...! Don't try to escape!

11120206.Title: Lose Battles
11120206.Text: I won't let you get away!

11120207.Title: Ultimate Skill
11120207.Text: Hahahaha! Does it hurt?! Does it hurt?!

11120209.Title: Greeting
11120209.Text: Hahaha... seems like you want to cozy up to me... aren't you afraid I'll dismember you?

11120210.Title: Conversation 1
11120210.Text: Is your body feeling stiff? How about I help you reassemble it?

11120211.Title: Conversation 2
11120211.Text: How do y'all refer to me? The reaper, the chainsaw maniac? Hehe... well my favorite nickname is... the undertaker.

11120212.Title: Conversation 3
11120212.Text: Better be careful if you're their lapdog. Someday, you'll be mercilessly abandoned too... hahaha!

11120213.Title: Special Conversation 1
11120213.Text: Traitors... traitors must be killed mercilessly and thrown into the Rust. Hehe... I won't betray you, so... don't betray me either.

11120214.Title: Special Conversation 2
11120214.Text: The sun rises and sets, and the chainsaw starts to churn... all the filth before my eyes dissolve into smithereens... let us purify, let us bury... graves are piling up by the Rust, overlooking DisCity...

11120215.Title: Special Conversation 3
11120215.Text: I buried all my companions in the Rust. I can still vaguely remember... their silhouettes.

11120216.Title: Full Compliance
11120216.Text: I've made my decision. I will build my tomb near here, and you shall be the one to see me off. Chief... when the time comes, can you write my epitaph?

11120217.Title: Idle
11120217.Text: Shush... I can hear the Corruptors... in the distance! No... behind you!

11120218.Title: Annoyed
11120218.Text: You seem interested in my body... which body part do you like? I will give it to you!

11120219.Title: Special Attention
11120219.Text: You've got a sharp eye... almost as if you're going to slice me open... hehehe... it seems like we'll get along just fine.

11120221.Title: Dispatch
11120221.Text: Hehe, alright! I miss the little monsters from the Rust...

11120222.Title: Dispatch Complete
11120222.Text: Feels so much better now that the dirty things have been dealt with, hehe.

11120223.Title: Level Up
11120223.Text: Ah... the sound of a churning chainsaw is music to my ears!

11120225.Title: Join Team
11120225.Text: Hmm? How come the dead can talk?

11120232.Title: Upgrade Skill
11120232.Text: This chainsaw is razor-sharp... better be careful... hahahaha!

111202100.Title: Attire Obtained
111202100.Text: Scream and cower in fear, traitors! Enjoy your last moments—"Chainsaw Wendy" is here! You can't get away from me!

111202101.Title: Level Up
111202101.Text: I can hang some more pieces on my hook!

111202102.Title: Greeting
111202102.Text: The game is about to start. The rules are quite simple. All you have to do is run fast enough and hide well enough to avoid getting dismembered by me!

111202103.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
111202103.Text: What's so scary about the killers in horror flicks? People are much more dangerous in real life.

111202104.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
111202104.Text: A lot of people don't realize that life should never be taken for granted... I'll teach them that lesson.

111202105.Title: Idle
111202105.Text: Hide well, little bunny... Wendy is coming to get you! Don't scream when you see her... or else she'll cut off your tongue...

111202106.Title: Annoyed
111202106.Text: Hahahaha... you still want to go on living after doing such things?

111202107.Title: Special Attention
111202107.Text: Hahaha, you found me! Let's play a little game. Don't be nervous. As long as you try hard enough and give up some things, you have a chance of surviving.

111202108.Title: Attire Obtained
111202108.Text: Come, say hi to my old friends.

111202109.Title: Level Up
111202109.Text: Ah, the sound of the chainsaw brings back memories...

111202110.Title: Greeting
111202110.Text: Shh... It's quiet here at the Rust. Everyone's asleep... Don't you wake them.

111202111.Title: Pat Head
111202111.Text: The touch and warmth feel familiar... I think I once had that too... You're probably the only one who'll give me head pats now.

111202112.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
111202112.Text: Not a single person will come and chill by the Rust. There are only Corruptors and monsters around here... Hehe, and a weirdo who keeps the Undertaker company.

111202113.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
111202113.Text: The dark cape can hide the filth and can be simply discarded. Who'll give a disposable lapdog an expensive leash?

111202114.Title: Ordinary Contact 3
111202114.Text: I must keep these names safe. This way, at least somebody will remember us... Is there really a place where the Undertakers belong?

111202115.Title: Ordinary Contact 4
111202115.Text: My friends are all asleep. One day, I'll lie beside them and rest in this filthy home of ours... When the day comes, will you bring me flowers too?

111202116.Title: Idle
111202116.Text: Listen... The wind's whistling by the Rust, saying goodnight...

111202117.Title: Special Attention
111202117.Text: You smell like the Rust. Is it because you always watch me like this? Hehe... You're indeed... my friend...

11120301.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11120301.Text: My name is Pacassi... I'm an orphan of the old generation, a walking contaminant. Please keep your distance.

11120302.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11120302.Text: Energy level boosted. Please upgrade your radiation protection accordingly.

11120303.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11120303.Text: You still haven't given up... Then, touch me... and prepare to be pierced through by radiation.

11120309.Title: Greeting
11120309.Text: Hello, Chief. Do you have any work for me today?

11120310.Title: Conversation 1
11120310.Text: Is there anything I can help with, Chief? I'm not used to staying idle and doing nothing.

11120311.Title: Conversation 2
11120311.Text: The modification on this arm is to help the muscles exert force... Sorry, but please don't touch it. No, it's not forbidden. It's just that... it has absorbed too much radiation.

11120312.Title: Conversation 3
11120312.Text: I must live on, and remember everything that happened in the town. Otherwise, everything we'd experienced will be meaningless...

11120313.Title: Special Conversation 1
11120313.Text: I still remember the last accident with the power station. That winter, the snow ruined the greater part of the grid. In thirty days, the town's population reduced by a quarter. We only found them under the melted snow when the spring came the next year...

11120314.Title: Special Conversation 2
11120314.Text: Mayek means lighthouse. Even in the darkest hour, it provides the wanderers with guidance and hope. But no one knows, that even the lighthouse itself can be devoured by darkness...

11120315.Title: Special Conversation 3
11120315.Text: I never dream of pity from others, not even from you. I... don't want to live without dignity, as an experimental subject or an exotic animal on display...

11120316.Title: Full Compliance
11120316.Text: No one has ever told me what friendship means... I've read it in a book, that a friend is someone you would die for... If that's true, then you're my friend, my only friend.

11120317.Title: Idle
11120317.Text: ...You've been working for hours, Chief. Don't you want to take a break?

11120318.Title: Annoyed
11120318.Text: Chief... Is this... how people in the DisCity show friendliness? Hmm... Okay.

11120319.Title: Special Attention
11120319.Text: Could you... stop staring at me? I... I'm not very used to it.

11120322.Title: Dispatch Complete
11120322.Text: I've finished my work. Please give me a new task.

11120325.Title: Join Team
11120325.Text: I'm used to battles. I can certainly do it.

11120332.Title: Upgrade Skill
11120332.Text: Energy level boosted. Please upgrade your radiation protection accordingly.

111203100.Title: Attire Obtained
111203100.Text: Chief, please move closer to the fire. Even the outskirts of Mayek are much colder than DisCity. Take care and stay warm.

111203102.Title: Greeting
111203102.Text: Chief, do you feel warmer now? If you're still feeling cold... have some of the borscht I've just cooked.

111203103.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
111203103.Text: "A hundred years have passed. The young city has become the treasure and marvel of the Northern nation..." I found this poetry collection in Bureau's library. It's very interesting... Care to read it, Chief?

111203104.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
111203104.Text: This was once the furthest I'd been from Mayek. And now... it's also the closest I've been to it.

111203105.Title: Idle
111203105.Text: When I was little, I always hoped winter could pass sooner. But now, I wish it could stay longer... Human beings are indeed strange.

111203106.Title: Annoyed
111203106.Text: I... I only added some Mayek-style cutting and materials to the uniform. I suppose... I haven't violated the Bureau's rules, have I...?

111203107.Title: Special Attention
111203107.Text: Bone-chilling winds and snowy nights are unique to Mayek, and those who stand firm in winter nights in snow gear deserve to stay in our memories eternally too...

11120401.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11120401.Text: You caught me again! Fine then. I'll keep hitting the Corruptors' heads like baseballs. After all, they were the ones who made me like this.

11120402.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11120402.Text: Such strong power... if only I could control it.

11120403.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11120403.Text: I've become this strong already? If only I were as strong when I was back on the Eastside baseball fields.

11120404.Title: Level Start
11120404.Text: Oh... is this area considered out?

11120408.Title: Die in Battles
11120408.Text: What does it even matter... if I'm stronger?! Arghh!

11120409.Title: Greeting
11120409.Text: When will it be my turn to play?

11120410.Title: Conversation 1
11120410.Text: Prepare some extra baseball bats. The ones from the purchasing office aren't enough. They won't survive a single battle.

11120411.Title: Conversation 2
11120411.Text: Hey, isn't this my fake Eastside identity from way back? Cough... back then, I had to get it to compete in a game.

11120412.Title: Conversation 3
11120412.Text: It's hard for me to control my emotions. If you find me in unusually high or low spirits, be sure to steer clear. Don't blame me for not warning you if you get beaten to a pulp.

11120413.Title: Special Conversation 1
11120413.Text: Isn't the sound of batting a baseball music to the ears? Right? I fell in love with baseball the moment I heard that!

11120414.Title: Special Conversation 2
11120414.Text: Can I skip the mission in Eastside? It's not that I'm scared, I just don't like that place... Of course, if we can watch an Eastside Baseball League game afterwards, you can ignore what I just said.

11120415.Title: Special Conversation 3
11120415.Text: There's a Syndicate baseball game tomorrow, do you want to watch the live stream together? If you don't understand baseball, I can be your commentator.

11120416.Title: Full Compliance
11120416.Text: If possible, I really want to challenge the stronger teams... with you here, I think I can control my power. Hey, how about we try it sometime on the baseball field?

11120417.Title: Idle
11120417.Text: Ah... can you ask the purchasing office to bring me some posters for this baseball tournament? No, I don't play... but I can collect just the same!

11120418.Title: Annoyed
11120418.Text: Hey! Didn't we agree to keep some distance?

11120419.Title: Special Attention
11120419.Text: Good eye! Just like a focused baseball champ.

11120421.Title: Dispatch
11120421.Text: Start running to the next base!

11120426.Title: Danger!
11120426.Text: They're coming... the Corruptors... are coming!

11120432.Title: Upgrade Skill
11120432.Text: Such strong power... if only I could control it.

11120501.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11120501.Text: Here again?! Let me out! The Legion won't let you off! My boss will come and crash this dump. You hear me?!

11120502.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11120502.Text: Wow, this power... Let me try it out on Boss Zoya now!

11120503.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11120503.Text: From now on, leave the Legion to me.

11120504.Title: Level Start
11120504.Text: Don't worry. I've got you covered.

11120505.Title: Win Battles
11120505.Text: Humph, now you know I'm not to be messed with.

11120506.Title: Lose Battles
11120506.Text: It's okay. As long as we're still alive, we have a chance to win!

11120509.Title: Greeting
11120509.Text: Yo, you're here? I'm warming up. Wanna join me? A great warrior should never neglect training, or their body will get stiff. That's what Boss Zoya taught me!

11120510.Title: Conversation 1
11120510.Text: We both came out of the same mother, why is Earl so tall... Wait and see, I'll outgrow him.

11120511.Title: Conversation 2
11120511.Text: The secret to being strong? Training, unrelenting courage, and a liter of milk per day... What are you laughing at?! Nutrition's important!

11120512.Title: Conversation 3
11120512.Text: My bros at the Legion gave me this axe. What do you think? It goes with my bravery and invincibility, right?

11120513.Title: Special Conversation 1
11120513.Text: Boss Zoya is incredibly strong, thoughtful, and brainy. I wish I could be like her someday. Well, I'd be happy if I'm half as good as she is.

11120514.Title: Special Conversation 2
11120514.Text: Dress? I don't wear dresses. They're inconvenient to fight in and very revealing. You... You liar! I wasn't staring at the dress in the window last time... Shut up!

11120515.Title: Special Conversation 3
11120515.Text: I'm strong now and will no longer be a burden to anyone. But the person I cared about the most isn't there anymore.

11120516.Title: Full Compliance
11120516.Text: You were lying when you said Boss Zoya sent you to save me, right? Humph. Fine, I forgive you. I won't repeat the stupid mistake of... bickering with important people over little things.

11120517.Title: Idle
11120517.Text: Hey, do you know where the Supply Office is? That purple-haired chick said she is getting rid of the soon out-of-date mil... merchandise. 50% off for everything. Let me go check it out.

11120518.Title: Annoyed
11120518.Text: Ah! Don't run! I'll chop your head off!

11120519.Title: Special Attention
11120519.Text: What did you come to see me for? Just to look at me? What's there to look at? Or are you here to train with me?

11120521.Title: Dispatch
11120521.Text: Don't worry. I'll take care of it.

11120522.Title: Dispatch Complete
11120522.Text: You've asked me to help now. Isn't this just a piece of cake or what?

11120532.Title: Upgrade Skill
11120532.Text: Wow, this power... Let me try it out on Boss Zoya now!

111205100.Title: Attire Obtained
111205100.Text: ...Why are you here? Just to check on me? What's there to check? Well, since you're here, why not work out with me for a bit? Do you see how skinny you are? I'm worried a gust of wind from DisSea might blow you away one day.

111205101.Title: Level Up
111205101.Text: (Gulp) Ah! Nothing beats a glass of milk after a good workout!

111205102.Title: Greeting
111205102.Text: Do you know what time it is already? Still hanging around here, huh? A top-notch warrior never skimps on training! Come on, let's run 2 miles to warm up.

111205103.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
111205103.Text: Hmm... Five sets of lat pulldowns, five sets of reverse grip lat pulldowns, five sets of dumbbell curls, and five sets of barbell curls. This is just the workout plan for the first phase. After we finish these, we can... Hey, where are you going? Fine, we'll start with three sets. Three sets, okay?

111205104.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
111205104.Text: What's that saying again? Something about... quantity leading to... some kind of change... Ugh, I can't remember! Anyway, the point is, consistent training is definitely the right way to go! One day, I'll surpass him and even Boss Zoya to become the strongest in the Legion!

111205105.Title: Idle
111205105.Text: Ugh, this strawberry flavor is way too strong, it's sickeningly sweet... O-of course, I know egg albumen powder should be mixed with water, but don't you want to know what the powder tastes like?!

111205106.Title: Annoyed
111205106.Text: Hey, watch it! This jacket cost me a pretty penny. It's not just any jacket, it's the soul of the Legion! You want to try it on? Alright, considering your respect for the Legion, I'll... Uh... Wait! Let me wash it first...

111205107.Title: Special Attention
111205107.Text: How are you supposed to work out with me dressed like that? Come on, let's head back to the Legion. I'll let them get you something comfortable.

11120601.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11120601.Text: So this is your Chief? Are you serious? Looks like such a weakling! I'd never take orders from someone like this... hey, stop tugging my bag!

11120603.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11120603.Text: Feast your eyes upon the weapons for slaying gods!

11120604.Title: Level Start
11120604.Text: A good weapon is a battle-seasoned weapon, no?

11120605.Title: Win Battles
11120605.Text: Aw, I got splashed... Next time, you guys fight. I'll just watch from the side.

11120606.Title: Lose Battles
11120606.Text: Can't even win this? See you in hell.

11120609.Title: Greeting
11120609.Text: Don't rush me. I'll send it to you when it's done... Oh, it's you.

11120610.Title: Conversation 1
11120610.Text: Wow, that new voodoo doll is adorable! I want to cut it up and throw it into the stove as fuel. Mmmm... I'm making an order now!

11120611.Title: Conversation 2
11120611.Text: I would never use something ugly like a forging press! Wielding exquisitely handcrafted masterpieces feels totally different from thrashing about mass-produced garbage.

11120612.Title: Conversation 3
11120612.Text: I despise the lawyers, execs, and politicians in Eastside the most. They talk the talk, but can they walk the walk? I don't think they can't afford to buy a weapon.

11120613.Title: Special Conversation 1
11120613.Text: Guns are cool, but I still prefer cold weapons. Woosh! Swish! Splat! And your enemy is gone! It's so romantic.

11120614.Title: Special Conversation 2
11120614.Text: I've been observing you for a long time. You really don't have an ounce of malice in you. It's bizarre... How can someone truly have no desire to hurt others...?

11120615.Title: Special Conversation 3
11120615.Text: Is there any conflict between loving cute things and loving violence? To me, they're the cutest when going at each other's throats with hatred and malice. Don't you think so?

11120616.Title: Full Compliance
11120616.Text: What I want to kill is far more terrifying than you can imagine. Humans are simply worms before Him... you still want to tag along? Ooh, you look so cute when you try to act tough!

11120617.Title: Idle
11120617.Text: Hmm, the knife's spine is straight enough, and the balance is on point. Now, on to the handle...

11120618.Title: Annoyed
11120618.Text: Stop! Do that one more time, and I'll chuck you into the stove as firewood!

11120619.Title: Special Attention
11120619.Text: Oh, you come in person today! You know, the orders are usually placed by your adjutant. What could be the reason? Do you also want a deadly weapon? Hehe, you've finally come to your senses.

11120621.Title: Dispatch
11120621.Text: Sure, I can run this errand for you. Just look after my workshop and don't let anyone in.

11120622.Title: Dispatch Complete
11120622.Text: It's done. Too bad the two didn't fight each other, sigh...

111206100.Title: Attire Obtained
111206100.Text: Visiting my shop at such a late hour... Do you have something good that you're eager to pawn? Or do you want to trade something? ...Hehe, I can do both, as long as you're sure you won't regret it. After all, you can't redeem what's pawned here.

111206101.Title: Level Up
111206101.Text: This is in decent condition, I'll take it.

111206102.Title: Greeting
111206102.Text: My clothes are special? Of course they are. They've been with me for a very, very long time. The one who pawned it has long been gone. You don't see genuine antiques like this every day. Want to come closer and take a good look?

111206103.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
111206103.Text: Hey, don't touch it! This paper octopus only likes its owner, and it's got a bad temper... Pawnshop rule No.1: keep your hands and questions to yourself. Don't ask what you shouldn't ask, and don't touch what you shouldn't touch. If you accidentally provoke something, I "can" guarantee your safety~

111206104.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
111206104.Text: Hmm? For me? ...What! Garlic chips?! Ahhh, don't come any closer! Are you trying to please me or hurt me?! Ahhh... You're definitely doing this on purpose!

111206105.Title: Idle
111206105.Text: It's fine to wander around in the hall, but don't go behind the counter. You won't like what's there. I'm warning you: curiosity killed the cats.

111206106.Title: Annoyed
111206106.Text: Oh? You want to peel off this yellow paper? Hehe, I don't know what will happen either, why not give it a try?

111206107.Title: Special Attention
111206107.Text: From the moment you walked in, you've laid your eyes only on me. If you really want to take something out from the pawnshop, pick up the ritual sword on the ground and subdue me!

11120701.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11120701.Text: Haha, so you actually managed to shackle me. Looks like you do have some tricks up your sleeve... What a refreshing challenge. I accept your duel!

11120702.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11120702.Text: Ha! Prepare to get torn apart by the mad dog!

11120703.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11120703.Text: Now, I stand at the apex, waiting to be challenged by you all!

11120705.Title: Win Battles
11120705.Text: Yeah... Yeah! Kneel and beg for mercy! Just like that!

11120706.Title: Lose Battles
11120706.Text: Don't get cocky! I'll win everything back!

11120708.Title: Die in Battles
11120708.Text: Ha... A gladiator should die... on the battlefield...

11120709.Title: Greeting
11120709.Text: Let's have a fight! If you beat me, I'll consider letting you through to the office.

11120710.Title: Conversation 1
11120710.Text: Why do I fight so hard on the field? Haha, no reason! I just like to win!

11120711.Title: Conversation 2
11120711.Text: Law of the jungle? Ha! Brawn is shit in fights. You've got to use your brain to win!

11120712.Title: Conversation 3
11120712.Text: What's the "Syndicate Spirit"? Winner takes all, that's what! Only fools care about ethics. For me, the end justifies the means.

11120713.Title: Special Conversation 1
11120713.Text: Mmm... You're a smart cookie. You're way more interesting than those brutes who are all brawn and no brains.

11120714.Title: Special Conversation 2
11120714.Text: Those guys who used to surround me were like dogs wagging their tails for a treat, so I dealt with them like the dogs they were... Why the frown? I don't mean you!

11120715.Title: Special Conversation 3
11120715.Text: Back in the arena, they always looked at me in disgust, as if I were a mad dog. Yet they also feared me to death. I like the way you look at me... you're not like them.

11120716.Title: Full Compliance
11120716.Text: I've only ever fought for myself, but you're a smart cookie who managed to "shackle" me... Then, my strength may also bring you victory.

11120717.Title: Idle
11120717.Text: Hey, come and throw a few shots at me. I feel like I'm getting rusty!

11120718.Title: Annoyed
11120718.Text: Pfft, you also want to taste some nails?

11120719.Title: Special Attention
11120719.Text: What are you looking at? Wanna fight?

11120722.Title: Dispatch Complete
11120722.Text: Here, these are the spoils today. Tsk, those chickens fled before I had enough fun.

11120723.Title: Level Up
11120723.Text: Yeah, just like that! Fight! Keep fighting!

11120725.Title: N/A
11120725.Text: It's finally my turn on the battlefield!

11120732.Title: N/A
11120732.Text: Ha! Prepare to get torn apart by the mad dog!

111207100.Title: Attire Obtained
111207100.Text: You've got some nerve, treating a gladiator like a guard dog. And just make sure to keep a tight grip on that leash of yours, or else... I might bite someone you'd rather I didn't.

111207101.Title: Level Up
111207101.Text: That's not enough. I need a few more reckless fools to sharpen my teeth on!

111207102.Title: Greeting
