111207102.Text: Look, all I see here are a bunch of dressed-up softies. Will they really give me a good fight? 'Cause if not, you better make it up to me when we get back.

111207103.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
111207103.Text: This outfit's so uncomfortable. It barely has any room for anything... Seems like those scaredy-cat rich folks do have a brain after all. But this little trick won't stop me... I've never tried using diamonds to fight before, let's see if these rich folks' trinkets are up to the task of being my props!

111207104.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
111207104.Text: See that guy over there? He's got a weird stench on him. I bet he's got poison with him. And that one, he's the type to hit first, and ask later. But his buddy won't agree... How do I know all this? Ha, don't play dumb. You brought me along because of my keen nose and sharp ears, didn't you?

111207105.Title: Idle
111207105.Text: We need to make a quick getaway? This route is the shortest. There are people in the way... That path ahead is blocked... Damn, planning an escape before the fight even starts is a new low for me... But this is an exception. Don't even think about making me do this ever again!

111207106.Title: Annoyed
111207106.Text: Hey, hey, hey, you're all flustered just from loosening a collar. You can't even handle this? Hey, you big oaf! Which hand did you touch my boss with? You don't want to keep it anymore!

111207107.Title: Special Attention
111207107.Text: No need to keep such a close eye on me... I won't run, and I won't cause any trouble. After all, you're the one holding the leash... What are you worried about?

11120801.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11120801.Text: Mhmm... The righteous MBCC Chief who destroys Black Rings and takes down Corruptors... Ahem, I've decided—you'll be my assistant! We're gonna crack tons of big cases in DisCity together!

11120802.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11120802.Text: "I'm Christina, the Eastside Acting Inspector who leaves no cases unsolved!" What do you think? Do I sound like a great detective?

11120803.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11120803.Text: "To find justice is to stare the truth in the face," they say. Now I can finally practice that.

11120804.Title: Level Start
11120804.Text: Mhmm... Well! ...What was the first step again? Let me check my notebook...

11120805.Title: Victory
11120805.Text: When you have eliminated the impossible, whatever remains, however improbable, must be the truth!

11120806.Title: Lose Battles
11120806.Text: Chin up, assistant! I'll always be with you during our quest for justice!

11120809.Title: Greeting
11120809.Text: My dear assistant, you're just in time! Well... Are there any spare band-aids in the Bureau? If yes, can you do me a favor and put one on my wound?

11120810.Title: Conversation 1
11120810.Text: Alas, this month's repair and compensation bill is huge! I-I swear I didn't break them on purpose! They... they got in the way of my investigation!

11120811.Title: Conversation 2
11120811.Text: What? The door to the Sinner's training room is broken? And the AC is acting up too? Those trapped inside are gonna die from the heat! Ahem, this must be a locked-room mystery! I'm gonna get to the bottom of this!

11120812.Title: Conversation 3
11120812.Text: Taking notes on electronic devices will ruin your eyes! If you end up with blurry vision, don't come crying to me! Here, take my notebook and fountain pen. You'll be better off using them for your notes!

11120813.Title: Special Conversation 1
11120813.Text: I saw this really cool detective at the Public Security Bureau the other day. They called him Doyle! ...What's so funny? He used to be different? In-interesting. I'm gonna look into it.

11120814.Title: Special Conversation 2
11120814.Text: Assistant, what would you do if your little sister never calls you 'big sis'... Should you swallow your pride and call her 'lil sis' first, or... should you write her a letter to say you're sorry... something like that?

11120815.Title: Special Conversation 3
11120815.Text: There was someone who would always lend me an ear, embrace all parts of me, and guide me just like you. That was once the whole world to me...

11120816.Title: Full Compliance
11120816.Text: Thank you, my assistant, for always being by my side. The road to justice is bound to be long and difficult, but I will give my all for the light at the end. Even so, will you still follow me? Hah, I know you will. Then take my hand and march forward!

11120817.Title: Idle
11120817.Text: Aha! I knew my hunch was right! My dear assistant, quit lazing around in the office, and let's get out there and solve some cases!

11120818.Title: Annoyed
11120818.Text: I made the notebook so heavy, just for... someone like you!

11120819.Title: Special Attention
11120819.Text: My dear assistant, are you drooling over my gadgets? Do you wanna try this mini voice changer or this air pistol? Mm-mm, no touch before taking tutorials. Want me to teach you?

11120821.Title: Dispatch
11120821.Text: Huh? A new case? Let me help! Let me help!

11120822.Title: Dispatch Complete
11120822.Text: Acting Inspector Christina has smashed—Ahh... I mean—solved the case!

11120825.Title: On battlefield
11120825.Text: Time for the Eastside Acting Inspector to shine!

11120832.Title: Upgrade Skill
11120832.Text: "I'm Christina, the Eastside Acting Inspector who leaves no cases unsolved!" What do you think? Do I sound like a great detective?

11120901.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11120901.Text: I can work for you, but let me be clear: I don't do overtime. My efforts should be reasonably scheduled. However, if the MBCC can promise me quadruple hourly pay, I might reluctantly consider it.

11120902.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11120902.Text: We have achieved milestones in our work.

11120903.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11120903.Text: All evils... will be exterminated by this lightsaber!

11120904.Title: Level Start
11120904.Text: I won't let any of this unsightly trash escape.

11120905.Title: Victory
11120905.Text: Hah! Even the air feels fresher now!

11120906.Title: Lose Battles
11120906.Text: Next time, I'll slash you all to pieces!

11120908.Title: Die in Battles
11120908.Text: I must stand up... to change all this...!

11120909.Title: Greeting
11120909.Text: Is this today's request? Got it. I'll submit a report before I clock out.

11120910.Title: Conversation 1
11120910.Text: My work stress comes almost entirely from the people I meet at work, not the work itself.

11120911.Title: Conversation 2
11120911.Text: Still working overtime? Go do something more meaningful, like reading a book. DisCity Labor Law is a good one. I presented it at the Nirvana book club once. You should really give it a read.

11120912.Title: Conversation 3
11120912.Text: Of course, I'll protest against unfair treatment and challenge incorrect propositions. Anything wrong should be corrected. I mean, how else will we make any progress in this world?

11120913.Title: Special Conversation 1
11120913.Text: There are many ways to relieve stress. I relieve mine by playing racquetball. I'd imagine the ball as all the things that annoy me and just smash it with the racket. I can spend an entire evening doing that. I'll send you the address if you're interested.

11120914.Title: Special Conversation 2
11120914.Text: My first boss was a useless freeloader, so I threw him to the dump. My second boss was competent, but I wondered if her intelligence was her only gift. As for you... You don't act like a typical superior, but you're probably the best boss I've ever had.

11120915.Title: Special Conversation 3
11120915.Text: Doesn't every kid dream of becoming a hero in the novels? But we can't all be the chosen one who has the power to defeat evil. In reality, you either conform or get consumed. But I refuse to let them change me, so I choose to change them instead.

11120916.Title: Full Compliance
11120916.Text: Working for you is really easy for me. I'm not saying the work here is simple, what I mean is... my mind can get a break here. I'm no longer chased by overwhelming pressure. An ideal world is forming gradually around you. Though it's just a rough model now... I can see its completed form in the future.

11120917.Title: Idle
11120917.Text: Work-life balance? Good point. Time to take five and grab a Dispresso.

11120918.Title: Annoyed
11120918.Text: Bother me again and I'll chop down on your face.

11120919.Title: Special Attention
11120919.Text: Get to the point. Don't ruin my plan of getting off on time.

11120923.Title: Level Up
11120923.Text: The new model is more efficient now.

11120925.Title: Join Team
11120925.Text: Nice. I haven't had a chance to decompress in ages.

11120932.Title: Upgrade Skill
11120932.Text: We have achieved milestones in our work.

11130101.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11130101.Text: Leaving the Syndicate mob alone but locking up doctors who can save lives? Humph, what a depraved MBCC.

11130102.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11130102.Text: I can see you've made an effort, but the robotic arm won't fully integrate with the muscle nerves overnight.

11130103.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11130103.Text: The dream of wiping out Mania will soon come true.

11130104.Title: Level Start
11130104.Text: Don't touch the pollutant. Keep up.

11130108.Title: Die in Battles
11130108.Text: Patients still need me, I... can't fall...

11130109.Title: Greeting
11130109.Text: Now that you're here, get working. Don't just stand around and waste time.

11130110.Title: Conversation 1
11130110.Text: When are you going to keep these Sinners in check? Brawling, getting drunk, gambling... It's like a mini version of Syndicate, except no one gets killed.

11130111.Title: Conversation 2
11130111.Text: There is no such thing as a gift of medical talent. I know what I have to do.

11130112.Title: Conversation 3
11130112.Text: People don't fear Mania itself, but the violence and death that it brings, and that is precisely why I must purge sinful thoughts.

11130113.Title: Special Conversation 1
11130113.Text: I have never forced a patient to remove their frontal lobe; they simply chose to live in the face of death.

11130114.Title: Special Conversation 2
11130114.Text: No clinician would want to see patients dying in front of them. Not me, and not Anne. So... forgive her.

11130115.Title: Special Conversation 3
11130115.Text: Turning into a brain-cutting demon to curb Mania is like sacrificing my left arm to stay sane. It's a choice I weighed, and I have nothing to regret.

11130116.Title: Full Compliance
11130116.Text: Since you want to be in this with me, I must warn you—there's no room for regret in frontal lobotomy, and it involves huge risks and blames to take Mania under control. Are you still willing to do this despite that?

11130117.Title: Idle
11130117.Text: The criminals are rampant out there, yet the Chief of MBCC is taking a nap at work... It's time to fix DisCity.

11130118.Title: Annoyed
11130118.Text: You have excessive dopamine and need a cranial examination. I'm not joking. If you don't believe me... try doing it again.

11130119.Title: Special Attention
11130119.Text: You're the first person without Mania that sees me regularly.

11130121.Title: Dispatch
11130121.Text: Time is precious in treating Mania. Stop bothering me with trivial matters.

11130122.Title: Dispatch Complete
11130122.Text: Don't thank me. I'm not interested in anything non-medical.

11130123.Title: Level Up
11130123.Text: You're content with this? There's still room for improvement. Keep going.

11130125.Title: Join Team
11130125.Text: I'll just put it out there. I won't save anyone who doesn't follow medical advice.

11130132.Title: Upgrade Skill
11130132.Text: I can see you've made an effort, but the robotic arm won't fully integrate with the muscle nerves overnight.

111301100.Title: Attire Obtained
111301100.Text: What are you looking at? Today I'm on special duty, so I look a bit different. Don't worry, come in.

111301102.Title: Greeting
111301102.Text: Lie down over there. Let me see if I need to hammer a few surgical screws into that weak, wobbly body of yours.

111301103.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
111301103.Text: Anne suggested that I should loosen up a bit and try on some different clothes, so as not to scare the patients and hinder the diagnosis... Hmph, now it seems like a useless gimmick.

111301104.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
111301104.Text: Though we're both medical professionals, I'm not like the scientist in the story who creates monsters from corpses. He wants to create life out of death, while I try to stop death from arriving altogether.

111301105.Title: Idle
111301105.Text: The temperature in the room is fine. Why are all the patients shivering?

111301106.Title: Annoyed
111301106.Text: No need to make a big deal about these stitches. They're just painted on with pharmaceutical ink. If you like them so much, I'll give you some real ones next time.

111301107.Title: Special Attention
111301107.Text: Indeed, there are treatments that use metal to connect brain tissues so that the brain continues to function. Are you looking at me this way because you want to try it out?

11130201.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11130201.Text: You actually invited a phantom robber inside... are you expecting me to steal something?

11130202.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11130202.Text: In these few seconds, I'll be watching you carefully.

11130203.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11130203.Text: When you catch up with time, you will feel that you can change everything.

11130204.Title: Level Start
11130204.Text: I already know the other side's plan like the back of my hand.

11130205.Title: Win Battles
11130205.Text: I planned this operation, so naturally it is foolproof.

11130208.Title: Die in Battles
11130208.Text: Ha... in a way, that's also a type of escape.

11130209.Title: Greeting
11130209.Text: Hello, Chief of MBCC. Let me steal some of your time. Please, stop working for a moment. Let's have a chat.

11130210.Title: Conversation 1
11130210.Text: When time is frozen, this hourglass is the only timekeeping device that will keep on churning.

11130211.Title: Conversation 2
11130211.Text: The more constrained I am during the day... the wilder I am at night... hehe...

11130212.Title: Conversation 3
11130212.Text: Speaking of that little bunny... Don't you think she's interesting? But she leaves behind too many traces. Rather than have someone else catch her, it's better to... tie her to my side.

11130213.Title: Special Conversation 1
11130213.Text: I can trust my back entirely to Pricilla... Isn't it romantic?

11130214.Title: Special Conversation 2
11130214.Text: Whether it's Eastside or Paradeisos, under the glitzy facade, it's all chains and shackles.

11130215.Title: Special Conversation 3
11130215.Text: Even though I'm imprisoned here... this place is actually quite free.

11130216.Title: Full Compliance
11130216.Text: I already have the most precious thing in the world. How about I leave behind my old ways right now? You'll be my witness.

11130217.Title: Idle
11130217.Text: Let times like these last a bit longer.

11130218.Title: Annoyed
11130218.Text: Are you seeking some thrills, Chief?

11130219.Title: Special Attention
11130219.Text: Don't blink! Be careful. This little fox's tricks can make you run around in circles.

11130221.Title: Dispatch
11130221.Text: I can complete your mission perfectly, but... would I do it?

11130222.Title: Dispatch Complete
11130222.Text: I got this gift for you along the way. Hmm? It doesn't count as a gift if it's stolen?

11130225.Title: Join Team
11130225.Text: I'll give you five seconds to flee.

11130232.Title: Upgrade Skill
11130232.Text: In these few seconds, I'll be watching you carefully.

111302100.Title: Attire Obtained
111302100.Text: Don't stand there like a fool! If we start running right now, we'll still have a chance to get the stolen treasure back from that bunny thief.

111302102.Title: Greeting
111302102.Text: Did I scare you with my entrance? But it's the fastest route... Besides, it's great fun to make a fuss at this hypocritical and flashy dinner party, isn't it?

111302103.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
111302103.Text: I have no interest in joining your field. I only volunteered to participate because I happened to discover their manhunt plan while upgrading the internal system for the DisCity Public Security Bureau.

111302104.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
111302104.Text: Whoever sent that notice letter is clearly very confident, daringly leaving a trail of flower petals as her escape route... Is she secretly hoping to be caught?

111302105.Title: Idle
111302105.Text: This direction... Ah, off to the terrace as expected. Care to guess why the security there is as loose as a breeze?

111302106.Title: Annoyed
111302106.Text: If you don't want to find something missing from your body later, behave yourself. Will ya, Chief?

111302107.Title: Special Attention
111302107.Text: Stay close to me and I will keep you safe in this chaos.

11130301.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11130301.Text: At last, we meet again... Sumire is the name of this flower, it's also my name. It'd be my pleasure if you'd accept this as a gift.

11130302.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11130302.Text: The deeper the roots, the more beautiful the flowers will be... Deadlier, too.

11130303.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11130303.Text: This body of mine has bloomed. From this day on, I will be a sharp blade that only you could wield.

11130306.Title: Lose Battles
11130306.Text: This is all my fault, this is all my fault...

11130307.Title: Ultimate Skill
11130307.Text: Cherry blossoms are falling... And so will you!

11130309.Title: Greeting
11130309.Text: Look, Chief, the tea leaves are standing. Could it be that pleasant surprises are awaiting us?

11130310.Title: Conversation 1
11130310.Text: Cut off living flowers, arrange them in shapes desired by humans, admire their elegance as they die... That is the art of ikebana. Sounds cruel, doesn't it?

11130311.Title: Conversation 2
11130311.Text: It's incredibly easy to kill a person. Too easy. Living, on the contrary, is hard...

11130312.Title: Conversation 3
11130312.Text: How enviable, that flowers are always thriving towards the sun. Me, I'm just a vermin hiding in the shadow... I don't live up to my own name.

11130313.Title: Special Conversation 1
11130313.Text: Only as we part do I know, men perish, as flowers do.

11130314.Title: Special Conversation 2
11130314.Text: How extraordinary, being with you makes me want to believe in dreams, future and hope... Perhaps I'm no longer qualified to be an assassin.

11130315.Title: Special Conversation 3
11130315.Text: Since the first time I'd picked up a weapon, I'd never dared to dream of going back, until I met you... Promise me you'll never leave me, please.

11130316.Title: Full Compliance
11130316.Text: I used to think it was already more than enough to just be next to you. It turns out that I'm far greedier than I thought.

11130317.Title: Idle
11130317.Text: Are you asleep, Chief? You must be exhausted... Once I seize a chance, I'll get rid of those guys who are in your way. When that's done, you can have a good night's sleep, alright?

11130319.Title: Special Attention
11130319.Text: You're always busy dealing with others' problems, but you must have your own worries too, don't you? If you don't mind, please let me be your listener.

11130321.Title: Dispatch
11130321.Text: Along this path, many have come and gone, and I am one of them.

11130322.Title: Dispatch Complete
11130322.Text: Birds return to their nests, as wilted flowers rejoin fallen leaves.

11130325.Title: Join Team
11130325.Text: I will never let you down.

11130332.Title: Upgrade Skill
11130332.Text: The deeper the roots, the more beautiful the flowers will be... Deadlier, too.

111303100.Title: Attire Obtained
111303100.Text: Thank you for coming... The cherry blossoms are especially beautiful this year, so I couldn't help but want to enjoy this scenery with you.

111303101.Title: Level Up
111303101.Text: Cherry blossoms are willing to bloom passionately for their admirers until the end of their lives, and so do I.

111303102.Title: Greeting
111303102.Text: You're not late. It was me who arrived early at the thought of seeing you... Don't worry. I was not bored at all, because I was just so happy to meet you soon.

111303103.Title: Pat Head
111303103.Text: ...What's wrong? There are petals on my face? (Blushing) How embarrassing. Thank you for taking them off me.

111303104.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
111303104.Text: Only by choosing the right materials for flower arrangements and wearing the right clothes to view the cherry blossoms, shall one live up to the beauty of nature. So, what do you think of my outfit, Chief?

111303105.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
111303105.Text: Cherry blossoms are also known as the "Flower of Fantasy," because they are as beautiful and illusory as dreams... much like this moment. The time spent with you is as intoxicatingly beautiful as a cherry blossom. Even if it's as fragile and fleeting as a dream, I'm content.

111303106.Title: Ordinary Contact 3
111303106.Text: Come sit next to me. If you don't mind, you can take a nap on my lap. I'll hold the parasol over you...

111303107.Title: Ordinary Contact 4
111303107.Text: Three days since I last held your hand, now cherry blossoms have covered the land. People often quote this poem to express the passing of time... I wonder when I'll ever get to go out with you again?

111303108.Title: Idle
111303108.Text: Did you see that? The butterfly that just flew by had a petal on its wing...

111303109.Title: Special Attention
111303109.Text: You keep looking at me and not at the cherry blossoms... Do you want to say something to me?

111303110.Title: Attire Obtained
111303110.Text: Thank you for coming to enjoy this beautiful view with me... I'm certain that, each night after this night, whether it's bright or dim, wax or wane, I will think of tonight, and the moon we enjoyed together.

111303111.Title: Level Up
111303111.Text: In the sameness of all nights, your kind words made this one incomparable.

111303112.Title: Greeting
111303112.Text: The moon hidden in the clouds just peeks out. Do you think it also awaits this romantic encounter with us here and now?

111303113.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
111303113.Text: "The moon, alas, is no drinker of wine." Chief, how about I tell you a story unique to a moonlit night?

111303114.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
111303114.Text: When I was little, I once heard about a rumor that foxes often transform into humans when the moonlight is bright, and invite the fateful ones to stroll with them... Hmm? Do you think I'm a fox?

111303115.Title: Idle
111303115.Text: Alone are the leaves and moon. Alone I hum the wistful tune.

111303116.Title: Annoyed
111303116.Text: Emm, is it getting windy? Allow me, Chief. I don't want you to catch a cold.

111303117.Title: Special Attention
111303117.Text: If you only gaze at the moon, you might overlook the scenery that truly matters.

11130501.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11130501.Text: These are the hands that arrested me? Your fingers are dexterous and strong. If only you could use them to paint for me... (Approaches) Of course, you could use them to do other things as well...

11130502.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11130502.Text: Passing off fakes as the real thing? That's just the basics of basics.

11130503.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11130503.Text: Are you still willing to trust your own eyes?

11130504.Title: Level Start
11130504.Text: Be nice... Give me your hand. Don't let those incompetent appraisers make your hand dirty.

11130505.Title: Win Battles
11130505.Text: Sigh, what a pity. It's too worthless to even warrant a fake.

11130506.Title: Lose Battles
11130506.Text: Oh no... They've spotted the flaw in the painting!

11130507.Title: Ultimate Skill
11130507.Text: Don't blink. A mere moment separates real and fake!

11130508.Title: Die in Battles
11130508.Text: Ha, real or fake, dead or alive... I've stopped caring long ago...

11130509.Title: Greeting
11130509.Text: How come you came back so late? I almost went to ask someone else for company... Hey, I'm kidding. Those people out there are just counterfeits. No one else can replace you.

11130510.Title: Conversation 1
11130510.Text: Hmm... Take a look for me. Which of these two is genuine? Don't get nervous. If you say it's real, it's real.

11130511.Title: Conversation 2
11130511.Text: An original work? A mediocre person like me with neither talent nor principles can't paint anything... But if it's for you, I'm willing to devote my everything to painting you my heart.

11130512.Title: Conversation 3
11130512.Text: The painters want to make a living by painting, and the buyers want to purchase famous paintings. I've helped them realize their dreams. Why are you mad at me, Chief?

11130513.Title: Special Conversation 1
11130513.Text: "Never give up on your dreams." Hahaha... That's the funniest joke I've heard in Eastside.

11130514.Title: Special Conversation 2
11130514.Text: I used to be an art lover and a dreamer. As for now... Ha, I'm still passionate about art, but I don't have a dream anymore. All I have is you, Chief!

11130515.Title: Special Conversation 3
11130515.Text: Got dragged into trouble by McQueen but still tried to help her and thanked her for spotting her talent... Haha, no one will care about such a fool even if they go missing.

11130516.Title: Full Compliance
11130516.Text: You're the only valuable piece in my vault that cannot be replicated... Trust me, I'd never said that to anyone else before.

11130517.Title: Idle
11130517.Text: What? Do you not find me attractive anymore?

11130518.Title: Annoyed
11130518.Text: Why did you stop? You're not interested in me anymore, Chief?

11130519.Title: Special Attention
11130519.Text: What your eyes see may not be true. Instead of staring at me like this, why don't you... verify it with your hands?

11130521.Title: Dispatch
11130521.Text: Hmm... It's about time to look for some new forgers.

11130522.Title: Dispatch Complete
11130522.Text: You asked me to come back so urgently. Worried I may dine with someone else?

11130523.Title: Level Up
11130523.Text: Stop giving me so much attention. What if... I get serious?

11130525.Title: N/A
11130525.Text: You know I won't turn down your request.

11130532.Title: N/A
11130532.Text: Passing off fakes as the real thing? That's just the basics of basics.

111305110.Title: Attire Obtained
111305110.Text: Fret not, my lost lamb, you've only stumbled upon my hall of flames... Oh... The way out? You'll have to distinguish... the real path from the false one.

111305111.Title: Level Up
111305111.Text: What treasure do you want me to bring you?

111305112.Title: Greeting
111305112.Text: Have you made up your mind? Will you become a follower of lies or a martyr for the truth?

111305113.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
111305113.Text: The only way to test if these flames are real is to touch them yourself. But if they are the fire of truth, a touch of it will burn you to ashes... It'll break my heart to witness that.

111305114.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
111305114.Text: Fangs and claws? How can I bring myself to hurt you with those... I've got this mistletoe branch for you, though. Take it, will you?

111305115.Title: Idle
111305115.Text: If you'd rather stay here forever, that's fine too. I'll keep you company eternally.

111305116.Title: Annoyed
111305116.Text: Oh, are you praying for me to get you out? Pray harder then... The goddess may just pity you...

111305117.Title: Special Attention
111305117.Text: Are you stepping into the fire and betting on your fate? Come on then, come to me. I'll lead you to... the greatest ending!

111305100.Title: Attire Obtained
111305100.Text: Oh? Who is this esteemed guest stumbling upon my theater? Well, well, since you're here, why not stay and listen to me perform this new script?

111305101.Title: Level Up
111305101.Text: This little tune you're humming is quite delightful. Can I hear it once more?

111305102.Title: Greeting
111305102.Text: Perfect timing. Today's show was just about to begin... Hmm... Where did we leave off last time?

111305103.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
111305103.Text: Last time we were at... as the poor painter grew old, her desires swelled... Insatiable desire was gazing at the painter quietly, tempting her and controlling her thoughts, until she succumbed to it entirely.

111305104.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
111305104.Text: You want to know what happened to the painter after that? Well, her first desire robbed her of her genuineness, her second desire took away her kindness, and her third desire stripped her of beauty... As for the ending... Well, take a guess?

111305105.Title: Idle
111305105.Text: (Relaxed exhale) I've been narrating this play for hours today. I'm too thirsty. My esteemed guest, don't I deserve some sympathy, and perhaps a cup of tea too?

111305106.Title: Annoyed
111305106.Text: Is it my play or me that you enjoy, my esteemed guest?

111305107.Title: Special Attention
111305107.Text: Oh my, do you finally agree to let me portray you in this play too?

11130601.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11130601.Text: H-hi there... Minos Chief... Um, I... I'm the notorious cyclops of Eastside! ...No one would bully me if they hear this, right...?

11130603.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11130603.Text: I'll try my best... to accept this power, and become... someone who can control it.

11130604.Title: Level Start
11130604.Text: Sigh... If only there were no battles.

11130606.Title: Lose Battles
11130606.Text: How... how scary... I-I'm really bad at fighting... I'm sorry... I'm sorry!

11130607.Title: Ultimate Skill
11130607.Text: Don't look at me... Stay away from me!

11130608.Title: Die in Battles
11130608.Text: I don't... want to... experience it again!

11130609.Title: Greeting
11130609.Text: Chief... I made some crafts today to give them to you. I hope you can be in a good mood all day...

11130610.Title: Greeting
11130610.Text: Chief... I made some crafts today to give them to you. I hope you can be in a good mood all day...

11130611.Title: Conversation 1
11130611.Text: Um... These are all... photos that I took before... but I'm not great at taking photos of people. Huh? You want to take photos, too, Chief? ...I-I will try my best!

11130612.Title: Conversation 2
11130612.Text: Ch-chief... That was from before, when I was really nervous... I couldn't help but dig a hole in the room... I was thinking I could hide in it or something...

11130613.Title: Conversation 3
11130613.Text: Will Mommy and Daddy come to find me... I... I shouldn't think about it. I'll only cause them trouble...

11130614.Title: Conversation 1
11130614.Text: Um... These are all... photos that I took before... but I'm not great at taking photos of people. Huh? You want to take photos, too, Chief? ...I-I will try my best!

11130615.Title: Conversation 2
11130615.Text: Ch-chief... That was from before, when I was really nervous... I couldn't help but dig a hole in the room... I was thinking I could hide in it or something...

11130616.Title: Conversation 3
11130616.Text: Will Mommy and Daddy come to find me... I... I shouldn't think about it. I'll only cause them trouble...

11130617.Title: Special Conversation 1
11130617.Text: Huh...? Are there Eastsiders here, too?... They won't do anything out of line... right, Chief?

11130618.Title: Special Conversation 2
11130618.Text: It's filthy inside the sewers... but also very safe. There, I won't get chased by the FAC or bullied by others... That's why... I just stayed there and didn't come out...

11130619.Title: Special Conversation 3
11130619.Text: There's a lot of weird people here, but... everyone treats me well! No one shuns me because of my background, and no one complains about my smell... Some are even eager to model for my photos. It's really a novel experience...

11130620.Title: Full Compliance
11130620.Text: The world is so much clearer and prettier without my helmet... Thank you so much for giving me the courage to accept and control my power... I... I won't run away anymore! But... can I rely on you a bit more? I'm still not that great at fighting...

11130621.Title: Idle
11130621.Text: Hehe... I captured another amazing scene! Look, Chief... Ahh... Sorry... I'm a bit too excited...

11130622.Title: Idle
11130622.Text: Hehe... I captured another amazing scene! Look, Chief... Ahh... Sorry... I'm a bit too excited...

11130623.Title: Annoyed
11130623.Text: Hey... ahhh! That... that... helmet is very dirty...

11130625.Title: Special Attention
11130625.Text: Um... right! Please don't... keep staring at me like that... It's making me nervous...

11130626.Title: Special Attention
11130626.Text: Um... right! Please don't... keep staring at me like that... It's making me nervous...

11130627.Title: Dispatch
11130627.Text: It's... not a dangerous mission, is it? ...No fighting involved, right?

11130628.Title: Dispatch
11130628.Text: It's... not a dangerous mission, is it? ...No fighting involved, right?

11130629.Title: Dispatch Complete
11130629.Text: Ah... Thank goodness everything turned out fine...

11130630.Title: Dispatch Complete
11130630.Text: Ah... Thank goodness everything turned out fine...

11130631.Title: Level Up
11130631.Text: I'm fine the way I am! I... I don't need to get any stronger...

11130632.Title: Level Up
11130632.Text: I'm fine the way I am! I... I don't need to get any stronger...

111306110.Title: Attire Obtained
111306110.Text: Ah! Chief... I-I'm fine. I just... accidentally got entangled in the wires and fell down...

111306111.Title: Level Up
111306111.Text: Hehehe... I'm getting better at this.

111306112.Title: Greeting
111306112.Text: Chief, you... want to hear me play it right now? But... I'm not, not ready yet... P-please, can you wait for the official performance? I'm still not good enough... I need to practice more!

111306113.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
111306113.Text: Can I... really do well on stage? Back in school, I used to watch the bands shine on stage, and I always thought they were so cool... Do you think... I could be like that too?

111306114.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
111306114.Text: ...My costumes for the performance are cute? Thank you! I made all the decorations myself by referring to comic books. I look quite like an idol in it, right? Hehehe ...

111306115.Title: Idle
111306115.Text: This guitar case is so fluffy... I think... it fits me just right... It feels like cuddling... so comfy... Zzz...

111306116.Title: Annoyed
111306116.Text: S-sorry! Could you please free me from this? ...Ah..! It's getting tighter...

111306117.Title: Special Attention
111306117.Text: Ahhh... Please don't stare at me like that. I want to... wear my helmet again...

11130701.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11130701.Text: Nice to meet you, Chief. I appreciate your consideration, but... no need to address me as Mrs. Braun... After all, that name is from the past. Please, call me Garofano.

11130702.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11130702.Text: I will do my best to protect you.

11130703.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11130703.Text: Now, you will never leave me again...

11130704.Title: Level Start
11130704.Text: Which delusional fool dares to touch my possession?

11130705.Title: Win Battles
11130705.Text: Everything's fine now. You're still by my side.

11130706.Title: Lose Battles
11130706.Text: ...No! I won't lose a thing! No more!

11130708.Title: Die in Battles
11130708.Text: It's fine. I can finally... be with you guys again...

11130709.Title: Greeting
11130709.Text: Is something bothering you? Whether it's trouble at work or clothes that don't fit... you can tell me, and we can sort it out together.

11130710.Title: Conversation 1
11130710.Text: Mmm, maybe I'm just used to taking care of people. I really enjoy being relied on... because in this way, no one would ever want to leave me.

11130711.Title: Conversation 2
11130711.Text: Ah, your cufflink fell off. Let me patch it up for you. Shh, don't move... Relax. I'm a professional tailor. I won't hurt you.

11130712.Title: Conversation 3
11130712.Text: Hmm? Why is your face so red? Am I choking you with the sewing tape? Please bear with me. This is the only way I can get your exact measurements... Didn't you say you wanted a better-fitting shirt?

11130713.Title: Special Conversation 1
11130713.Text: You always give me a warm sense of familiarity. We've only known each other for a short while, yet it feels like a reunion with a long-parted family when I am around you... I haven't felt this happy for so long.

11130714.Title: Special Conversation 2
11130714.Text: I've been through a lot of things, happy and sad. I cherish all those memories. But one can't live forever in the past, right? That's why... I'd rather cherish more what's right in front of me.

11130715.Title: Special Conversation 3
11130715.Text: Buttons are very special accessories. They can sense human warmth and solidify emotions. That's why I've kept my brother's button close to my heart all these years... Would you like to see it?

11130716.Title: Full Compliance
11130716.Text: I just want to button you into my body and make you mine forever... Ah, sorry, I mean, will you be mine? I will cherish you, protect you, and never let you be taken away!

11130717.Title: Idle
11130717.Text: You're so adorable when you're asleep... I just want to hold you in my arms forever, Chief...

11130718.Title: Annoyed
11130718.Text: If you want to get closer to me, you can just tell me upfront. Don't sneak up on me like that... I don't want my needles to pierce you by accident.

11130719.Title: Special Attention
11130719.Text: You want to have me too, right?

11130720.Title: Dispatch
11130720.Text: Is there a door-to-door tailoring service request?

11130721.Title: Dispatch Complete
11130721.Text: Don't worry. The order was completed smoothly.

11130723.Title: Level Up
11130723.Text: I will gladly accept everything you give me.

11130726.Title: Join Team
11130726.Text: All right, I'll stay with you.

11130733.Title: Upgrade Skill
11130733.Text: I will do my best to protect you.

111307100.Title: Attire Obtained
111307100.Text: Ah, we're trapped here together, Chief... It's as if we've been stitched together by these rain threads.

111307101.Title: Level Up
111307101.Text: The aroma of flowers, dampened by the rain, seemed stronger.

111307102.Title: Greeting
111307102.Text: Please stay closer to me, Chief. I'll shield you from the wind and rain.

111307103.Title: Pat Head
111307103.Text: This carnation you attached to my hair will remain my most treasured possession even after the sun shines again after rain.

111307104.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
111307104.Text: Be careful! Don't move... Your clothes have snagged in the twigs. If you struggle, they will get tangled up even more. Don't worry. I'll take care of it.

111307105.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
111307105.Text: If you feel tired, you can lean against me and rest for a while. Don't worry. I'll stay by your side.

111307106.Title: Ordinary Contact 3
111307106.Text: Oh, your hands are ice cold... No need to be nervous. I'm just trying to warm them up for you.

111307107.Title: Ordinary Contact 4
111307107.Text: You are getting closer to me... as if you can't wait to become one of my possessions. Heh, I know that you simply want to keep us warm on this cold rainy night, right?

111307108.Title: Idle
111307108.Text: The task you assigned me has been accomplished. Now, let's just stay here, and make it a temporary, little shelter that's only for us... until the rain stops.

111307109.Title: Special Attention
111307109.Text: To me, your gaze is like a warm light on this rainy night, impossible to ignore...

11130801.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11130801.Text: ...MBCC? What's that? You're not tricking me into doing something bad, are you... I can continue my inventions here? Hurray! I can use your special equipment and rare materials, right?

11130802.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11130802.Text: Thanks for the new saw blades. I've installed them around the engine to make a Chakram Mini Fan... Eh, this can actually be my new weapon...?

11130803.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11130803.Text: Look, this little flying car is my proudest work, because I can ride it to see the blue sky and white clouds, that's why I named it... the Formidable Tomato.

11130804.Title: Level Start
11130804.Text: Where did my Auto Dashing Wheel go... Eh? It's already... dashed out...?

11130805.Title: Victory
11130805.Text: Did you see how scary those guys look? They must be dangerous... Huh? I've chased them off already? Oh right...

11130806.Title: Lose Battles
11130806.Text: Next time I'll bring the Electric Darting Mouse too. It would buy us more time...

11130808.Title: Die in Battles
11130808.Text: The battery reserve... is running out...

11130809.Title: Greeting
11130809.Text: Chief, could you try out the Emergency Ejection Chair in your office? You're gonna be fine. I've laid out some sponge mats outside.

11130810.Title: Conversation 1
11130810.Text: What's in my bag? Uh... nothing special, really, just a couple of drills, hand saws, wrenches, pliers, and other tools... Oh yes, and a Foldable Auto Washing and Drying Machine.

11130811.Title: Conversation 2
11130811.Text: This Solar Spinning Top is a very interesting toy. You just place it on the ground, and it'll keep spinning without any manual effort... Hmm? But whipping it is the fun part of playing it? Huh, is that so...?

11130812.Title: Conversation 3
11130812.Text: Alright... The disassembly of the cafeteria's tables will be done soon. The next step is to move the training room's gym equipment here for assembly. With these Gym Tables, everyone can eat and exercise at the same time, saving a lot of time and improving productivity...

11130813.Title: Special Conversation 1
11130813.Text: Little jellyfish, what are you doing here? Didn't I tell you not to bounce around before the reinforcement is complete... Oh, Chief? This is not a weapon, just an alarm clock with bounce and chat features. In fact... Can I record your voice as its audio source? I think it'd be perfect...

11130814.Title: Special Conversation 2
11130814.Text: I replaced the movement of your broken watch and added in it a micro communication device that no scan can detect. Wear it and make a call gesture by your ear, and you can trigger the discreet call function. I... Uh... You always go on undercover missions, I think you, you may find it useful...

11130815.Title: Special Conversation 3
11130815.Text: My eye-opening journeys are the inspiration for many of my inventions, such as the Poisonous Mushroom Detector, the Wildlife-proof Tent, and the Convertible Camo Station Wagon... Speaking of, well, its passenger seat is still vacant... The seat's color matches the shackles. It can massage your sore muscles and is even equipped with a small work desk. It's also the perfect size for you!

11130816.Title: Full Compliance
11130816.Text: Lightning Escape Shoes, Auto Strikeback Shield, Nightmare Catcher Helmet... All equipped! This is the self-defense gear I took a long time to develop. Now they can finally serve their purpose! I'm certain they'll give you the best protection. Also, t-thank you for accepting them.

11130817.Title: Idle
11130817.Text: ...Is something malfunctioning? Time to take it apart for a checkup...

11130818.Title: Annoyed
11130818.Text: Hmm? What are these mysterious patterns on the lens?! Could it be some unknown optical phenomenon? I must analyze them carefully... Their shapes are... 100% identical to your fingerprints? Ah, so that's just your fingerprints... Although I don't quite understand why you always touch my spectacles, if that tickles your fancy, go on then...

11130819.Title: Special Attention
11130819.Text: How strange... In theory, reversing the electrodes should solve it, but there's no reaction... When did you come in? Have you been watching me doing experiments this whole time... Ah! I know! I've read about a theory that the presence of an observer can affect the experimental result. Keep staring and don't move, let me try again...

11130820.Title: Dispatch
11130820.Text: Hmm... I should take my new Tap Dancing Ice Cream Truck out for a test drive...

11130821.Title: Dispatch Complete
11130821.Text: Performance test of the Tap Dancing Ice Cream Truck complete. Um, the experimental data and user feedback suggest that I should replace tap dance with ballet...

11130823.Title: Level Up
11130823.Text: What other feature should I add?

11130826.Title: Join Team
11130826.Text: ...? What are we about to do...?

11130833.Title: Upgrade Skill
11130833.Text: Thanks for the new saw blades. I've installed them around the engine to make a Chakram Mini Fan... Eh, this can actually be my new weapon...?

11130901.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11130901.Text: We didn't fight tooth and nail to protect the Garden just to let it get ruined by you! How will you pay for this?!

11130902.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11130902.Text: This way... I won't be a burden to everyone anymore.

11130904.Title: Level Start
11130904.Text: Yes, I heard you. No detours this time, I promise.

11130905.Title: Victory
11130905.Text: This way, the Mentor will be proud of me too, right?

11130908.Title: Die in Battles
11130908.Text: Take me... back to the Garden...

11130909.Title: Greeting
11130909.Text: Are you here for the Mentor? ...For me? T-there's nothing I can do for you. Well, I mean... If you don't mind me messing up, I can try to help.

11130910.Title: Conversation 1
11130910.Text: Don't think that just because you've earned the trust of the Mentor, we'll all bow down to you! I'll be watching you for any missteps!

11130911.Title: Conversation 2
11130911.Text: Hmph, so the Chief of the MBCC runs on just a sandwich for a whole day? One without lettuce, no less? Irregular meals and unbalanced nutrition... No wonder you're all skin and bones... What are you tearing up for? I'm not worrying about you!

11130912.Title: Conversation 3
11130912.Text: The Mentor says no flower is born to be bent and trampled. But there are always people who ruin others' lives for their own despicable greed... They deserve to be burned in blazing fire.

11130913.Title: Special Conversation 1
11130913.Text: Remember to set off earlier next time you get a task on the shopping street. The claw machine? No, I'm not talking about that. It won't be restocked anytime soon. What I mean is, you're always looked down upon by those delinquents, so I suggest you put on some studded jackets. It'll work, just trust me, it's a tried-and-true method.

11130914.Title: Special Conversation 2
11130914.Text: You like the border of this page? My mom designed it. She said the journal was for the good memories only and all the bad things should be erased by the wind... After the Mentor left, everything I saw was gray and I thought I'd never journal again. Fortunately, she brought color back into my world... Yes, and you too. You also helped bring color back to my life, okay?

11130915.Title: Special Conversation 3
11130915.Text: Aren't you tired of looking at your device and the documents all the time? Take some time to catch a breath. Don't know what to do? Just go out for a walk. I do it all the time. Watch the swaying flowers and leaves, the bustling crowds, and the busy shops... That's what life is all about.

11130916.Title: Full Compliance
11130916.Text: We've been looking for a safe place for the Garden to settle in. I just didn't expect it to be here... Ahem! What I mean is, now that the whole Garden has moved here, I can extend my protection for the Garden and the Mentor to you. After all, the Mentor will be happy knowing you're safe...

11130917.Title: Idle
11130917.Text: Finally asleep... Both you and the Mentor are workaholics who never rest. At least pause to check on us... We're all worrying about you...

11130918.Title: Annoyed
11130918.Text: Huh? You want to pick a thorny flower? Then be prepared to pay with that hand!

11130919.Title: Special Attention
11130919.Text: What are you staring at? Do I look like someone easy to mess with? Quit staring!

11130920.Title: Dispatch
11130920.Text: Run errands? Sure. I was well trained for this in the Garden. You can count on me!

11130921.Title: Dispatch Complete
11130921.Text: Here's what you asked for... Or... is it?

11130923.Title: Level Up
11130923.Text: Through a century of slashes, the blade's purpose emerges.

11130926.Title: Join Team
11130926.Text: No need to come along, I can handle it.

11130933.Title: Upgrade Skill
11130933.Text: This way... I won't be a burden to everyone anymore.

11131001.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11131001.Text: Watch, homework, schoolbag... I've got everything. Okay, I'm ready to go. As a law-abiding citizen, I'll cooperate with you, as the teacher has told me to, but I hope you can be quick about your investigation and figure out you've got the wrong person; I hope to go home before school starts.

11131002.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11131002.Text: Look at the stats for my mushrooms... I can't believe my eyes!

11131003.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11131003.Text: My spores are accumulating... One day, I'll bend the world to my will, and there will be absolute freedom for me.

11131004.Title: Level Start
11131004.Text: Make sure my hat is always in your sights. Stay close to me!

11131005.Title: Victory
11131005.Text: How about that? Now you see why it's a huge mistake to underestimate mushrooms in little nooks.

11131006.Title: Lose Battles
11131006.Text: Told you not to stick your neck out, but you wouldn't listen. Now you got trampled down, happy?

11131009.Title: Greeting
11131009.Text: You're a grown-up, and you need help with your math from a kid? Wow, your student days must have been ages ago. Okay, these are linear equations in two variables. Yeah, I know how to solve them.

11131010.Title: Conversation 1
11131010.Text: Crying would only tire me out and irritate the others. My parents will be here soon to pick me up. I did nothing wrong, after all. You will see that very soon.

11131011.Title: Conversation 2
11131011.Text: Long-term Effects of Online Negativity and Anonymous Venting on the Human Psyche... So many big words. Chief, could you explain them to me? I don't think I've learned them yet.

11131012.Title: Conversation 3
11131012.Text: To be frank, life here isn't much different for me from school or at home. There are always a bunch of rules to follow, and a bunch of expectations to meet. I've been long used to this. Hmm, could they be right, that this is what compulsory education is all about?

11131013.Title: Special Conversation 1
11131013.Text: Many of my classmates look down their noses at mushrooms. They think that since edible mushrooms grow in the mud, they are dirty to the core, no matter how clean they look. After receiving multiple complaints, the school took them off the menu. That just makes me speechless. I'm like, come on, mushrooms are the way they are, because they want to survive, not because they're trying to be likeable.

11131014.Title: Special Conversation 2
11131014.Text: We used to get comments from people who stumbled on our forum, saying things like, "Trash should go where trash belongs." We'd counter, "Oh, welcome home." Then we'd repost it several dozens of times until they left the forum embarrassed... Come to think of it, what gave me the most comfort wasn't the act of venting, but the fact that I wasn't the only one harboring malice...

11131015.Title: Special Conversation 3
11131015.Text: Chief, you're the most knowledgeable person I've ever met. If even you haven't seen one person who doesn't feel wronged, jealous, or annoyed, doesn't that mean such persons don't actually exist? And if that's the case, I shouldn't feel bad for having dark thoughts, for other people have them too, right?

11131016.Title: Full Compliance
11131016.Text: I used to think all adults were like the discipline committee at my school. They only cared about what was going on in those noticeable areas. As for the mushrooms in the dark corners, they either turned a blind eye or covered them up. But now I know I was wrong. Not all adults are like that. Some adults do notice the mushrooms, and they dig the mud out of the way, never minding the smell or worrying about dirtying their hands, just so the mushrooms can have a chance at getting some sunlight, even if they're poisonous mushrooms.

11131017.Title: Idle
11131017.Text: Huh? Nobody is here. Great, here's my chance! That trusting little Chief's network password is simpler than the default one. It's surfing time!

11131018.Title: Annoyed
11131018.Text: Do you think you won't get a dressing-down from the teacher for doing this just because you're an adult?

11131019.Title: Special Attention
11131019.Text: This is strange. You're not upset with me, nor are you here to catch me doing something bad or see if I meet your expectations... So why are you looking at me like that?

11131020.Title: Dispatch
11131020.Text: Do not underestimate me. I started shopping all by myself when I was five. I have a rule, though. I keep the change, if there is any, that is.

11131021.Title: Dispatch Complete
11131021.Text: I got everything on the shopping list. You gave me just the right amount of money, no more, no less. You didn't do that on purpose, did you?

11131023.Title: Level Up
11131023.Text: Grow, flourish, and spread, slowly but surely...

11131026.Title: Join Team
11131026.Text: Are the adults here this useless? Even I have to step in?

11131033.Title: Upgrade Skill
11131033.Text: Look at the stats for my mushrooms... I can't believe my eyes!

11140101.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11140101.Text: Oh my! Many police officers have chased Robber Rabbit, but you're the only one who caught me!

11140102.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11140102.Text: The next performance will be even more spectacular...

11140103.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11140103.Text: The lights are set, and the stage is perfect! Are you ready? A spectacular phantom burglary is about to begin!

11140104.Title: Level Start
11140104.Text: Let me give you a spoiler: I'm going to run away in a bit! Better catch up to me!

11140105.Title: Win Battles
11140105.Text: Taking back the notice! There was a great response to this mission, too!

11140106.Title: Lose Battles
11140106.Text: I'm sorry... I'm sorry... I shouldn't have done that...

11140107.Title: Ultimate Skill
11140107.Text: Rob the rich and give to the poor!

11140109.Title: Greeting
11140109.Text: Good morning! Good afternoon! Good evening! Hahaha, this means I want to see you all day!

11140110.Title: Conversation 1
11140110.Text: How trusting the Bureau must be to just put their precious Chief right here before me... Aren't you afraid I'll stuff you in a suitcase and run away?

11140111.Title: Conversation 2
11140111.Text: When night falls, the whole of DisCity becomes my stage!

11140112.Title: Conversation 3
11140112.Text: I am the righteous Robber Rabbit, robbing the rich to help the poor! I am not a thief! Don't compare me to that kleptomaniac fox! Teaming up with her was just a coincidence.

11140113.Title: Special Conversation 1
11140113.Text: Well, I'm not doing this entirely out of righteousness... it's more like belated atonement.

11140114.Title: Special Conversation 2
11140114.Text: Chief, you should really find some time to control that fox! It sucks for me to be her partner.

11140115.Title: Special Conversation 3
11140115.Text: I guess maybe I could just retire and retreat from my old business... After all, you'll lead us to keep pursuing justice, right Chief?

11140116.Title: Full Compliance
11140116.Text: We will part someday, too. A free phantom robber won't stay by anyone's side forever... oh, are you sad? There there, I'm not leaving now. I'll stay with you for a bit longer.

11140117.Title: Idle
11140117.Text: The quality of this metal rod is pretty good... if you're bored, how about I dance for you?

11140118.Title: Annoyed
11140118.Text: Hehe, oh Chief, if you make trouble again, I will...

11140119.Title: Special Attention
11140119.Text: A phantom robber could disappear at any time. Now you see me, now you don't...

11140121.Title: Dispatch
11140121.Text: If you let me out... will you be able to catch me again?

11140122.Title: Dispatch Complete
11140122.Text: Ugh, there's nothing valuable there anyway...

11140123.Title: Level Up
11140123.Text: I can carry the whole world in my luggage!

11140125.Title: Join Team
11140125.Text: Oh? Is it my turn to shine?

11140132.Title: Upgrade Skill
11140132.Text: The next performance will be even more spectacular...

111401100.Title: Attire Obtained
111401100.Text: Notice letter recovery... So, did you like the shower of petals I gave you?... Hehe, since you liked it, I'll be keeping your heart...

111401102.Title: Greeting
111401102.Text: Shhh... Be quiet. You don't want irrelevant people to come bother us, do you? Come. This rose is for you.

111401103.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
111401103.Text: This mask is part of the Phantom Robber's identity. It should never be taken off lightly. But since you've seen my face under the mask, I can't let you off the hook...

111401104.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
111401104.Text: Cinderella's not the only who fled the ball. There's also the heart-stealing Phantom Robber, who left with a full bag of loot...

111401105.Title: Idle
111401105.Text: I'm so bored... One petal... Two petals...

111401106.Title: Annoyed
111401106.Text: Hey, stop moving around, will ya? You want to discover my flaws? Hmph... You're just like that damn fox! Anyways, my makeover is perfect...

111401107.Title: Special Attention
111401107.Text: Don't be shocked. I'm willing to get caught for a treasure she desires.

11140201.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11140201.Text: You're pretty lucky to have caught Roulecca! Wanna bet with Roulecca on something?

11140202.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11140202.Text: Yay! Is today Roulecca's lucky day too?

11140203.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11140203.Text: Make a bigger bet. That's still not enough... Let's bet everyone's life on it!

11140205.Title: Win Battles
11140205.Text: Roulecca wants an even more thrilling game!

11140208.Title: Die in Battles
11140208.Text: Finally... You've come to pick me up...

11140209.Title: Greeting
11140209.Text: It's boring to be alone... Do you want to play a game with Roulecca?

11140210.Title: Conversation 1
11140210.Text: Roulecca's heard a .45 bullet takes only 0.45 seconds to pass through the brain. Hmm... Who should Roulecca test it on?

11140211.Title: Conversation 2
11140211.Text: You know, Roulecca is a super famous assassin. Skills? Strategies? Intel? Come on. Only luckless suckers need those things. Once someone's in Roulecca's crosshairs, there's no escaping their fate!

11140212.Title: Conversation 3
11140212.Text: Growing up, Roulecca has never lost at any games. Roulecca doesn't need to cheat. Roulecca doesn't need to work hard either. Everyone just dotes on Roulecca—all the time. Right? Because you do too, don't you, Chief?

11140213.Title: Special Conversation 1
11140213.Text: Revenge is never Roulecca's purpose. Hehe, in fact, it's Roulecca's reason for living.

11140214.Title: Special Conversation 2
11140214.Text: Bombs, enemies, Black Water, cult followers, even those deadly monsters, Roulecca is not afraid of them! I'll dig out the truth behind everything.

11140215.Title: Special Conversation 3
11140215.Text: Don't forget that Roulecca has placed a huge bet on you. You can't lose your life to someone else so easily.

11140216.Title: Full Compliance
11140216.Text: Roulecca found another four-leaf clover! Hmm, with your terrible luck, Roulecca fears you'll never spot one in your whole life. Alright... Take this one. In return, play with Roulecca for a bit more.

11140218.Title: Annoyed
11140218.Text: You seem bored. Do you want to play a game with Roulecca? Why don't we—bet on this?

11140219.Title: Special Attention
11140219.Text: Wow, have you come to play with Roulecca?

11140222.Title: Dispatch Complete
11140222.Text: Roulecca is back! Roulecca didn't wander off this time.

11140223.Title: Level Up
11140223.Text: Eh? Roulecca can get even stronger?

11140224.Title: Pat Head
11140224.Text: Stop ruffling my hair! I'm not a little kid! Waaa—cut it out!

11140226.Title: Join Team
11140226.Text: Hmm... How much should Roulecca aim to win this time?

11140233.Title: Upgrade Skill
11140233.Text: Yay! Is today Roulecca's lucky day too?

111402100.Title: Attire Obtained
111402100.Text: Pew pew! Hehe, did I scare you, Chief? It's just a water gun! Come and play with Roulecca!

111402101.Title: Level Up
111402101.Text: Roulecca is going to win more ice cream!

111402102.Title: Greeting
111402102.Text: Chief—Are you ready to gamble with Roulecca today? Whoever loses has to buy three melon popsicles!

111402103.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
111402103.Text: Roulecca loves to play on Eirene's big ship. The people there won't get angry even if I win a lot of things from them, and they always rush over to take pictures with me. They keep saying "the god of gambling is alive" and what not... I really don't understand them.

111402104.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
111402104.Text: Lucky—I won so many cakes today! I'm so happy! However, many others also gave Roulecca dessert before, but... who were they? Hmm... darn, Roulecca can't remember...

111402105.Title: Idle
111402105.Text: Mmmm—what lovely weather! Chief, why don't you come and play something with me? Surfing, beachball—you name it! Roulecca is down with anything!

111402106.Title: Annoyed
111402106.Text: Haha... Chief, so itchy! Ahhh—Roulecca can't lose!

111402107.Title: Special Attention
111402107.Text: Chief... why do you keep staring at me? Is it because you like my shark doll, too? Hmph! This is Roulecca's hard-won prize! I won't lend it to you!

111402108.Title: Attire Obtained
111402108.Text: Roulecca ate a strange cake this morning and turned into this. Um, Summer put it there on the table, I guess. It looked so delicious! I couldn't help myself... Hehe...

111402109.Title: Level Up
111402109.Text: I feel like I've grown taller again!

111402110.Title: Greeting
111402110.Text: Hide-and-seek? No, thank you. Don't assume I want to play such childish games just because Roulecca has become smaller, okay? Or, I have a better idea... How about I hide in your embrace?

111402111.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
111402111.Text: Aw... No snacks before bed? One bite, just one bite, okay? Roulecca is a lucky girl so I won't get tooth decay! I assure you!

111402112.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
111402112.Text: Hmmm... Roulecca is tired. Chief, can you get Roulecca some teddy bears? I want to hug them as I fall asleep, like when I was little...

111402113.Title: Idle
111402113.Text: If I had been as strong back then as I am now, I would have been able to defeat them all even with this gun.

111402114.Title: Annoyed
111402114.Text: Do not treat Roulecca like a kid! Roulecca may be smaller now, but I am as clever as ever! Beating you will be easy as pie. Take that! Pew pew pew pew pew!

111402115.Title: Special Attention
111402115.Text: Hehe, doesn't this outfit look good on me, Chief? As one of my family, you should compliment me, too!

11140301.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11140301.Text: ...Who is it this time? Stop there, back off... I said back off!

11140302.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11140302.Text: I've gotten stronger? ...Oi, you. What have you done to me!

11140303.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11140303.Text: Rabbit, for you. You help me improve, and I bring you meat.

11140305.Title: Win Battles
11140305.Text: Extra meat for dinner! We made a deal.

11140306.Title: Lose Battles
11140306.Text: That doesn't count. One more round.

11140307.Title: Ultimate Skill
11140307.Text: Too late to run away, prey!

11140309.Title: Greeting
11140309.Text: Ooh-eh? Ooh-eh-ee-ooh... Oh, it's you. Nothing, I'm just chatting with Pippy.

11140310.Title: Conversation 1
11140310.Text: Never slip up in the Rust, or... there will be trouble.

11140311.Title: Conversation 2
11140311.Text: Money... Tell me what it is? Why does everyone want it?

11140312.Title: Conversation 3
11140312.Text: Pippy is not my pet. It's my lunch. Too bad it's too fat, too greasy to eat.

11140313.Title: Special Conversation 1
11140313.Text: Hey! What's that thing? It's... eating trash? I-it's coming at me! A robot vac—what? M-make it go away!

11140314.Title: Special Conversation 2
11140314.Text: They used to call me a stray, one without a home. That's not me anymore.

11140315.Title: Special Conversation 3
11140315.Text: I'll go wherever you go. If you leave without me, I'll go out and find you.

11140316.Title: Full Compliance
11140316.Text: You're different from other humans. How... I can't put it into words. It's a hunch.

11140317.Title: Idle
11140317.Text: Oi! Oi? You can doze off like that? ...Just like Pippy.

11140318.Title: Annoyed
11140318.Text: What are you doing?! I'm not a dog!

11140319.Title: Special Attention
11140319.Text: Why are you staring at me? What do you want!

11140325.Title: Join Team
11140325.Text: If I win, extra meat for dinner.

11140332.Title: Upgrade Skill
11140332.Text: I've gotten stronger? ...Oi, you. What have you done to me!

111403100.Title: Attire Obtained
111403100.Text: I didn't want to come... but Pippy loves it here. Emmm... Why do I need to change my clothes to play in the water?

111403101.Title: Level Up
111403101.Text: A water fight? I won't lose.

111403102.Title: Greeting
111403102.Text: You want to play in the water, too? Here, take this horse with a horn. It can float.

111403103.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
111403103.Text: Oh-eh-ee-ooh-ee (Talking to Pippy)...Pippy says these colorful things look pretty.

111403104.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
111403104.Text: I'm not playing with it. I'm washing it clean! ...So that I can eat it later.

111403105.Title: Idle
111403105.Text: Hmm... The water here is a lot better than the dirty Rust...

111403106.Title: Annoyed
111403106.Text: Hey, quit splashing around! Water's getting into my eyes!

111403107.Title: Special Attention
111403107.Text: My pants got a bit wet, that's all. Why are you staring at me?

11140401.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11140401.Text: Isn't this supposed to be a transfer? What's the meaning of this? Sinner... detainment?! Chief, please clarify this! What have I done wrong?

11140402.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11140402.Text: Thank you for the promotion. I'll work even harder from now on.

11140403.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11140403.Text: This may be the limit of my power right now. In any case, thank you for your trust and support.

11140404.Title: Level Start
11140404.Text: I will provide fire support for the team.

11140405.Title: Victory
11140405.Text: The video recording is complete. It will be archived so you can review the gains and setbacks of this battle at your convenience.

11140408.Title: Die in Battles
11140408.Text: Hold the line... Don't worry... about me...

11140409.Title: Greeting
11140409.Text: Hello, Chief. I've finished sorting out today's files. Most are regular purchase requisitions and operation reports. You can just skim through them. There are also several classified files from the higher-ups, which I've singled out for you. You may need to address those at your earliest convenience.

11140410.Title: Conversation 1
11140410.Text: "Don't pass up any opportunity to prepare before things really start." This is what my mother taught me, and it helped me through many difficult situations.

11140411.Title: Conversation 2
11140411.Text: I'm humbled every time I see Ms. Nightingale work. You are indeed fortunate to have the support of such a reliable adjutant.

11140412.Title: Conversation 3
11140412.Text: "The ten ring is only the limit for the target, not mine." I know, it's a bold claim, umm... quite out of my usual character. But when it comes to shooting, I have that level of confidence.

11140413.Title: Special Conversation 1
11140413.Text: The Executive Committee does have many problems, such as management deficiencies and disorganized staff. It's practically a miracle that it still functions... but I still learned a lot from it. I hope these experiences will help the MBCC's work.

11140414.Title: Special Conversation 2
11140414.Text: A tidy work environment is good for physical and mental health. If possible, I hope you can clean your office regularly... I understand that you're busy with work. You can ask me to do it.

11140415.Title: Special Conversation 3
11140415.Text: Please try to have a healthy schedule and rest on time. Leave what you can't finish to your subordinates. Don't push yourself too hard. After all... your health is critical to the proper functioning of the entire Bureau.

11140416.Title: Full Compliance
11140416.Text: When I faced those glamorous elites in the past, I doubted the worth of my own efforts. But not anymore. I don't need to compare myself to them. Ms. Nightingale, Donald, and everyone at the MBCC made me realize it's okay to just be myself. Thank you guys, and thank you Chief.

11140417.Title: Idle
11140417.Text: Want some coffee? I ground the beans myself. The beans are from my home... I mean, from Eastside. It tastes wonderful and doesn't have that bitter aftertaste. Are you sure you don't want a cup?

11140418.Title: Annoyed
11140418.Text: Please stop this behavior right now!

11140419.Title: Special Attention
11140419.Text: Sinner Matilda, code MBCC-S-745, reporting for duty. Please issue your commands.

11140421.Title: Dispatch
11140421.Text: The time required for the mission is estimated to be 8-24 hours, and I will keep you informed of the progress in real time.

11140422.Title: Dispatch complete
11140422.Text: I will submit the mission report to the administrative office later. Please take a look.

11140425.Title: Join Team
11140425.Text: Please don't issue commands that may place you at risk. Regardless of the outcome, we must prioritize your personal safety.

11140432.Title: Upgrade Skill
11140432.Text: Thank you for the promotion. I'll work even harder from now on.

111404100.Title: Attire Obtained
111404100.Text: Ouch, Miss Birds, please don't peck at my hair during my lunch break. It's rather rude to disturb someone like that. Captain, what brings you here? Has the forest suffered another dark invasion?

111404101.Title: Level Up
111404101.Text: It seems the detection capability of my antlers has improved.

111404102.Title: Greeting
111404102.Text: No, you didn't interrupt my break. I was actually patrolling when I encountered an infected beast attacking a little girl. I dealt with the beast and guided the girl out of the forest. It's been a long journey, and I planned to rest here before heading back to camp. If you need anything, just let me know.

111404103.Title: Pat Head
111404103.Text: Are... you helping me tidy my hair? I apologize for my disheveled appearance!

111404104.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
111404104.Text: Sometimes, when I relax and nap in the forest, the warm sunshine, the refreshing breeze, and the subtle, moving sounds of nature touch me deeply... Thank you for allowing me to help guard this beautiful land.

111404105.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
111404105.Text: That girl in the red hood called me a hunter, but hunting for the sake of a meal is not my intent. It's just that I know if we don't promptly deal with the dark-infected creatures, this forest could become a demonic cave. I believe that's why you established the patrol in the first place.

111404106.Title: Ordinary Contact 3
111404106.Text: Ah! Captain, our antlers are used for environmental detection and they are kind of sensative. Your touch is a bit too... Please be gentle with them.

111404107.Title: Ordinary Contact 4
111404107.Text: These little fellas are old friends of mine. You know, most small creatures are perky and less inclined to be near, well, inflexible elves like me. But they're different, and they've been friendly ever since I helped them find their forgotten food storage hole.

111404108.Title: Idle
111404108.Text: The sound of critters rustling through grass... is my secret lullaby...

111404109.Title: Special Attention
111404109.Text: I'm just feeling a bit dizzy, not hurt. Thank you for your concern, but you don't need to be so vigilant. Please don't get me wrong, I do appreciate your care.

11140501.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11140501.Text: What exactly does your M... B... you know, that Bureau of yours do? Who are the people in it? Am I supposed to stay in there too? How long do I have to stay? Hmm... And what time is breakfast? What fun stuff is there?

11140502.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11140502.Text: I've re-read the myth of the Sun Crow and I've discovered something new! Hear me out...

11140503.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11140503.Text: When the last sun falls, the survival land will also be scarred... Uh... Did I say something just now?

11140504.Title: Level Start
11140504.Text: What's that over there? It's moving! Come on, let's have a closer look!

11140505.Title: Victory
11140505.Text: Where do you guys come from? Where will you go after I defeat you? Your weapons... Hey! I haven't finished my questions, why are they running so fast?

11140506.Title: Lose Battles
11140506.Text: Sob... Why aren't they afraid of my flaming slingshot!?

11140509.Title: Greeting
11140509.Text: Hey! Ha! ...Oh, I'm working out, would you like to join? I learned these moves from my neighbor back home. It's great for your health, and it works wonders! My neighbor gramps does it every day, and I've never seen him sick!

11140510.Title: Conversation 1
11140510.Text: DisCity has many interesting legends, like how the cupcakes in Eastside are incredibly delicious... Could this also be a sacred sign? Yes, very likely, I must go check it out... But what should I bring? The address is clear, so I probably don't need the compass? Then... a bowl? Napkins? A small spoon?

11140511.Title: Conversation 2
11140511.Text: Why does it rarely rain in DisCity? Why do you use Hypercubes as your currency? Why do you have so many documents to read every day? Why are your shackles red? Can they turn yellow, green, or purple? And why do you wear the same coat every day? Do you really only have one coat or do all your coats look exactly the same...?

11140512.Title: Conversation 3
11140512.Text: When the Sun Crow descends, the day will never end. The last drop of water will evaporate, and the vegetation will wither on the scorched earth... Huh? Why are you making that face? Oh, They must have spoken through me again. Hehe, you'll get used to it, I wouldn't be alive today without Them.

11140513.Title: Special Conversation 1
11140513.Text: My grandmother said that I am a chosen and blessed child, and pursuing the gods is my destiny... I really saw Them! They must be hiding somewhere in this vast world! If I can't find Them today, I'll keep looking for Them tomorrow; if I can't find Them here, I'll go somewhere else... I've got a whole life in front of me, I'm sure we'll meet one day!

11140514.Title: Special Conversation 2
11140514.Text: Wait, wait, wait! Don't rush off, how did you place your shoes when you went to bed last night? The toe facing out? Good... And which foot did you step out of the room with first? Right foot, hmm... And did your eyelid twitch? Left eye? Right eye? Neither twitched... Phew, what a relief! You can go out with peace of mind now, nothing will harm you today.

11140515.Title: Special Conversation 3
11140515.Text: At first, I thought everything here was different from my hometown, but after staying for a while, I found that everything seems the same. Like everyone in the Bureau, they're all very nice people and care for each other like a family... And you! You're the first DisFriend I've made, and I want to introduce you to my grandmother. She'll be so happy!

11140516.Title: Full Compliance
11140516.Text: The ruins under the lake, the secret texts in the cave, and the bone that is said to grow one inch every year... And many more sacred signs my grandmother wrote in her notes, do you want to see them with me? Not everyone can see these things, just you and me! ...Hehe, I knew you couldn't refuse! Let's set off tomorrow. Ah wait, how about now!

11140517.Title: Idle
11140517.Text: ...Hehe, grandma's beef soup is the best in the whole world... I... I want more...

11140518.Title: Annoyed
11140518.Text: No, no, no! That's not how you use the Dragon Seeking Ruler! You have to hold the handle, then think about what you want to find in your heart, and it will start to spin by itself... Huh? How was the mechanism designed? Uh... Design... Mechanism... Th-the mechanism is a secret! Yes, a secret! How can I casually tell you the tricks of the mysterious Eastern power!

11140519.Title: Special Attention
11140519.Text: ...Ha, I get it! You must want to have a staring contest with me, right! Hehe, bring it on, I'm really good at this. The first one to blink can't ask questions for three days!

11140521.Title: Dispatch
11140521.Text: Heaven and Earth, the vast universe. The compass turns, and the good luck returns! ...Ahem, the compass points to the North, it must be that way!

11140522.Title: Dispatch Complete
11140522.Text: Ah...? Is it time to go back already...? I haven't had enough fun yet...

11140523.Title: Level Up
11140523.Text: Tell me more folklore about this place, myths, legends, whatever it may be, tell me more, tell me more!

11140525.Title: Join Team
11140525.Text: Oh! Are we going to beat up the bad guys? Surely I will give those baddies a taste of fire!

11140532.Title: Upgrade Skill
11140532.Text: I've re-read the myth of the Sun Crow and I've discovered something new! Hear me out...

11140701.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11140701.Text: Hello, my name is Jane. As you can see, I'm a Sinner. May I ask... Is this the place where Sinners come to look for work?

11140702.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11140702.Text: If I become stronger, will I get a raise? If not, I may have to make another trip to the vault.

11140703.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11140703.Text: You've done enough for me. The mistakes I've made... I must pay the price for them myself.

11140704.Title: Level Start
11140704.Text: Finally... It's time to enjoy the fight...

11140705.Title: Victory
11140705.Text: Hmph, so weak. Only a few shots, and it's over and done with.

11140706.Title: Lose Battles
11140706.Text: Next time... next time... I swear I'll blast those Corruptors into a million pieces.

11140709.Title: Greeting
11140709.Text: Is there a suitable mission for me? Preferably a solo one.

11140710.Title: Conversation 1
11140710.Text: Why do I use this kind of weapon? Because it's easy and efficient. I load a tailor-made grenade into the barrel, lock the rod into position, and aim to shoot. As simple as that.

11140711.Title: Conversation 2
11140711.Text: My family gave this bullet to me. They want me to be as unstoppable as a powerful bullet, capable of piercing any obstacle that stands in its way. Of course, it's also the last resort I keep for myself when I lose control.

11140712.Title: Conversation 3
11140712.Text: Over the course of a mission, I can be a weapon, a tool, or anything else you want me to be, provided that it's legal and the pay is good.

11140713.Title: Special Conversation 1
11140713.Text: No matter how badly injured I am, I deserve it. It's part of my atonement for what I have done. You... you don't need to be so concerned about someone like me. I'll try my best to make everything right.

11140714.Title: Special Conversation 2
