11140714.Text: What a psycho I am... Always finding satisfaction in violence and destruction. You must find me weird, right?

11140715.Title: Special Conversation 3
11140715.Text: Thanks to you and the MBCC, my family have returned to Eastside safely. I plan to visit them within the next few days. Wh-what?! You'd like to come with me?! I-isn't that a bit too soon...?

11140716.Title: Full Compliance
11140716.Text: If I had been more rational at the time, would everything have turned out differently? Ah, here I go again, thinking about the what-ifs. I know it. For all the choices in the world, there are no what-ifs, only the results. But I'm lucky that, of all my choices, you are the most correct one.

11140717.Title: Idle
11140717.Text: Eight, nine, ten... These bullets should be enough. Hmm, it's better to err on the side of caution. I'll pack some more. It took quite some time to take down just one Fire Bather during my last mission.

11140718.Title: Annoyed
11140718.Text: It tickles. Please don't do this when I need to concentrate.

11140719.Title: Special Attention
11140719.Text: Please keep your distance, even if you're curious...

11140720.Title: Dispatch
11140720.Text: Any place other than a bank is fine with me.

11140721.Title: Dispatch Complete
11140721.Text: It was a bit easier than I'd expected.

11140723.Title: Level Up
11140723.Text: If only my bullets could grow more powerful along with me. Some Corruptors really have thick skins.

11140726.Title: Join Team
11140726.Text: Let me be clear: If you insist on putting me on the battlefield, I can't be held responsible if anything goes haywire.

11140733.Title: Upgrade Skill
11140733.Text: If I become stronger, will I get a raise? (Pause) If not, I may have to make another trip to the vault.

11150101.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11150101.Text: My name is Victoria. Who are you? Where are you taking me? I... I can't wander off too far. When Daddy comes back, he'll be looking for me...

11150102.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11150102.Text: My body feels warm... Is it because of your love, Chief?

11150103.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11150103.Text: Cough... Such intensity is pushing my body's limits.

11150104.Title: Level Start
11150104.Text: It's been so long since I last breathed fresh air...

11150106.Title: Lose Battles
11150106.Text: Blood... So much blood coming out of me... Daddy will be mad if he sees it...

11150109.Title: Greeting
11150109.Text: Have you come to visit me? I'm well today. I feel energized... Cough...

11150110.Title: Conversation 1
11150110.Text: Why does the bird in the bell jar want to break free so badly? Shouldn't it feel more secure in a closed space? Only when you're shielded from germs and danger can you always be free of worries, no?

11150111.Title: Conversation 2
11150111.Text: With just a slight squeeze, we can send these small bugs to the other side. Do you think they'll meet Daddy there?

11150112.Title: Conversation 3
11150112.Text: White hair, white skin and white eyes, my looks frightened quite a few patients at SALVA. But I'm not a monster. My appearance is simply God's blessings, as Daddy once told me.

11150113.Title: Special Conversation 1
11150113.Text: Seeing flowers wither, I find it hard to breathe, like something is stuck in my throat... Is this sorrow? Or, am I sick again?

11150114.Title: Special Conversation 2
11150114.Text: Friendship, company, strength, independence, love, life... These are all things you have taught me about, things I must treasure dearly.

11150115.Title: Special Conversation 3
11150115.Text: Do we really travel to another world in death? Or do we just dream a long, long dream? Perhaps... You and I are already in that dream.

11150116.Title: Full Compliance
11150116.Text: Many in the Bureau have left their parents, yet they're not lonely. Is it because they have your company? Then... Can I also depend on you as they do?

11150117.Title: Idle
11150117.Text: One little butterfly stops by the window One little rose withers in the garden Picture of the father torn into pieces Sitting alone by the bed

11150118.Title: Annoyed
11150118.Text: Is this your love too? Hmm... I see. I'll try to get used to it.

11150119.Title: Special Attention
11150119.Text: Daddy used to stare at me like this too! Oh, the feeling of being loved makes me nostalgic...

11150125.Title: Join Team
11150125.Text: Pierce through all of them and it's done, right?

11150132.Title: Upgrade Skill
11150132.Text: My body feels warm... Is it because of your love, Chief?

111501100.Title: Attire Obtained
111501100.Text: Huh? ...Good morning, Chief. It's the first time I've seen anyone come here... Will you stay with me in this beautiful sanctuary?

111501101.Title: Level Up
111501101.Text: Mmm... What a nice sunny day. I feel so warm and fuzzy.

111501102.Title: Greeting
111501102.Text: Chief, have a piece of candy. Once you eat it, all your discomfort and worries will disappear. Which color do you like? Red? White? Yellow? Green?

111501103.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
111501103.Text: Here, fold the paper into a square along this crease, then press the corners on both sides to the middle. Then finally, turn it over... and voila! A masterpiece is complete! You have to put the paper crane under the glass cover as soon you finish folding it, otherwise it'll get hurt.

111501104.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
111501104.Text: Lonely? Why would I feel lonely? I live in a beautiful and safe glass house with storybooks, candies, dolls, paper cranes, and... lots and lots of love. They shield me from all danger. I'm the happiest little bird in the world.

111501105.Title: Idle
111501105.Text: One paper crane, two paper cranes... Zzz... Zzz...

111501106.Title: Annoyed
111501106.Text: What are you going to do, Chief...? I don't want to leave my room.

111501107.Title: Special Attention
111501107.Text: When the sun shines upon the glass and paper cranes, radiant rays of light will shimmer in all directions... Those are the colors of happiness... Chief, you must love it, too!

111501110.Title: Attire Obtained
111501110.Text: You're a "human"... as recorded in our inherited memories, aren't you? You look... even frailer and wearier than me. Do you long to sleep in my "cocoon" as well?

111501111.Title: Level Up
111501111.Text: Wonderful, even more flowers than last time...

111501112.Title: Greeting
111501112.Text: Shh... Keep it down, they're all asleep, waiting to wake up to a beautiful, sweet world. Would you... like to join them?

111501113.Title: Pat Head
111501113.Text: Do you find my halo cute too? Hmm... Although I don't really know what it is, its color matches my "cocoon," and it lights up when I sing... I'll demonstrate it for you. I'm sure you'll like it.

111501114.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
111501114.Text: I've been here ever since I was hatched, following the teachings of our inherited memories and singing for those who sleep here. I sing and sing, until beautiful flowers bloom... Lonely? Sad? Empty? Why would I feel that? This is my destined mission... Don't humans have their own mission? Oh, what a pity.

111501115.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
111501115.Text: Before you, these flowers were the only colors here. Picky as they are, they will never give up the vulgar, messy mortal world for the eternal slumber here if they don't like the songs... You smell just like them... If my singing pleases you, more flowers will bloom, right?

111501116.Title: Ordinary Contact 3
111501116.Text: You want to help me fix my bandages? Yes, please, I'd appreciate it... These wounds? They‘ve been with me since my hatching. They... are the prints of my defect... the marks of my kind‘s endeavor to save me, and the proof that I was loved...

111501117.Title: Ordinary Contact 4
111501117.Text: My cocoon is the toughest, most perfect shelter that keeps all dangers out... As long as I see it protecting me overhead, I feel comforted and secure...

111501118.Title: Idle
111501118.Text: Soiled souls on the earth, smiling flowers in the cocoon, fret not for the pain, may this song put you to rest...

111501119.Title: Special Attention
111501119.Text: Does a human's gaze always feel so searing...? Even when I close my eyes to sing, I can still feel its warmth and weight... How amazing...

11150201.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11150201.Text: An arsonist stands before you. Put me behind bars if you can.

11150203.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11150203.Text: I won't lose to it again. From now on, I shall command the flames.

11150204.Title: Level Start
11150204.Text: As long as I can protect those who I love...

11150205.Title: Win Battles
11150205.Text: But everything has been burned clean.

11150208.Title: Die in Battles
11150208.Text: The flames... devoured everything after all...

11150209.Title: Greeting
11150209.Text: Did you... come here just to see me? Um... did you bring some crème brûlée?

11150210.Title: Conversation 1
11150210.Text: Whoa! Do you... do you know what happened to my attackers?

11150211.Title: Conversation 2
11150211.Text: Stay away from me! I won't pay your medical fees if you get burned.

11150212.Title: Conversation 3
11150212.Text: My hair looks weird, doesn't it? It looks like it's on fire... Many fear me because of it, but they don't know what flames really look like.

11150213.Title: Special Conversation 1
11150213.Text: I won't randomly combust! Don't try it anymore!

11150214.Title: Special Conversation 2
11150214.Text: I hope that everyone I love can be happy and safe... why are you looking at me like that? If you'd like, I'll add you to that category.

11150215.Title: Special Conversation 3
11150215.Text: After fighting side by side with you for so long, I can now believe that this power can bring happiness to others...

11150216.Title: Full Compliance
11150216.Text: Someday, when this is all over, I want to make crème brûlée again with my own two hands... will you be the first to give it a taste?

11150217.Title: Idle
11150217.Text: Is the bakery we passed by earlier about to release new products...?

11150218.Title: Annoyed
11150218.Text: Are you treating me like a log? Drilling wood for fire?

11150219.Title: Special Attention
11150219.Text: No need to watch me like that. My hair makes me stick out enough already. I won't run away.

11150220.Title: Dispatch
11150220.Text: You want some info about food?

11150221.Title: Dispatch Complete
11150221.Text: I included a food review. Ahem, I just made it.

11150223.Title: Level Up
11150223.Text: Be careful, or the fire will go wild again.

11150225.Title: Join Team
11150225.Text: You don't have to worry here.

111502100.Title: Attire Obtained
111502100.Text: Is everyone excited about staying up on New Year's Eve? Ahem... Honestly, I'm not that excited. I just happen to be wearing clothes I don't usually wear!

111502101.Title: Level Up
111502101.Text: Ah! ...Didn't you say you wanted to see fireworks? I just set some off for you.

111502102.Title: Greeting
111502102.Text: Gotta try some new things in the new year. I... I've invited you over because I want you to try... the new flavor of my pudding.

111502103.Title: Pat Head
111502103.Text: Wah... You... Forget it! It's a happy day today. I'll let it slide.

111502104.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
111502104.Text: I... It's been a while, and I've made progress! The Bureau's kitchen is in perfect shape! Even the fire alarm... hasn't been triggered...

111502105.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
111502105.Text: I recreated braised meatballs, mapo tofu, and dumplings all with pudding! You must finish each and everyone of them!

111502106.Title: Ordinary Contact 3
111502106.Text: My mum used to braid my hair when I was little. I think this looks quite festive. What do you think? Does it look good?

111502107.Title: Ordinary Contact 4
111502107.Text: The lady in the library once told me a traditional tale. In the story, the queen has a fan that makes flames covering a whole mountain... I wonder if mine works like that too...?

111502108.Title: Idle
111502108.Text: "Springtime lethargy" is quite common... But hey, don't start on the first day of the new year! ...Anyway. If you're sleepy, j-just find a spot and take a nap here.

111502109.Title: Special Attention
111502109.Text: Why are you staring at me? Just say it if you don't like this outfit! So I didn't have to... What do you mean you love it?! Hump... You really are...

111502110.Title: Attire Obtained
111502110.Text: Uh, you must do it like this! Keep stirring as you say your wish out loud... D-don't worry, I won't tell anyone about your wish. I'll guard it as our little secret.

111502111.Title: Level Up
111502111.Text: The bigger the fire, the more likely the wish will come true!

111502112.Title: Greeting
111502112.Text: We made this Christmas pudding together. No... no matter how the taste turns out, you'll finish it, right?

111502113.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
111502113.Text: Every year around this time, Mom and Dad would deck the kitchen with these kinds of decorations. I tried to recreate what the holidays felt like at my home... What do you think?

111502114.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
111502114.Text: What... what are you standing around for? The Sinner who gave me the recipe said that stirring the batter and making wishes together is the most important step! I... I'm only reminding you because you're clearly going to mess it up, hmph!

111502115.Title: Idle
111502115.Text: Mmph... The presentation is perfect. The sweetness is just right. The texture is well-balanced too. Miss Faye didn't trick me with substandard stuff this time... But both types of dried fruit are so delicious, which one should I use... Eh?! Where did the rest go?!

111502116.Title: Annoyed
111502116.Text: This Christmas sweater feels good to the touch, doesn't it? So soft and warm. It reminds me of the sweaters Mom used to knit for me when I was little. They were heavy and unfashionable, but every time I wore them I felt like my mom was giving me a big hug.

111502117.Title: Special Attention
111502117.Text: You keep staring at my hair accessory. Are you craving gingerbread? It just so happens that I've written a bakery review rating their gingerbread. Check it out if you want... You think it's cute? W-well, your taste is not that bad then.

11150301.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11150301.Text: Are you with those creepy perverts? You better watch out or I'll... Oh, I'm sorry, that was Ray... Did I... Did I do something weird again?

11150302.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11150302.Text: I hope my acting skills will level up too, so that one day I can play a role that touches people!

11150303.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11150303.Text: Awesome, let's go kill some more scumbags together!

11150304.Title: Level Start
11150304.Text: New job? Alright, let's give our best!

11150305.Title: Win Battles
11150305.Text: Phew! Did we do well this time, Chief?

11150306.Title: Lose Battles
11150306.Text: No worries, failure is my old friend...

11150308.Title: Die in Battles
11150308.Text: In the end... I can't become...

11150309.Title: Greeting
11150309.Text: Have you gotten some rest today? Cramming too much work into your schedule takes a toll on your health.

11150310.Title: Conversation 1
11150310.Text: Sometimes, I'll go ballistic out of the blue, and become so aggressive like I'm a different person. That's because there's another girl inside me, she's... Are you laughing, Chief? I'm serious! I'm not a good enough actress to fool you like that!

11150311.Title: Conversation 2
11150311.Text: I'm warning you, keep your distance from me, got it? I'm not Luvia. Don't you get close to me.

11150312.Title: Conversation 3
11150312.Text: Voilà! This is the look I've specifically designed for casting! So... if you were the casting director, would you give me a part?

11150313.Title: Special Conversation 1
11150313.Text: I want to create a hero who protects the weak and stops darkness. I want... to be somebody's light too. Hehe, I'm only getting small parts now, but I'll keep trying.

11150314.Title: Special Conversation 2
11150314.Text: I used to think of Ray as a burden, but then I realized, she was in fact my guardian angel! Hehe, to be honest, I like Ray a lot... Shh! We mustn't let her hear it, or she'll call me an idiot again!

11150315.Title: Special Conversation 3
11150315.Text: ...Hey, it's Ray. What are you running from? I'm not here to shock you. Ahem... Because of you, Luvia... has changed a lot. Thanks... I've just come to say that.

11150316.Title: Full Compliance
11150316.Text: Hey you, listen up! In fact, we both... l-like you a lot! Hehe! Can you guess which of us that was?

11150317.Title: Idle
11150317.Text: Ray, listen to me. I'll be sure to protect myself this time. Trust me, okay? Oh come on, don't be mad, pretty please!

11150318.Title: Annoyed
11150318.Text: Um... Chief... Please stop... Please don't... Ah!

11150319.Title: Special Attention
11150319.Text: Wanna join us? Of course, I'm glad to have someone to talk to. Actually, Ray is pleased too. She's just too shy to let you know!

11150321.Title: Dispatch
11150321.Text: Yay, I can make it to the new series' casting too! Love you, Chief!

11150322.Title: Dispatch Complete
11150322.Text: Sigh, I failed at the casting again. But I did finish the task you gave me!

11150323.Title: Level Up
11150323.Text: Whoa! You hear that? That's quite dangerous!

11150324.Title: Pat Head
11150324.Text: Oh... Stop it, Chief... You're messing up my hair...

11150326.Title: Join Team
11150326.Text: Hehe, Luvia Ray is here to conquer you!

11150333.Title: Upgrade Skill
11150333.Text: I hope my acting skills will level up too, so that one day I can play a role that touches people!

111503100.Title: Attire Obtained
111503100.Text: "Luvia Ray, the symbol of happiness on a snowy night, makes her grand appearance. Remember to hang your stocking by your bed! Otherwise, you won't get any presents..."

111503101.Title: Level Up
111503101.Text: Ha-ppy holi-days! Hmm... My body language in front of the camera needs more work...

111503102.Title: Greeting
111503102.Text: Chief, the holiday-themed studio is super well-equipped, isn't it? Ah... Careful! If you damage the equipment... the Bureau's budget will be at risk.

111503103.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
111503103.Text: Sigh... I honestly don't get what's so nice about this outfit. It's so hard to move around in this... Change it? No way. I'm gonna respect Luvia's decision.

111503104.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
111503104.Text: This is a cool role! Working hard discreetly to be a guardian of others' wishes... I've made up my mind! I'll come back here to shoot more films next year! But next time we'll be playing the main role!

111503105.Title: Idle
111503105.Text: ♪Chief, can you stay with me for a bit longer? I want to enjoy tonight's view with you!

111503106.Title: Annoyed
111503106.Text: Luvia said don't just shake hands with anyone in studios. But if it's you... it's fine.

111503107.Title: Special Attention
111503107.Text: Eh, Chief! Quit staring at me, watch the movie! I know, I know, I only played a supporting role... but I gave a mind-blowing performance during the shooting!

111503110.Title: Attire Obtained
111503110.Text: "You heartless demon in a gray trench coat... You haven't played with this Luvia Ray for five whole hours! Accept your punishment. Take this, high-pressure water gun!" How was that performance? Much more like a blockbuster heroine, am I not?

111503111.Title: Level Up
111503111.Text: Ahh, it's boiling... Let's have a water fight, Chief! That'll cool us down.

111503112.Title: Greeting
111503112.Text: Ha! The other protagonist has finally arrived! Now we can start shooting the first scene of the first act of Summertime Heartbeat. Eh? What? You're not ready? Mmm~ Chief, don't tell me you haven't learned your lines by heart yet.

111503113.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
111503113.Text: Why do I look a bit upset? I'm not. It's just that I'm worried my wet clothes might get in the way while I'm fighting.

111503114.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
111503114.Text: Chief, what do you think of this summer? Are you having fun? Hehe... Not only did I finally get to come to the beach that I've only heard of, I had many more of my wishes fulfilled as well! For Luvia Ray, this is the best summer ever!

111503115.Title: Idle
111503115.Text: Does anyone else want to join the water fight? Jump in now, and you'll get a Polaroid photo with me—a movie star in the making!

111503116.Title: Annoyed
111503116.Text: I hope you did not forget that water conducts electricity.

111503117.Title: Special Attention
111503117.Text: Ahhh... I'm so sorry, Chief. I got your clothes all wet. Y-you kept staring at me; it made me nervous, and m-my hand was slippery with sweat...

11150401.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11150401.Text: I've been waiting for you all this time.

11150402.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11150402.Text: As long as you need me, I'll always stay by your side.

11150403.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11150403.Text: Everything that's mine will also be yours. This is the purpose of Hecate.

11150406.Title: Lose Battles
11150406.Text: I'm fine, I don't feel any pain.

11150407.Title: Ultimate Skill
11150407.Text: You... mustn't be too close to the Chief!

11150408.Title: Die in Battles
11150408.Text: It's okay... There will still be another me.

11150409.Title: Greeting
11150409.Text: Did you sleep well last night, Chief? Today's order, please.

11150410.Title: Conversation 1
11150410.Text: ...All is well as long as you're safe, no?

11150411.Title: Conversation 2
11150411.Text: How are Sinners different from Corruptors? After all, we all live, bleed, and die. What makes you think we're any different?

11150412.Title: Conversation 3
11150412.Text: If I'm gone, there will still be another Hecate. You shouldn't worry.

11150413.Title: Special Conversation 1
11150413.Text: You can be stricter with me. Those who are kind to me... always end up...

11150414.Title: Special Conversation 2
11150414.Text: Ever since meeting you, I've always felt like I'm no longer Hecate. I don't know what I'll become. When that day comes... will you guide me?

11150415.Title: Special Conversation 3
11150415.Text: If one day... I no longer exist as Hecate, will you still keep me by your side, Chief?

11150416.Title: Full Compliance
11150416.Text: I don't need any more orders, Chief. Whatever journey awaits us ahead, I'll follow my heart and walk with you till the end.

11150418.Title: Annoyed
11150418.Text: If it embarrasses you to say the order out loud, don't hesitate to just use me.

11150419.Title: Special Attention
11150419.Text: You don't have to do this. I'll always stay by your side.

11150421.Title: Dispatch
11150421.Text: Is this an order? Okay, I'll see to it.

11150423.Title: Level Up
11150423.Text: If this is what you wish for, I'll do it.

11150432.Title: Upgrade Skill
11150432.Text: As long as you need me, I'll always stay by your side.

111504100.Title: Attire Obtained
111504100.Text: Well, if you didn't request it... I wouldn't have had the chance to wear this outfit.

111504101.Title: Level Up
111504101.Text: I don't slack off even during breaks.

111504102.Title: Greeting
111504102.Text: What do I need to do today?

111504103.Title: Pat Head
111504103.Text: My hat? They say only painters would wear it. By the way... what's a painter?

111504104.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
111504104.Text: People always take pictures of me when I wear this outfit, but it's been a long time since anyone has asked me to put it on.

111504105.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
111504105.Text: If there's a chance... would you please take me somewhere outside the battlefield?

111504106.Title: Ordinary Contact 3
111504106.Text: I used to listen to bedtime stories on the phone. But one day, I forgot what the story was about, then the phone never rang again.

111504107.Title: Ordinary Contact 4
111504107.Text: Adjutant Nightingale said my sketchbook was very dangerous and shouldn't be seen by anyone, so I hid it in this box.

111504108.Title: Idle
111504108.Text: I have painted some paintings related to you, Chief. They all said I must not let you see them.

111504109.Title: Special Attention
111504109.Text: If you like this style... Do you want to make it the Bureau's uniform?

111504110.Title: Attire Obtained
111504110.Text: Hi, I'm an otherworld mage with the power to manipulate dreams and fantasies... These are my lines, right?

111504112.Title: Greeting
111504112.Text: Are you going to join us too, Chief? All right, I will do my best to protect you, even if it's just a game.

111504113.Title: Pat Head
111504113.Text: Mess told me that this is the gear only a mage gets to have... The bigger the hat, the higher the bonus stats. Want one too, Chief?

111504114.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
111504114.Text: It's nice to do something other than following orders once in a while... I guess this is what relaxing means.

111504115.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
111504115.Text: In the virtual world, anyone can become the character of their dreams, and do things that they can't do in reality... I guess this is what makes games so alluring.

111504116.Title: Ordinary Contact 3
111504116.Text: Nightmare also put on the new gear, it seems to like it a lot.

111504117.Title: Ordinary Contact 4
111504117.Text: Mulangrador... Ah... EMP says that to really immerse yourself in the game, you should say the magic skill names out loud.

111504118.Title: Idle
111504118.Text: O brave warrior who have come here from afar, accept the guidance of the heavens and stars to embark on a quest for the secret treasure...

111504119.Title: Special Attention
111504119.Text: Where do you want to go for the mission, Chief? Just give me the order and I'll come with you.

11150501.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11150501.Text: I, I don't know what a Sinner is... Sob, all of you gang up on one little kid!

11150502.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11150502.Text: Rewards are only for good kids, right?

11150503.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11150503.Text: Who do you want to turn into a doll, Chief? I can do it for you!

11150505.Title: Win Battles
11150505.Text: Eh—All I did was just wave my hand. Why have they stopped moving?

11150506.Title: Lose Battles
11150506.Text: Wow—they are so incredible. They even dare to resist my control.

11150508.Title: Die in Battles
11150508.Text: Strange... I can't feel my body...

11150509.Title: Greeting
11150509.Text: Ma'am! Ma'am! Ma'am! You like me calling you that, don't you?!

11150510.Title: Conversation 1
11150510.Text: The wounds... w-were from falling over accidentally! Everyone at the Bureau h-has been very nice to me...

11150511.Title: Conversation 2
11150511.Text: Don't listen to them. I'm so cute and well-behaved. Of course I won't bully others.

11150512.Title: Conversation 3
11150512.Text: Ma'am... They don't let me go out on my own to play... J-jailbreak? What's that? I don't understand.

11150513.Title: Special Conversation 1
11150513.Text: I'm so jealous of "The Homeless" in Syndicate. They manage to live in such a dangerous place on their own, unlike me, who can do nothing without Chief!

11150514.Title: Special Conversation 2
11150514.Text: Look! Isn't this doll as cute as me? But... its heart has been slit open by the baddies. I can't fix it no matter how hard I try... Can you help me, Chief?

11150515.Title: Special Conversation 3
11150515.Text: Will we never be separated if you have been turned into a doll... Hmm? I'm not lying this time!

11150516.Title: Full Compliance
11150516.Text: If a kid has done lots and lots of bad things, but he has repented, will you hate him, Chief? ...I don't want to be hated, especially by you.

11150517.Title: Idle
11150517.Text: Some other idiots said I'm not a "good boy." What should I do... Well, let me go sort them out while Chief is away!

11150518.Title: Annoyed
11150518.Text: Are you looking for trouble?! ...Hahaha, gotcha! I was just pulling your leg. Didn't I do a great job?

11150519.Title: Special Attention
11150519.Text: Why are you staring at me like this, Chief?

11150521.Title: Dispatch
11150521.Text: Shouldn't I leave this kind of manual work to adults? I just want to stay with you, Chief.

11150522.Title: Dispatch Complete
11150522.Text: I worked sooo hard for you, Chief. Are you not gonna praise me?

11150523.Title: Level Up
11150523.Text: I knew you'd like me best, Chief!

11150525.Title: Join Team
11150525.Text: For you... I will gather the courage to enter the battlefield!

11150532.Title: Upgrade Skill
11150532.Text: Rewards are only for good kids, right?

11150601.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11150601.Text: I've seen it all, your vulnerability, your weariness, your sadness... Come here, come to me, let me share your burden and pain, let me be a loyal companion to you...

11150602.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11150602.Text: Do not turn a blind eye to your own needs. Do not turn your back on your savior. A faithful "seafarer" shall attain the precious pearls they long for.

11150603.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11150603.Text: What do you see in the center of the vortex?

11150604.Title: Level Start
11150604.Text: Come here, step into my trap.

11150605.Title: Win Battles
11150605.Text: Thou, my enemy, shall forever be trapped under the billow and never see the sunlight anew.

11150606.Title: Lose Battles
11150606.Text: Tch, my tricks didn't work this time.

11150608.Title: Die in Battles
11150608.Text: I can't die here... I've got to, got to live...

11150609.Title: Greeting
11150609.Text: Are you here to look for the answers to your questions? ...Why are you being so cautious? I don't bite.

11150610.Title: Conversation 1
11150610.Text: Have you heard of an old deep-sea civilization far, far away, where the roofs of the houses are made of shells, and the walls of pearls? That's where I come from.

11150611.Title: Conversation 2
11150611.Text: Be quiet, and don't turn on the light. Only tranquil darkness can calm my soul.

11150612.Title: Conversation 3
11150612.Text: My appearance? Heh, I know what you're getting at. Strange, grotesque, terrifying... Are these the words you're looking for? I'm a monster, after all... What? I have a unique beauty? Me? This is the first time anyone's ever said that about me. Do you, um, really think so?

11150613.Title: Special Conversation 1
11150613.Text: Detested, like I used to be, by those who thought of me as a monster, or worshiped, like I am now, by the seafarers... It makes no difference to me, for I don't care what they think of me. But I do care... what I look like to you.

11150614.Title: Special Conversation 2
11150614.Text: This beautiful little thing is, in fact, a ferocious predator. It ate all the fish that once shared this tank. Ferocious as it is, it is forever trapped behind this thin wall of glass. It must be longing for freedom too...

11150615.Title: Special Conversation 3
11150615.Text: Sometimes, beautiful, harmless-looking things can be extremely dangerous. Most people don't realize that until it's too late. Ah, is there anything more exciting than seeing the fear on a horror-stricken face at the moment of truth?

11150616.Title: Full Compliance
11150616.Text: I construct traps from lies and illusions, and lay them all around me to ensnare whoever gets near. Sincerity is a commodity that is of no use to me. But why? Why the waters parted and the thorn thicket made way for you to come through and see behind the walls that I've erected around me?

11150617.Title: Idle
11150617.Text: I'm a bit tired. I think I'll have a bath...

11150618.Title: Annoyed
11150618.Text: You want to know what happened to those eager souls who came to me for help? What do you think happened to them? Of course I gave them what they wanted and made them live happily ever after.

11150619.Title: Special Attention
11150619.Text: Yeah, you're getting the hang of it now... Don't devert your eyes. Can you feel yourself being enveloped by the waves? Okay, let them wash away your pain, bring you serenity, cleanse you of all your sins.

11150620.Title: Dispatch
11150620.Text: Good, let us commiserate with more lost souls.

11150621.Title: Dispatch Complete
11150621.Text: Hmm, more seafarers have received the blessing.

11150623.Title: Level Up
11150623.Text: The more you offer, the more you will receive. Now, show me how sincere you are.

11150625.Title: On battlefield
11150625.Text: Whatever wishes you have, you can tell me.

11150632.Title: Upgrade Skill
11150632.Text: Do not turn a blind eye to your own needs. Do not turn your back on your savior. A faithful "seafarer" shall attain the precious pearls they long for.

111506100.Title: Attire Obtained
111506100.Text: Please don't be afraid. I... I am... uh... a mermaid who just owned my legs... Yes, I was captured by some merchant seamen and smuggled here. I managed to escape with your help. I'm not gonna hurt you, nor do I have the strength to do so. If you don't believe me, you can take the pearls that my teardrops turn into when I cry... as long as you agree to help me.

111506101.Title: Level Up
111506101.Text: Thank you for freeing me from entanglement.

111506102.Title: Greeting
111506102.Text: You've come just at the right time, savior. It just occurs to me that a brigantine arrived here from the Black Sea not so long ago. Could it be the vessel you've been looking for, the "Madame Maelstrom"? If you wish to check it out, I'll be happy to show you the way.

111506103.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
111506103.Text: The elders warned me against greedy humans who would harm me for my appearance, tears, and flesh. But I know there are also good people like you in this world, pure in body and spirit, who must taste... Ah, I mean, who should be blessed with all the luck they need in their endeavors.

111506104.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
111506104.Text: When you fulfill your dream of becoming a great sailor, please do visit me at my home. We live in the depths of Mother Sea, in a palace adorned with coral and gems, where music is played with conches and turtles... The undercurrents and whirlpools safeguarding us may be a bit dangerous. Nevertheless, I don't think they will pose much of a challenge to you.

111506105.Title: Idle
111506105.Text: I sing in the deep sea, lulling you to sleep. As you fulfill your dream in dream, I'll have my feast complete.

111506106.Title: Annoyed
111506106.Text: Ah... Oh, it's okay. You didn't hurt me. I got this wound from the sailboats and wish bottles while I was in the sea. It will heal on its own. Don't worry about me...

111506107.Title: Special Attention
111506107.Text: Please don't... don't stare at my legs like that. I've just got them, and they are still fragile. But I think they will become strong enough very soon, provided that there's enough love... and nourishment.

11150701.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11150701.Text: I'm a free musician, a star of the streets! The genius saxophonist who never forgets a note... Echo, at your service! Now, aren't you excited to hear me play a tune after that introduction?

11150702.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11150702.Text: A mere few pages of sheet music are no challenge to me at all!

11150703.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11150703.Text: The saxophone genius is about to give the most spectacular performance! You won't want to miss it!

11150704.Title: Level Start
11150704.Text: This invigorating march will be the opening theme of our battle!

11150705.Title: Win Battles
11150705.Text: That marks the end of Echo's perfect performance, thank you!

11150706.Title: Lose Battles
11150706.Text: Oops, I messed up the notes...

11150707.Title: Ultimate Skill
11150707.Text: Listen to this wonderful, miraculous melody!

11150709.Title: Greeting
11150709.Text: Hey you, sleepyhead. Should I play a tune to wake you up?

11150710.Title: Conversation 1
11150710.Text: Outfit, perfect. Stage, perfect. Saxophone, perfect! Okay, I'm ready to... Hey, don't touch my carefully arranged props! The ambiance matters to buskers too!

11150711.Title: Conversation 2
11150711.Text: Hmm, hmm... Oh, I'm thinking of a new song! I once read a quote that says art is inspired by life. It's spot on! I'm immediately filled with inspiration after eating!

11150712.Title: Conversation 3
11150712.Text: Slacking off? Of course not! I've memorized all those materials! Don't believe it? Quiz me then, I owe you one if I fail! If that's not enough, I can even recite the entire menu of the cafeteria for the past three weeks!

11150713.Title: Special Conversation 1
11150713.Text: Well, I'm sure people just haven't noticed me yet. It happens to all the geniuses! I just know that as long as I keep playing, everyone will fall in love with my music one day!

11150714.Title: Special Conversation 2
11150714.Text: Feeling down? Let me sing a song for you! Back in the orphanage, everyone loved my singing! Whenever I sang, people would laugh so happily! I wonder if my singing voice brings joy to others?

11150715.Title: Special Conversation 3
11150715.Text: I hope my performances can touch many, many people! Being watched, admired, and remembered... means I'd never be forgotten or feel lonely again! Just thinking about it makes me so happy!

11150716.Title: Full Compliance
11150716.Text: Don't tell anyone, but even a genius like me gets nervous when performing... But as soon as I feel your gaze from the audience, all my anxiety is gone, and my body is filled with strength! Because I know there's someone who'll always support me... Thank you, my number one fan!

11150717.Title: Idle
11150717.Text: Wow~ This place is really cozy, much warmer than the underpass! Let me try out this mattress!

11150718.Title: Annoyed
11150718.Text: Hey, hands off my Kute! ...Yeah, so what if I've named my saxophone? It's my precious friend!

11150719.Title: Special Attention
11150719.Text: Okay, okay, I know what you want! Here you go. Keep it safe though, the genius saxophonist's autograph is priceless!

11150720.Title: Dispatch
11150720.Text: Busking? That's my bread and butter! I've got this!

11150721.Title: Dispatch Complete
11150721.Text: Weird... Why are the other buskers all shoving money at me and begging me to leave... Hmm, I must be too good at the saxophone!

11150723.Title: Level Up
11150723.Text: Is there more? I want more~

11150725.Title: On battlefield
11150725.Text: Come! Let me show you what a true saxophone genius sounds like!

11150732.Title: Upgrade Skill
11150732.Text: A mere few pages of sheet music are no challenge to me at all!

11160101.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11160101.Text: I came crawling back after doing so many wrong things... Chief, please don't tell my father. I can't bring more shame to my family.

11160102.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11160102.Text: I don't want anyone else to get hurt.

11160103.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11160103.Text: This way, I can help alleviate more people's suffering. Sorry... you must have been waiting for a long time.

11160104.Title: Level Start
11160104.Text: Don't let go of my hand.

11160105.Title: Win Battles
11160105.Text: Thank you everyone for your hard work!

11160106.Title: Lose Battles
11160106.Text: I'm sorry, it's all my fault... I messed things up for everyone...

11160109.Title: Greeting
11160109.Text: Chief, you look tired. Want me to help you relax? I know a thing or two about relieving pressure.

11160110.Title: Conversation 1
11160110.Text: Why does everyone keep staring at my clothes? This is the most basic gown my family owns...

11160111.Title: Conversation 2
11160111.Text: I'm sorry, Chief... As a Sinner, I don't have any special combat skills, but I hope I can help others with my healing power. Even... even if I can help just a little bit.

11160112.Title: Conversation 3
11160112.Text: I'm a member of the Spencer family... but don't call me something pretentious like "my lady"... Call me Ariel.

11160113.Title: Special Conversation 1
11160113.Text: Chief... do you have any older siblings? It's exhausting to try to live up to talented siblings. Sometimes... I feel that it's hopeless no matter how hard I try...

11160114.Title: Special Conversation 2
11160114.Text: Oh Corruptors... your bodies are rotting constantly, so you must feel a lot of pain. Your disfigurement and pain is worsening... I'm sorry, I will definitely try to become stronger to save you.

11160115.Title: Special Conversation 3
11160115.Text: Please don't stay up too late, it's not good for your health. Let me help you finish this work! Sigh... are you staying up late because I suck at my job? I'm sorry! It's all my fault!

11160116.Title: Full Compliance
11160116.Text: Please don't venture off too far from me on our next mission... If we get split up again, we'll become the laughing stock.

11160117.Title: Idle
11160117.Text: What can I do to help? Sigh... no! I cannot give up. I know I can succeed!

11160118.Title: Annoyed
11160118.Text: Chief... if I did anything wrong, please tell me directly... please... please don't be like this...

11160119.Title: Special Attention
11160119.Text: Huh? ... Chief, why are you staring at me like this? ... Did I do something wrong?

11160122.Title: Dispatch Complete
11160122.Text: I hope I didn't embarrass the Spencer family...?

11160123.Title: Level Up
11160123.Text: I hope I can become an asset to you.

11160124.Title: Pat Head
11160124.Text: Hmm? Chief... your hand is a bit cold.

11160126.Title: Join Team
11160126.Text: I don't like to fight, but I don't like to flee either.

11160133.Title: Upgrade Skill
11160133.Text: I don't want anyone else to get hurt.

111601100.Title: Attire Obtained
111601100.Text: Is it really okay for me to have this dress? Thank you, Chief. In return for your kindness... let me play a song for you.

111601101.Title: Level Up
111601101.Text: I hope you like my performance.

111601102.Title: Greeting
111601102.Text: You look tired. Would you like to listen to some soothing music on the piano?

111601103.Title: Pat Head
111601103.Text: Aw... I can't concentrate... like this...

111601104.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
111601104.Text: Music... expresses a wide gamut of emotions. Well... I wonder if you felt my emotions, Chief?

111601105.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
111601105.Text: I can't help feeling a little nervous when I think about playing the piano in front of you...

111601106.Title: Ordinary Contact 3
111601106.Text: Chief... If you don't mind, would you like to play a piano duet with me?

111601107.Title: Ordinary Contact 4
111601107.Text: I often forget to release the right pedal when I'm nervous... Sorry, that must have sounded terrible...

111601108.Title: Idle
111601108.Text: Hmm... Which song should I practice today... Will Chief like this one?

111601109.Title: Special Attention
111601109.Text: Oh? Do you want to hear something else...? Phew—I'm glad I have prepared other songs as well.

111601110.Title: Attire Obtained
111601110.Text: Lush green gardens, grand golden halls, and... cramped rooms. (Sigh) This is the Spencer house, a place I can never leave.

111601111.Title: Level Up
111601111.Text: It seems... I can see further out.

111601112.Title: Greeting
111601112.Text: My mood always gets a lot better every time I see these flowers in my room.

111601113.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
111601113.Text: I've always wondered... if I'd run away from home and hid in where they have to search for one whole day, then, would they... care about me a little more?

111601114.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
111601114.Text: I've heard... that anyone or anything that got tainted with Mania will become the most evil beings in the world... But, they didn't become like that voluntarily, did they? They must be in pain too... If only I could help them...

111601115.Title: Idle
111601115.Text: (Sigh) My big brothers and sisters are all so outstanding. I wish I could be like them...

111601116.Title: Annoyed
111601116.Text: How much longer will this monotonous life continue?

111601117.Title: Special Attention
111601117.Text: At tomorrow's ball, I must bring out the best in me and do the Spencer family proud! Oh, I almost forgot to get my dress ready.

11160201.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11160201.Text: How brave of you to face me up close and personal... What if I hypnotize you again, Chief?

11160202.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11160202.Text: Can't wait to fall into a deeper dream, can you?

11160203.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11160203.Text: I never knew such wonders existed beyond the bounds of knowledge...

11160204.Title: Level Start
11160204.Text: Now, whose pain will I uncover here?

11160206.Title: Lose Battles
11160206.Text: Occasional failures are essential for a balanced mind.

11160208.Title: Die in Battles
11160208.Text: This is the ending... I deserve...

11160209.Title: Greeting
11160209.Text: Hello, Dear Chief. If you have something on your mind, feel free to chat with me. How much do I charge? Oh, money is not what I want from you.

11160210.Title: Conversation 1
11160210.Text: Consciousness is a prison, and every one serves a life sentence in it. In the face of it, your Bureau is but a toy jail.

11160211.Title: Conversation 2
11160211.Text: Why psychology? Well, because it's an elegant, graceful science. I don't need any scalpels to kill you... I'm just kidding, don't be so tense.

11160212.Title: Conversation 3
11160212.Text: Tick, tock, tick, tock... Life is like the pendulum of a clock, constantly swinging between pain and weariness.

11160213.Title: Special Conversation 1
11160213.Text: Every night, quite a few Sinners are plagued by nightmares. I'd like to talk to them, individually and privately. I hope you won't mind?

11160214.Title: Special Conversation 2
11160214.Text: The beast deep in our consciousness will be roused one day. When the time comes, will you be able to subdue it, or will you get devoured by it, till there's nothing left of you? I look forward to finding out.

11160215.Title: Special Conversation 3
11160215.Text: The so-called mercy from others is like a flock of vultures. When an atrocity happens, they circle above your head, screeching and squeaking. Only when the victim stops struggling will they land, and scavenge for the last bits of bloody flesh.

11160216.Title: Full Compliance
11160216.Text: The most stubborn patient and the most ruthless psychologist—don't we make the perfect pair?

11160217.Title: Idle
11160217.Text: Look at the pocket watch. Relax, relax. You'll begin to feel sleepy... and sleepier... Tell me, what did you see in your dreams?

11160218.Title: Annoyed
11160218.Text: I know what you're thinking about... No subconscious impulses go unnoticed before my eyes.

11160219.Title: Special Attention
11160219.Text: Oh, here comes the patient I've been expecting. Shall we begin?

11160220.Title: Dispatch
11160220.Text: This is not the job of a psychologist... Sigh.

11160221.Title: Dispatch Complete
11160221.Text: I've seen some interesting things on the way. Wanna hear my stories?

11160223.Title: Level Up
11160223.Text: Look, the abyss is even closer now...

11160225.Title: Join Team
11160225.Text: That's right... You're the strongest Sinners.

11160231.Title: Upgrade Skill
11160231.Text: Can't wait to fall into a deeper dream, can you?

111602100.Title: Attire Obtained
111602100.Text: "Knowledge," "greed," "love"... Seduced by them, you have finally come to see me.

111602101.Title: Level Up
111602101.Text: Man is driven by desire, and desire is inherently boundless.

111602102.Title: Greeting
111602102.Text: I can answer all your questions, but one answer begets another... tell me, who are you?

111602103.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
111602103.Text: You won't be able to see the answer clearly at such a distance. Come closer...

111602104.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
111602104.Text: To use the sun and moon gods as totem decorations... is this piety or arrogance? Human nature is interesting precisely because of its contradictions, is it not?

111602105.Title: Idle
111602105.Text: Don't rush to wake up. We are the only ones in the Temple of Dreams.

111602106.Title: Annoyed
111602106.Text: What, do I have the answer you want hidden on me? If it can really help you, please feel free to explore...

111602107.Title: Special Attention
111602107.Text: "Know thyself"—a seemingly simple riddle, yet it has stumped generations of brave warriors, and now... it's finally your turn.

111602110.Title: Attire Obtained
111602110.Text: You followed the guidance of dreams to my realm. Are you here to break the shackles in your heart?

111602112.Title: Greeting
111602112.Text: The cruelty of the real world always catches people off guard, so why not stay here and wallow in this beautiful moment with me?

111602113.Title: Pat Head
111602113.Text: Some say life is a dream, because everything emerges and perishes on a term that mortals have no control over. One day, you might wake up and realize that the life you've lived through was just a doze on a sunny afternoon.

111602114.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
111602114.Text: What you see with your eyes may not necessarily be the truth.

111602115.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
111602115.Text: Tell me, is it more unfortunate to never wake up from a dream or to never dream?

111602116.Title: Ordinary Contact 3
111602116.Text: Here, I can take you back to the past and make up for those unforgettable regrets... Will you abandon yourself to the dream eternally?

111602117.Title: Ordinary Contact 4
111602117.Text: Want your dream to come true instantly? It's simple, just stop the time at the moment you make your wish to me, and make it flow again when your dream is achieved. Brilliant, isn't it?

111602118.Title: Idle
111602118.Text: People are obsessed with interpreting dreams. They always try to recreate their dreams in reality, even the unpleasant ones...

111602119.Title: Special Attention
111602119.Text: Dreams express the deepest desires in a person's heart. Let's see, what do you desire?

11160301.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11160301.Text: Seems like it's up to you to take care of things from now on... I just don't know if the patients of SALVA Hospital will take their meds on time without me?

11160302.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11160302.Text: Wouldn't that person be scared to see what I look like now?

11160303.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11160303.Text: If I had such powers back then, perhaps I could have eased their pain...

11160304.Title: Level Start
11160304.Text: Are you ready? Let's go then.

11160305.Title: Win Battles
11160305.Text: Thank goodness you're okay. I didn't do anything special. The credit belongs to everyone.

11160306.Title: Lose Battles
11160306.Text: Don't be discouraged. It's not your fault. You did a great job.

11160309.Title: Greeting
11160309.Text: Chief, let me know if you need help. Don't be shy with me.

11160310.Title: Conversation 1
11160310.Text: As head nurse, listening is also one of my responsibilities. If you don't mind, I'd be happy to share your burdens.

11160311.Title: Conversation 2
11160311.Text: Everyone loves your smile, Chief, so please do it often! Believe me, your smile is adorable.

11160312.Title: Conversation 3
11160312.Text: Dr. Iron can be scary sometimes. However... I can promise you that she's not a bad person. She must have her reasons for doing things.

11160313.Title: Special Conversation 1
11160313.Text: Children are adorable. Pure, innocent and carefree... Just like Chief! Gives one the urge to protect them.

11160314.Title: Special Conversation 2
11160314.Text: Victoria always asks me, "Anne, aren't you tired from smiling all the time?" Be careful, Chief. That kid is surprisingly sharp. Don't get stumped by her like me.

11160315.Title: Special Conversation 3
11160315.Text: Can Syndrome Mania really be cured? I'm not sure. But even if there's only a sliver of hope, I won't give up. This is a long, uphill battle. Will you join me?

11160316.Title: Full Compliance
11160316.Text: You can always rely on me. I'm always ready to help you, on patients' affairs or otherwise.

11160317.Title: Idle
11160317.Text: You fell asleep here... work must've been exhausting yesterday! Thank you for your hard work, Chief...

11160318.Title: Annoyed
11160318.Text: Chief, no! I'm going to be upset.

11160319.Title: Special Attention
11160319.Text: What is it? Does looking at me this way make you happy? Alright then. I'll let you look a bit longer.

11160321.Title: Dispatch
11160321.Text: Please help me look after the injured in the Bureau.

11160322.Title: Dispatch Complete
11160322.Text: Sorry for making you wait so long. Did they take their meds on time while I was away?

11160325.Title: Join Team
11160325.Text: Don't worry. I won't let anything happen to you.

11160332.Title: Upgrade Skill
11160332.Text: Wouldn't that person be scared to see what I look like now?

111603100.Title: Attire Obtained
111603100.Text: Sorry, my room is a bit messy. I didn't have time to clean it up... I'm the one who got caught off guard. Why are you blushing?

111603101.Title: Level Up
111603101.Text: A hot bath does wonders for relieving fatigue...

111603102.Title: Greeting
111603102.Text: Sure enough, my tummy feels hungry after a hot bath. Mmm... I can already smell the delicious dumplings. Want to stay and have some with me?

111603103.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
111603103.Text: No matter how hard the work, it's worth it to win them more chances to live... Besides, whenever I come back here, I can wash away all the fatigue and get a good rest.

111603104.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
111603104.Text: Hmm? Are you worried that I was too busy to eat? Hehe... Don't worry, I can take good care of myself. You're the one I'm worried about, Chief. Did you eat and sleep well when I was away?

111603106.Title: Annoyed
111603106.Text: You want to brush my hair? Then please be careful. Don't pull on it and hurt me.

111603107.Title: Special Attention
111603107.Text: You like my smell? Maybe it's the rose oil. It's great for relaxing the mind and relieving fatigue... Hehe, are you feeling sleepy, too? Is that why you keep looking at me?

111603110.Title: Attire Obtained
111603110.Text: Sorry, I took the liberty of leaving the ballroom. I heard the concierge shouting someone had fainted and needed immediate medical attention, so I came out here to see if there was anything I could do to help. Rest assured. The patient is now out of danger.

111603111.Title: Level Up
111603111.Text: The first aid treatment was successful. The patient's vital signs are stable now.

111603112.Title: Greeting
111603112.Text: Sorry to keep you waiting. I'm finished here. Let's get back to the ball.

111603113.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
111603113.Text: The patient is in stable condition now; his blood pressure, heart rate, and body temperature have all returned to normal. And I believe the ambulance crew will contact his friends. Don't worry, he is in good hands now.

111603114.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
111603114.Text: No matter what kind of attire I wear, with or without expensive jewelry, saving lives is the first instinct I respond to.

111603115.Title: Idle
111603115.Text: Ah, my dress has mud on it. It doesn't seem appropriate to go back to the hall wearing a dirty dress. I should probably change into a new one.

111603116.Title: Annoyed
111603116.Text: My clothes are all muddy, Chief. Please be careful not to get yours dirty.

111603117.Title: Special Attention
111603117.Text: Thank you for your concern. But don't worry, I'm fine, just a bit tired. I'm sure I'll feel better after getting some rest.

11160401.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11160401.Text: According to the legislation, I cannot resist your arrest, but I want you to know that you can never trap me if I want to leave.

11160402.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11160402.Text: Well, would you like to have a little chat with me now?

11160403.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11160403.Text: Thank you for sending me into the depths of hell.

11160404.Title: Level Start
11160404.Text: Don't let me find your legal loophole.

11160405.Title: Win Battles
11160405.Text: Listen to your lawyer, and I will help you win it all.

11160406.Title: Lose Battles
11160406.Text: How much money does it take to change your mind?

11160408.Title: Die in Battles
11160408.Text: This is the judgment... I deserve.

11160409.Title: Greeting
11160409.Text: When there is a lawyer, there is strife. Only you can cope so well with having a lawyer as the first person you see each day.

11160410.Title: Conversation 1
11160410.Text: The scale is the symbol of law, and I can tip it in your favor.

11160411.Title: Conversation 2
11160411.Text: Mr. Fox? I like the name. It's one of the smartest animals.

11160412.Title: Conversation 3
11160412.Text: Everyone is born with the right to pursue justice with whatever method is employed.

11160413.Title: Special Conversation 1
11160413.Text: When gold coins are piled in front of people, many will trade their souls for it... and I gain justice from it.

11160414.Title: Special Conversation 2
11160414.Text: I am capable of getting you to do anything for me... but I can't bring myself to.

11160415.Title: Special Conversation 3
11160415.Text: If someone destroys the tender flower buds, they deserve hell no matter who it is, right?

11160416.Title: Full Compliance
11160416.Text: One day, you will bring punishment upon me, and I shall submit and accept it all.

11160417.Title: Idle
11160417.Text: As it happens, I have a few more files I need to read through. I'll grab a coffee with you later.

11160418.Title: Annoyed
11160418.Text: I have represented and won 38 cases of physical harassment, and you should know this, right?

11160419.Title: Special Attention
11160419.Text: I thought I would never get to experience this... feeling of special attention here.

11160421.Title: Dispatch
11160421.Text: I charge by the hour for working outside the office. It doesn't include additional fees such as consulting fees.

11160422.Title: Dispatch Complete
11160422.Text: Job done. The bill will be sent to your email later. Please remember to pay on time.

11160423.Title: Level Up
11160423.Text: Well, if you want to know whether I'm more eloquent, you can find out yourself.

11160425.Title: Join Team
11160425.Text: The war without gunfire is the war of words.

11160426.Title: Danger!
11160426.Text: Keep an eye on your surroundings.

11160432.Title: Upgrade Skill
11160432.Text: Well, would you like to have a little chat with me now?

111604100.Title: Attire Obtained
111604100.Text: My dear friend, congratulations on crossing the twilight zone, and welcome to my palace.

111604102.Title: Greeting
111604102.Text: I offer you my goodwill, my dear friend, but... don't take it too seriously

111604103.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
111604103.Text: Pleasing poems and sweet serenades gush forth from my mouth and turn into sharp crescents.

111604104.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
111604104.Text: I control all fairness, justice, metrology, and poetry in this world... Do you... wish to subvert me?

111604105.Title: Idle
111604105.Text: Don't worry. There's still time for you to find a way to pry the victory from my hands.

111604106.Title: Annoyed
111604106.Text: This is not the way to light a fire...

111604107.Title: Special Attention
111604107.Text: Can you get the answer you want by just staring at me?

11160501.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11160501.Text: Welcome! Only 100,000 DisCoins for a song by me! I can play it from dawn to dusk—what a steal, eh? How about it, boss? Want to order one?

11160502.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11160502.Text: No matter how much I practice, I only know how to play this one song.

11160503.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11160503.Text: Money, life, and death are all up to fate. On second thought, they can be up to me!

11160504.Title: Level Start
11160504.Text: That's a lot of people. By the way, I charge per person for my show.

11160505.Title: Win Battles
11160505.Text: How was it? The song's not bad, eh?

11160506.Title: Lose Battles
11160506.Text: Woah, woah, you could just tell me to stop. There's no need to get violent.

11160507.Title: Ultimate Skill
11160507.Text: Reincarnation is the endless cycle of life!

11160508.Title: Die in Battles
11160508.Text: Don't be afraid... I'll leave... without a fuss.

11160509.Title: Greeting
11160509.Text: Look who I bumped into! My my, it's my lucky day!

11160510.Title: Conversation 1
11160510.Text: If someone in our line of work doesn't believe in reincarnation, they'd lose their job.

11160512.Title: Conversation 3
11160512.Text: Oak Casket's box sure smells good! You can sleep deep and sound in it without a worry!

11160513.Title: Special Conversation 1
11160513.Text: Passing away is nothing to be scared of. I will guide you to where you need to be. Then, we shall meet again.

11160514.Title: Special Conversation 2
11160514.Text: To rise from the ashes, one must first burn to cinders. As long as you endure the searing pain, you shall be granted rebirth.

11160515.Title: Special Conversation 3
11160515.Text: Maybe it was you who guided me across the Lethe?

11160516.Title: Full Compliance
11160516.Text: I believe in reincarnation, but there are many things in life that one cannot take away after death. Will you still remember me after reincarnating...? No worries. Even if you forget, I will do everything possible to meet you again and make you remember me forever!

11160517.Title: Idle
11160517.Text: I'm so bored. How about I play a song to cheer you up, boss?

11160518.Title: Annoyed
11160518.Text: It's broad daylight! I'll scream if you do this! Unless you pay for the emotional trauma!

11160519.Title: Special Attention
11160519.Text: I know I'm cute, but don't look at me like that... are you in the mood for another show?

11160521.Title: Dispatch
11160521.Text: Let me see, am I working for heaven? Or just playing for mortals?

11160522.Title: Dispatch Complete
11160522.Text: Sigh, I didn't make much this time, but I'll give you a share!

11160523.Title: Level Up
11160523.Text: Not bad, not bad. Care to tip a bit more?

11160525.Title: N/A
11160525.Text: Think I'm just a random passerby? I'll send you off to the afterworld!

11160532.Title: N/A
11160532.Text: No matter how much I practice, I only know how to play this one song.

111605100.Title: Attire Obtained
111605100.Text: Come one, come all! Feast your eyes on the performance of this great musician! Just trying to make a living here! Your kind support will be appreciated!

111605101.Title: Level Up
111605101.Text: Hehe, thanks boss! Thank you so much! May you be blessed with fame and fortune!

111605102.Title: Greeting
111605102.Text: Thanks for watching! If you enjoyed the performance, please show some support! DisCoins, Hypercubes—any currency is welcome! I also take digital payment! Whatever's convenient for you!

111605103.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
111605103.Text: Hey there, you little brat! Aren't you afraid of karma? Put it back, you hear me? Tsk, people have no morals anymore. The world has really gone to the dogs...

111605104.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
111605104.Text: ...Huh? My erhu performance sounds like sawing wood? Nonsense! You're just too uncultured to appreciate the erhu classics I'm playing... Why is this stupid stereo jammed again? I spent a fortune on it at the second-hand shop!

111605105.Title: Idle
111605105.Text: ...Hmm? No one's around right now. Lemme take a break...

111605106.Title: Annoyed
111605106.Text: Ahem, boss, mind your manners. Don't get all handsy. I'm a proper artist.

111605107.Title: Special Attention
111605107.Text: Boss, you've been staring at me for a long time. Why, you wanna have a duet with me? ...Come come, don't be shy. You take the erhu, I'll play the suona...

11160601.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11160601.Text: (Yawns) Good... morning... I'm... Letta Devonshire, the link between dream and reality... Hmm... (Rubs eye) If there are no other questions, I'm gonna sit down...

11160602.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11160602.Text: Hmm... Now I can go to many more interesting places...

11160603.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11160603.Text: Hehe, I'm not the innocent lady you think I am, dear Chief.

11160604.Title: Level Start
11160604.Text: Deep inside the fog... What will I find in there?

11160606.Title: Lose Battles
11160606.Text: Oh... I feel dizzy... I must get out of this dangerous place now...

11160609.Title: Greeting
11160609.Text: Hmm... (Stretches her back) I hope you'll have... an amazing day... Hehe...

11160610.Title: Conversation 1
11160610.Text: Sorry, I sleepwalk a lot... Please wake me up at once if you find me doing anything weird, promise me!

11160611.Title: Conversation 2
11160611.Text: Um... Bedroom... My bedroom... Hmm, yes, found it... (Wakes up) Ah! This, this is your bedroom? Sorry, I hope I didn't disturb you.

11160612.Title: Conversation 3
11160612.Text: What's in these bottles... Vegetables? Huh? Are you sure they're not spoiled? Then why is this color so... Ehh?! Some Sinners survive on this near the end of the month? What... What an interesting food...

11160613.Title: Special Conversation 1
11160613.Text: When can I... become a grown-up? Not controlled by anyone... I can just do whatever I want to do...

11160614.Title: Special Conversation 2
11160614.Text: You've already... found out? That I pretend to sleepwalk? I knew I couldn't fool you... But you've known it for a while, right? Hehe, that makes us partners in crime.

11160615.Title: Special Conversation 3
11160615.Text: When I'm with you, I can feel real, uninhibited freedom and happiness... So, it's decided! You must take me with you on your next adventure in Eastside!

11160616.Title: Full Compliance
11160616.Text: Been here, been there too... Now, where should we explore next? Hehe, no matter where we go, even if it's a place I've already been to, I'm sure I'll have the most exciting experience with you around! ...You've still got work? Hmm... Alright, I can wait! After all... we've still got the whole night!

11160617.Title: Idle
11160617.Text: I can't eat them all... Hehe...

11160618.Title: Annoyed
11160618.Text: Ow... Ow... Stop making biscuits on me, little kitty...

11160619.Title: Special Attention
11160619.Text: Shh... Care to look for some fun in the foggy DisCity with me tonight?

11160621.Title: Dispatch
11160621.Text: Hmm... See you later. No need to worry about me... I won't get lost.

11160622.Title: Dispatch Complete
11160622.Text: Hehe... As always, it was a fun trip to an interesting place.

11160625.Title: N/A
11160625.Text: It's getting foggy! Let me see... Where should I go have fun today?

11160632.Title: N/A
11160632.Text: Hmm... Now I can go to many more interesting places...

111606100.Title: Attire Obtained
111606100.Text: Hmm... Another adventurer, huh... Since you woke me up from my slumber, how about... you play a game with me! If you refuse... you can forget about ever leaving!

111606101.Title: Level Up
111606101.Text: Hehe, I'm feeling super energetic now. I can play with you all night long!

111606102.Title: Greeting
111606102.Text: Come, follow my lantern and chase after my tracks... If you can last till the end, you'll be the winner of this game!

111606103.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
111606103.Text: Hehe, did I scare you just now? There are more thrills to come. You can't be jumping at every little thing...

111606104.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
111606104.Text: Possessed portraits, teetering chandeliers, and flickering candles... All sorts of strange things exist in this castle. Hehe, don't get too scared and lose my game!

111606105.Title: Idle
111606105.Text: A little white ghost wanders in the mist... Counting the ever-lit candles, waiting for the lost souls...

111606106.Title: Annoyed
111606106.Text: Ahh, don't pull on my bandages... Relax, I won't cheat!

111606107.Title: Special Attention
111606107.Text: Hehe, your gaze on me is so intense. Are you getting serious now? Well, keep your eyes peeled... Or I might just slip away through the walls!

11160701.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11160701.Text: I can smell many interesting "scents" around here. Hmm... Maybe I can make a few really extraordinary perfumes out of them.

11160703.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11160703.Text: I love to capture all fragrances, and then... keep them forever.

11160705.Title: Victory
11160705.Text: The scent lasted quite a while this time.

11160706.Title: Lose Battles
11160706.Text: I despise the stench of blood...

11160709.Title: Greeting
11160709.Text: Whenever my restless emotions are soothed, I know... it's because you have come to me...

11160710.Title: Conversation 1
11160710.Text: Grey amber, iris root... these are all excellent ingredients, but they don't meet my standards. They always have a lingering, unpleasant odor... I need something more pure, more vivid...

11160711.Title: Conversation 2
11160711.Text: There must be a never-fading "immortal fragrance" in this world. It's just that I haven't found the right ingredients to create it yet...

11160712.Title: Conversation 3
11160712.Text: Naturally, rich perfumes must be stored in exquisite glass bottles. They need to be delicate, transparent, and sealed so that not a whiff leaks out... I've collected many, and there must be one that's good to put you in.

11160713.Title: Special Conversation 1
11160713.Text: Only fragrances made from life can completely mask the scent of decay. Perhaps it's the complexity of the soul and memory that bring a more layered aroma... Humans are truly fascinating.

11160714.Title: Special Conversation 2
11160714.Text: I like to handle the ingredients myself. When I strip away those ivory-colored chunks and feel the warm fluids flow through my fingers, inspiration for the fragrance will gush incessantly into my mind... Oh, how I love this feeling.

11160715.Title: Special Conversation 3
11160715.Text: Typically, beauty is a notable characteristic of top-tier ingredients, hence I love approaching beautiful bodies. However, sometimes I find unexpected delights with other characteristics, like you... You have a fragrance that drives one mad.

11160716.Title: Full Compliance
11160716.Text: I already know what kind of perfume I will make you into... Something light, clear, and with a soft warmth... topped with a sharp finish. Such a special fragrance will surely dispel all nightmares and fears. If I could keep your scent on me forever, then perhaps my heart could achieve complete tranquility.

11160717.Title: Idle
11160717.Text: Moments of leisure and comfort... are best with a hint of fresh green notes.

11160718.Title: Annoyed
11160718.Text: Do you like the perfume I have on today, too?

11160719.Title: Special Attention
11160719.Text: Hmm, you look so intoxicated... What does this scent make you think of?

11160721.Title: Dispatch
11160721.Text: Just don't make me go to any... foul-smelling places.

11160722.Title: Dispatch Complete
11160722.Text: If I told you I brought some "perfume ingredients" back, would you help me carry them?

11160723.Title: Level Up
11160723.Text: Hmm, this should be considered a masterpiece.

11160725.Title: Join Team
11160725.Text: Would you like a fragrance tailored just for you?

11160726.Title: Danger!
11160726.Text: Careful not to bump into things.

11160732.Title: Upgrade Skill
11160732.Text: Ah... I smell a richer aroma...

111607100.Title: Attire Obtained
111607100.Text: There seems to be a unique fragrance in the air—pure, warm, with a hint of sharpness. Could it be the "flower" I've longed for has finally come to my garden?

111607101.Title: Level Up
111607101.Text: Keep releasing your fragrance. I want more of it, even more...

111607102.Title: Greeting
111607102.Text: I've been waiting for you. Come take a rest here with me. With the nourishment from the moonlight, you will surely blossom into a more aromatic and delicious flower...

111607103.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
111607103.Text: You have the run of this place. Please, feel free to take a tour around and see which scent suits you the best. Is it the vitality and sweetness of the daisy, or the purity and richness of the lily? And maybe, you can offer me some "help" with my perfume making.

111607104.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
111607104.Text: Just as a perfume gala needs a real exquisite bottle to captivate the crowd, my garden requires a flawless bud. I vowed to myself that once I found it, I will water it with my blood and nourish it with my essence... Now, I believe fate has answered my plea, for it has brought you to me.

111607105.Title: Idle
111607105.Text: Be patient. Just wait a little longer, wait until the undesired smells dissipate and the conscious mind dies down. Then your fragrance will take root and be preserved forever... Hehe...

111607106.Title: Annoyed
111607106.Text: Don't push me too hard. Be gentler, please. If the swing goes too high, the airflow may carry the scent away and mess up the unique fragrances of my flowers. I wouldn't want that...

111607107.Title: Special Attention
111607107.Text: The "flowers" in this garden always look at me with longing. I know they crave my affection, but unfortunately for them, such privilege is reserved only for you...

11160801.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11160801.Text: Before you take me to the Bureau, give me one more minute to reply to the last three messages. These people love me. If they don't get my responses, they will be sad.

11160802.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11160802.Text: You have expectations of me? All right, I'll try my best to live up to them.

11160803.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11160803.Text: This is my social media account. Seek me out online. You'll like my internet persona better.

11160804.Title: Level Start
11160804.Text: Go wherever your heart desires, and I shall follow close behind with my love accompanying.

11160806.Title: Lose Battles
11160806.Text: People falling out of love, happens all the time.

11160807.Title: Ultimate Skill
11160807.Text: In the name of almighty love!

11160809.Title: Greeting
11160809.Text: Hello... Hello. I know it. My real voice only returns when I'm with you.

11160810.Title: Conversation 1
11160810.Text: I only do online dating. Two souls meeting bare, free from physical burden and past baggage... This is the safest form of love.

11160811.Title: Conversation 2
11160811.Text: The agency keeps assigning me crime dramas, but I've come across some romance scripts during my vocational training. These stories are basically the same: love at first sight based on looks, chance encounters everywhere, and the cliché happily-ever-after ending... Heh, don't you find these love stories a bit fearsome?

11160812.Title: Conversation 3
11160812.Text: Is the Bureau in the market for some spare cell phones? Long story short, I once mixed up the chat boxes of two online friends. To avoid such unprofessional mishaps, I bought a bunch of cell phones—one for each friend. I still have many backups in my cupboard, packages intact.

11160813.Title: Special Conversation 1
11160813.Text: "Your profile page is unique." That's how every relationship of mine began. But I find myself lost for words when dealing with you. Is it because our relationship exists in real life?

11160814.Title: Special Conversation 2
11160814.Text: Eating, walking, sleeping, working... these daily tasks pain me. Nothing brings me joy except the fleeting moments of love. They're what keep me going each day.

11160815.Title: Special Conversation 3
11160815.Text: The thing is, my voice used to be different. Back then, I dreamed of being a top voice actor capable of portraying all sorts of characters, hoping my fans would feel proud when they mentioned my name... Heh, in a way, I guess my dreams have come true. But this voice that my followers adore, I don't like it at all.

11160816.Title: Full Compliance
11160816.Text: I've sent the words "I like you" to many, many people. But strangely, when I text you, I always type them in and delete them over and over again... I don't know what's stopping me from sending them to you. Perhaps, in my heart of hearts, I want you to hear it from my mouth.

11160817.Title: Idle
11160817.Text: Are you asleep? If not, just listen to my voice... and you'll fall asleep…

11160818.Title: Annoyed
11160818.Text: When someone repeatedly likes my profile page, it's usually to catch my attention and get a response from me. What about you? What do you want from such continuous physical contact with me?

11160819.Title: Special Attention
11160819.Text: Is this how people usually feel on their first date with someone they met online? I get so nervous around you that I can't even control my voice.

11160821.Title: Dispatch
11160821.Text: I'm not exactly good at anything that's not online. But if it's for you, I'll give it a try.

11160822.Title: Dispatch Complete
11160822.Text: This is actually my first hand-delivered gift. Could you forgive me for being so inexperienced?

11160823.Title: Level Up
11160823.Text: You have stayed, even after seeing the real me?

11160825.Title: Join Team
11160825.Text: Which voice would you like me to use? Yeah, your wish is my command.

11160832.Title: Upgrade Skill
11160832.Text: You have expectations of me? All right, I'll try my best to live up to them.

11210101.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11210101.Text: I haven't done anything bad in the past two years. If you arrest me now, you better have a valid reason, or else... I still have six orders to settle, are you going to pay for them?

11210102.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11210102.Text: You put so much effort into me... what dangerous work do you have for me this time?

11210103.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11210103.Text: I can wipe out those guys without Bai Yi's help now.

11210104.Title: Level Start
11210104.Text: Hey, don't run around! If something bad happens, I can't save you.

11210105.Title: Win Battles
11210105.Text: Hmph! Weaker than a common Syndicate thug.

11210108.Title: Die in Battles
11210108.Text: Ha... didn't expect this kind of death...

11210109.Title: Greeting
11210109.Text: When did you get here? Why are you still standing around? Aren't you tired? Find a place to sit...

11210110.Title: Conversation 1
11210110.Text: These sticks belonged to someone I knew many years ago. He died on the side of the road and I collected his corpse. Afterwards, these sticks came into my possession.

11210111.Title: Conversation 2
11210111.Text: Am I stingy? If I didn't intervene, those jerks would've spent all the money in the account on booze...

11210112.Title: Conversation 3
11210112.Text: Back at Whitestone, I was once tasked with finding a cat. The Syndicate was huge, and I spent a week trying to find it. When I finally returned the cat, the owner thought I was a thug and chased me away. I was pretty hurt, to tell you the truth.

11210113.Title: Special Conversation 1
11210113.Text: Back at Whitestone, I got up at four o'clock in the morning every day. Over here it's more relaxed.

11210114.Title: Special Conversation 2
11210114.Text: Before, I lived in fear every day: fear of starving, fear of getting stabbed in the back, fear of dying... but ever since I met them, nothing seems to scare me anymore...

11210115.Title: Special Conversation 3
11210115.Text: I know they hide some things from me, but I don't care. I'm happy with just living a stable life with them.

11210116.Title: Full Compliance
11210116.Text: I was thinking, maybe Whitestone Industries can move to your place. After all, you don't restrict our freedom too much, and you're reliable... at least more reliable than those two.

11210117.Title: Idle
11210117.Text: ... I've nothing to do. I wonder what Bai Yi and Che are up to. Ooh... bet they're not up to any proper business either.

11210119.Title: Special Attention
11210119.Text: Why did you find me? Got something for me to do? ...Well, if you're just visiting then do as you please.

11210121.Title: Dispatch
