11210121.Text: Okay, I'll do it. Any special requests?

11210122.Title: Dispatch Complete
11210122.Text: Done! I'm going to bed now.

11210132.Title: Upgrade Skill
11210132.Text: You put so much effort into me... what dangerous work do you have for me this time?

112101100.Title: Attire Obtained
112101100.Text: Umm... Bai Yi is, uh... busy, so I'm here to fill in for her. Don't stare at me like that. I know I look weird in this outfit... You think I look nice? Well, thank you.

112101101.Title: Level Up
112101101.Text: This pastry is quite yummy. Want some?

112101102.Title: Greeting
112101102.Text: Stop looking. The contact hasn't come yet. Sigh, it's so not worth it to sacrifice this much for just one order...

112101103.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
112101103.Text: Is this tea rare and expensive? Too bad I can't tell the difference. If only Che were here. He'd know something about it.

112101104.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
112101104.Text: Don't worry about Bai Yi. She just has an upset stomach from eating leftovers. It happens all the time. Don't mind her.

112101105.Title: Idle
112101105.Text: A fruit bowl? No thanks, I'll just have some tea. It's free? Oh, leave it here then.

112101106.Title: Annoyed
112101106.Text: Are you off your rocker? If you keep this up, I'm quitting!

112101107.Title: Special Attention
112101107.Text: Emm... All I have to do is sit here and wait for that person to come, right? All right, then. I'll let you know when he's here.

11210201.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11210201.Text: M...B...CC... is that right? I've heard of your place! There are a lot of Sinners there. Enough chitchat, let me in!

11210202.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11210202.Text: Ah... strength is like collecting garbage. The more you collect, you stronger you become.

11210203.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11210203.Text: Yes. As expected, it's better to be stronger. The earlier I get off work, the better I sleep.

11210204.Title: Level Start
11210204.Text: I bet I can find a lot of treasures on this trip.

11210205.Title: Win Battles
11210205.Text: What's that thing called... from the book... oh right! Hardness triumphs over softness, strength over feebleness!

11210208.Title: Die in Battles
11210208.Text: You are not allowed to go there...

11210209.Title: Greeting
11210209.Text: Where are we going today to scavenge... no, I mean, to catch Sinners?

11210210.Title: Conversation 1
11210210.Text: The people from the procurement office always spend money like crazy. I'll have to give them a talking to. Money doesn't grow on trees, you know.

11210211.Title: Conversation 2
11210211.Text: Want to come play DisChess? They're not here, so let's just play with the two of us. Chief, don't go! Try it out! It's fun!

11210212.Title: Conversation 3
11210212.Text: "Don't treat others' gossip as gifts, because you're not a garbage collector." Huh? Is this line in the book making fun of me, Chief? No? Good, I'll write it down then.

11210213.Title: Special Conversation 1
11210213.Text: Slaying Corruptors is my job, but enjoying life is more important.

11210214.Title: Special Conversation 2
11210214.Text: Chief, did you stay up late again? You can't keep doing that! Young people need their sleep.

11210215.Title: Special Conversation 3
11210215.Text: Compared to where I used to live, this place is too fancy! I'd rather sleep in the hallway and give my bed to the kids from the Syndicate.

11210216.Title: Full Compliance
11210216.Text: Chief, since we're so close already, I'll cut to the chase—when will the balcony I applied for be approved?

11210217.Title: Idle
11210217.Text: When can we go to the Rust together again? There's a new shipment over there. I hear there are some light track construction materials. If we scavenge some, we can make a fortune!

11210218.Title: Annoyed
11210218.Text: Oh yeah! Right there! Harder! Wow... feels so good...

11210219.Title: Special Attention
11210219.Text: Huh? I'm the only one left standing here? No! That's so boring!

11210221.Title: Dispatch
11210221.Text: Chief, the weather is so nice today! Won't you come along?

11210222.Title: Dispatch Complete
11210222.Text: Harvest time! I can't fit everything in my cart!

11210232.Title: Upgrade Skill
11210232.Text: Ah... strength is like collecting garbage. The more you collect, you stronger you become.

112102100.Title: Attire Obtained
112102100.Text: Chief? What a coincidance! Never expected to see you here! Me? Argh, it is so frigging hot out here that my engine broke down. But, no worries, just sit here and wait a bit. I'll get us a ride.

112102101.Title: Greeting
112102101.Text: You awake? Don't worry about it. Just go back to sleep if you feel like it. I'll let you know when I get us a ride.

112102102.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
112102102.Text: Hey! Over here! Can you take us for a ride? Argh... Sped by again. Gosh, why are people so heartless nowadays?

112102103.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
112102103.Text: Just let me know if you are hungry or thirsty and don't act tough, okay? My car broke down, but all my stuff is intact. I've got enough food and water to last us for quite some time!

112102104.Title: Idle
112102104.Text: Chief, Chief? Are you asleep? Are you having heatstroke? Wait up, stay put. I'll get you a wet towel.

112102105.Title: Annoyed
112102105.Text: So you're saying, we should put up a bigger sign? Good thinking. I'm on it!

112102106.Title: Special Attention
112102106.Text: You're back! Told you there can't be any town nearby in the middle of nowhere. You're not built for these scorching temperatures. Don't be too hard on yourself, just rest up and leave it to me.

112102107.Title: Level Up
112102107.Text: Oh my Chief, you are just too kind.

11210401.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11210401.Text: This is da Syndicate gangsta rapper. Who are you, lookin' dumb as loser? This way of life, betta play it cooler, or I'll take away all your moola...

11210402.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11210402.Text: An inspiration for a new song!

11210403.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11210403.Text: Now this is fit for a star!

11210405.Title: Win Battles
11210405.Text: You want to defeat me? Dream on!

11210406.Title: Lose Battles
11210406.Text: Rippp—there are bound to be some mistakes in improvisation.

11210408.Title: Die in Battles
11210408.Text: This isn't hip hop at all...

11210409.Title: Greeting
11210409.Text: Oh, you're here? Get me a glass of water. I've been writing songs all day and now I'm dying of thirst.

11210410.Title: Conversation 1
11210410.Text: I still prefer to have a gold chain. It's easier to sell during an emergency, and you can even throw it in someone's face during a fight... I really don't know why my colleagues prefer diamonds.

11210411.Title: Conversation 2
11210411.Text: When will you give me a complete audio mixer? Right now I only have this broken tape recorder. So humiliating for a rap superstar like me!

11210412.Title: Conversation 3
11210412.Text: I hate people who wear sunglasses indoors. Which serious rapper would do that to look cool?

11210413.Title: Special Conversation 1
11210413.Text: Those Eastside f*ckers disgust me. All those contract lawyers, those regulations - they just don't want to pay. I beat the boss's face to a pulp afterwards. It was awesome, hahaha.

11210414.Title: Special Conversation 2
11210414.Text: Write a song just to diss an idiot? That would be too boring. Only your name, Chief, deserves to appear in my work.

11210415.Title: Special Conversation 3
11210415.Text: Let's create a new label and call it "MBCC"! I'll be the founder and you can be my first signed artist! Don't tell me you can't! It's easy, I'll show you.

11210416.Title: Full Compliance
11210416.Text: I always thought that everyone outside of the Syndicate was a good-for-nothing, but you... you're the first person who wasn't born in the Syndicate that I can talk to. Come chill with me more often. I'll cover for you.

11210417.Title: Idle
11210417.Text: Rap isn't about flaunting wealth, so don't try too hard. Red-hot lyrics and loops are all there is to it. Inspiration is like a waterfall, the battle is not lost, and the sewers are your only way out.

11210418.Title: Annoyed
11210418.Text: Where the **** are you putting your hand? Got a death wish?

11210419.Title: Special Attention
11210419.Text: Want to hear me rap? Why else would you come... unless you're daydreaming that I'd work for you?

11210421.Title: Dispatch
11210421.Text: You want a superstar like me to run errands? Are you drunk out of your wits?

11210425.Title: Join Team
11210425.Text: The word "fail" doesn't exist in my dictionary.

11210432.Title: Upgrade Skill
11210432.Text: An inspiration for a new song!

11220101.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11220101.Text: Help! Let me go! A beauty is being kidnapped!

11220102.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11220102.Text: I think I've gotten better at fighting.

11220109.Title: Greeting
11220109.Text: Chief... can you give the infinitely adorable Hella some pocket money? Oh my gosh, Chief is the best!

11220110.Title: Conversation 1
11220110.Text: What is it, Chief? Uh... your wallet? Hehe, here, take it back, I was just practicing...

11220111.Title: Conversation 2
11220111.Text: Me? Pretending to be cute? Who said that?! Am I not cute?

11220112.Title: Conversation 3
11220112.Text: Don't bring up all that crap from the past with me. I'm not some little girl who cries all day and needs to be comforted. I survived this long thanks to my friggin' self.

11220113.Title: Special Conversation 1
11220113.Text: The weight, size, and feel of this pipe is as if it's custom-made for me, so don't ever ask me to switch weapons. I will never abandon it!

11220114.Title: Special Conversation 2
11220114.Text: I'll take you to hang out with Ninety-Nine when we get the chance. Even though she looks scary, she's actually quite nice.

11220115.Title: Special Conversation 3
11220115.Text: I actually don't like to fight. Even though the chance of dying is small, it's still painful and troublesome... Don't worry, I'm still happy to do things for you. No need to feel guilty.

11220116.Title: Full Compliance
11220116.Text: I've decided, since you stick to me all day long and are impossible to get rid of, I will graciously accept you as my underling. Just don't ever betray me, okay?

11220117.Title: Idle
11220117.Text: I'm so sleepy... come here, let me lean on you for a nap...

11220118.Title: Annoyed
11220118.Text: Are you giving me a massage?

11220119.Title: Special Attention
11220119.Text: Ha, I knew you'd come find me! Miss me so soon?

11220121.Title: Dispatch
11220121.Text: Finally, it's my turn to go! Chief, can you give me some more money?

11220122.Title: Dispatch Complete
11220122.Text: Mission accomplished. Any rewards for me, Chief?

11220125.Title: Join Team
11220125.Text: Hmm? You really like being with me, don't you?

11220132.Title: Upgrade Skill
11220132.Text: I think I've gotten better at fighting.

112201100.Title: Attire Obtained
112201100.Text: Who the hell is interrupting my nap time again? Kneel at once! Eh... If it's not Chief? (Giggles) Awesome! Now my croquet match can go as scheduled!

112201101.Title: Level Up
112201101.Text: Ah! What's with these little animals? They've been giving me trouble the whole day! You're lucky you guys are cute, or I would have...

112201102.Title: Greeting
112201102.Text: Don't bring me white flowers. I prefer red roses. If it happens again, I'll... hit your head a hundred times!

112201103.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
112201103.Text: The weight, size, and texture of this scepter, and its shiny luster... It's as if it was tailored for me! And... most importantly, it's got a big head! So big and beautifully awesome!

112201104.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
112201104.Text: I want to eat that thing that's a dough topped with lots of fruit and cream! What's it called... some kind of tart...? Right, right! A fruit tart! I want it! Make one for me now!

112201105.Title: Idle
112201105.Text: It's almost tea party time! Go and decorate the venue now, Chief... Why? Because you're the only idle servant here with nothing else to do.

112201106.Title: Annoyed
112201106.Text: Try that a few more times, and you should worry about your head... Chief!

112201107.Title: Special Attention
112201107.Text: Ahem, to keep our relationship fair and equal, as the Queen, I order you to... Hey! You're trying some funny business with the shackles again!?

11220201.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11220201.Text: There's nothing to be happy about catching someone like me, right? Keep going. Good luck on catching a better Sinner next time.

11220202.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11220202.Text: Wait. Do you think I'll stop being lazy when I get stronger?

11220203.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11220203.Text: Yeah, I'm so strong now! Is it time for me to get myself killed in Black Rings?

11220204.Title: Level Start
11220204.Text: Stay close... I have to at least take you back alive.

11220205.Title: Win Battles
11220205.Text: Let's go. It's just a few corpses. Nothing interesting.

11220206.Title: Lose Battles
11220206.Text: Ha... We can finally go home early.

11220208.Title: Die in Battles
11220208.Text: Can't believe I got defeated here...

11220209.Title: Greeting
11220209.Text: You're not expecting me to say hello to you, are you? You must have got too much time...

11220210.Title: Conversation 1
11220210.Text: You've got a grindstone? Jon and Jay are getting blunt. Why do I name my weapons? Nothing special. I just think it's fun.

11220211.Title: Conversation 2
11220211.Text: You wanna chat with me? Don't... I don't wanna chat right now. You'd better chat with someone else.

11220212.Title: Conversation 3
11220212.Text: I can give you some odd jobs if you pay enough. Forget about fighting. I ain't good enough for that.

11220213.Title: Special Conversation 1
11220213.Text: Hey, wanna make a deal? This week I'll do whatever you tell me to. I promise, no slacking off... Can you help me buy that Deadlover Radio special collection?

11220214.Title: Special Conversation 2
11220214.Text: Every time I see K.K., I feel like seeing myself from the past—it's too boring working all day long without any personal life. If I don't watch her, she will be sold by Bai Yi to pay off gambling debts sooner or later.

11220215.Title: Special Conversation 3
11220215.Text: I know Bai Yi gets drunk, gambles, gets into trouble all the time, and calls me a dwarf when she gets drink too much... but she is the most interesting person in the world from the time I met her until now. It has always been the case.

11220216.Title: Full Compliance
11220216.Text: I'm surprised that you, as the Chief, with such a face, didn't go suck up to those high officials instead of hanging out with a bunch of Sinners all day. You are an interesting one... Don't get me wrong. I didn't mean anything by that.

11220217.Title: Idle
11220217.Text: You tired? Take a nap then. Don't worry. I'll keep watch for you and won't let your men know their great Chief is slacking off.

11220219.Title: Special Attention
11220219.Text: You do your work, I take my nap. Let's not get in the way of each other, okay?

11220221.Title: Dispatch
11220221.Text: Can you ask someone else to go? I'm busy.

11220222.Title: Dispatch Complete
11220222.Text: Let's leave it at this. I'm off now.

11220225.Title: Join Team
11220225.Text: Ah... My eyes... It hurts... I'm gonna turn blind. Do you still want me to go like this? Geez.

11220232.Title: Upgrade Skill
11220232.Text: Wait. Do you think I'll stop being lazy when I get stronger?

112202100.Title: Attire Obtained
112202100.Text: Oh? It's just you. I'm working here. Whitestone just took on a debt collection job, and K.K. is in the middle of something else, so I had to come. I'm wearing this to look more like a badass. It's Bai Yi's idea, not mine.

112202101.Title: Level Up
112202101.Text: Not again? It's so tiring to fight and kill.

112202102.Title: Greeting
112202102.Text: The job is not done yet. Relax, I won't do anything nasty. He's open for business. If I sit here and stare at everyone, he'll want me to leave and give me the money in no time.

112202103.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
112202103.Text: Ugh, out of all the jobs they could've picked, they had to go for this debt collection gig, and of course, they forced me to do it... Well, if I can't get it done, so be it. It won't be the first job Whitestone couldn't finish anyway.

112202104.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
112202104.Text: If I keep sitting here, I'll be seen as their security guy. The only good thing here is free tea and snacks. Hey, you really not gonna have some?

112202105.Title: Idle
112202105.Text: Hey~ You don't seem so busy. Why not join us in the back to play mahjong? Don't worry, the boss here is my buddy, he won't charge us.

112202106.Title: Annoyed
112202106.Text: Don't rub it. It's not a tattoo, it's just a sleeve. Why would I want to sting myself with some colorful needles?

112202107.Title: Special Attention
112202107.Text: What brings you here? Well, not like it's any of my business. If you have nothing better to do, it's good to sit here and get some vitamin D from the sun too.

11220301.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11220301.Text: Let me go! Let me go! I'm the biggest rascal of DisCity! You can't capture me!

11220302.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11220302.Text: There must be more exciting adventures waiting for me!

11220303.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11220303.Text: My goodness, is this really mine? Can I go farm in Paradeisos now?

11220304.Title: Level Start
11220304.Text: Where are we going for an adventure this time?

11220305.Title: Win Battles
11220305.Text: Victory! Let's celebrate! I want some cola!

11220306.Title: Lose Battles
11220306.Text: Cough cough... I let them off easy on purpose!

11220308.Title: Die in Battles
11220308.Text: Sob... I'm not done playing yet...

11220309.Title: Greeting
11220309.Text: Yoohoo, Chief! When can we get up to some mischief together? Hurry up, I'm so bored.

11220310.Title: Conversation 1
11220310.Text: Chief, I want to drink some cola! Please... I promise to brush my teeth!

11220311.Title: Conversation 2
11220311.Text: Great! As long as I can fight every day, I'll be able to eat, drink and sleep well. The Bureau is such a great place - um... wait! Laziness seems like a bad thing, too! Marvelous! I'm the biggest rascal in DisCity!

11220312.Title: Conversation 3
11220312.Text: My grandpa said he always wanted to be a cowboy and explore the world, but in the end, he never left his hometown and remained a farmer all his life. To help him realize his dream, I stole and wore his hat! Haha!

11220313.Title: Special Conversation 1
11220313.Text: DisCity is huge! I couldn't see the edge of the city even after running for three hours! In my hometown, I could plow all the farm plots combined within three hours... so, when can I go to Paradeisos to farm?

11220314.Title: Special Conversation 2
11220314.Text: Chief, if you run into thugs, just drop my name! It won't be of much use, but at least it'll give you some psychological support!

11220315.Title: Special Conversation 3
11220315.Text: I've been busy completing missions recently, so no time for mischief. If this keeps up, DisCity will forget my name. Well... it's decided! I'm going to stay up all night!

11220316.Title: Full Compliance
11220316.Text: Chief! Let's go farming! Let's go treasure hunting! Let's go fight those strange creatures! I can't wait!

11220317.Title: Idle
11220317.Text: Ahhh... when are we leaving? I'm already sleepy from waiting.

11220318.Title: Annoyed
11220318.Text: What is it? Did my clothes get stained? No?

11220321.Title: Dispatch
11220321.Text: Off we go to an adventure in DisCity!

11220332.Title: Upgrade Skill
11220332.Text: There must be more exciting adventures waiting for me!

11230101.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11230101.Text: A.I. Maid III Labyrinth at your service.

11230102.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11230102.Text: "Wear it to become stronger?" If it can improve the efficiency of my housework, please install it immediately.

11230103.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11230103.Text: Body strength has been upgraded to the max. Labyrinth shall clear all your obstacles.

11230105.Title: Win Battles
11230105.Text: Clean-up completed. Switching back to home mode.

11230106.Title: Lose Battles
11230106.Text: Warning: Combat parameters overflowing, emergency retreat protocol enabled.

11230109.Title: Greeting
11230109.Text: Thank you for choosing A.I. Maid III Labyrinth, please use your voice to assign me a task.

11230110.Title: Conversation 1
11230110.Text: Garbage detected? My apologies. Labyrinth will clear them right away.

11230111.Title: Conversation 2
11230111.Text: How may Labyrinth be of service, Chief? Would you like a cup of tea or something to eat? Or perhaps you'd like Labyrinth to massage your shoulders?

11230112.Title: Conversation 3
11230112.Text: Warning! Blade damage threshold exceeded 0.02%. Requesting full replacement to guarantee continued efficiency.

11230113.Title: Special Conversation 1
11230113.Text: Cute maid module activated, enabling custom title function. Chief, would you like me to refer to you with a new title? Your Excellency? Sir? Or perhaps... Master?

11230114.Title: Special Conversation 2
11230114.Text: My apologies, Chief, but Labyrinth does not have a facial expression module installed. But I can tell you that my current mood is very happy.

11230115.Title: Special Conversation 3
11230115.Text: Labyrinth hates the Syndicate, as well as my former self... but Labyrinth won't fret about the past again, because Labyrinth met Chief...

11230116.Title: Full Compliance
11230116.Text: Relationship module downloaded. Please set Labyrinth's relationship level with Chief. Available levels include: "Love", "Love", "Love", and "Love".

11230117.Title: Idle
11230117.Text: Chief? Chief? Chief? Please don't stand here and distract Labyrinth from her work. Unless there is something I can help you with?

11230118.Title: Annoyed
11230118.Text: Sensory system disabled... you may continue now, Chief.

11230119.Title: Special Attention
11230119.Text: Detected signal source: Chief. Please activate the chat module.

11230132.Title: Upgrade Skill
11230132.Text: "Wear it to become stronger?" If it can improve the efficiency of my housework, please install it immediately.

112301100.Title: Attire Obtained
112301100.Text: Welcome to Fulong Restaurant. We have everything from home-style stir-fry to seasonal seafood. [Beep beep] Dining rules: This is a non-smoking venue. Please do not bring your own food and drink. Thank you for your cooperation.

112301102.Title: Greeting
112301102.Text: Hello, dear guest. Please take a seat. Sorry, but Labyrinth is busy at the moment. You may scan the QR code on the table to order. Thank you for your cooperation.

112301103.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
112301103.Text: During business hours, please don't flag the waitress unless you require service. Chief, the mission is still ongoing. Please don't blow our cover.

112301104.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
112301104.Text: Labyrinth is needed here. It's a pleasure for Labyrinth to assist others. Labyrinth likes it here.

112301105.Title: Idle
112301105.Text: This phase of work is complete. Our revenue today is 7777 DisCoins. What a lucky number, Chief!

112301106.Title: Annoyed
112301106.Text: Please do not hit or slap the waitress. Any damage caused will require ten times the compensation.

112301107.Title: Special Attention
112301107.Text: Don't worry, Chief. The target has not yet appeared. If there are no other requests, please vacate the doorway so that other guests may enter and exit. Thank you for your cooperation.

11230201.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11230201.Text: Nice to meet you. Are you the Chief of MBCC? Before I act, better keep your head on your shoulders. You are worth a lot.

11230202.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11230202.Text: You increase my power even though you know I'm dangerous. Do you think I'm no threat to you?

11230203.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11230203.Text: I am your personal blade. A sharp blade that swings towards the Garden and slices those who used to look down on me to pieces!

11230204.Title: Level Start
11230204.Text: You won't be able to run away if I find you.

11230205.Title: Win Battles
11230205.Text: What a weak opponent... You look down on me?

11230207.Title: Ultimate Skill
11230207.Text: Don't worry, this won't hurt at all.

11230209.Title: Greeting
11230209.Text: Wow, such tight security! Ha... seems like you recognize my strength.

11230210.Title: Conversation 1
11230210.Text: It's too quiet here. It reminds me of the Garden's ominous atmosphere. In any case, I still prefer it over the chaos and noise of the Syndicate.

11230211.Title: Conversation 2
11230211.Text: Many in the Garden obsess over "the art of flower arrangement," but... I don't get it. Assassination is assassination. Why involve so many unrelated things?

11230212.Title: Conversation 3
11230212.Text: It's so thrilling to hear so-called "strongmen" howl... don't you think so?

11230213.Title: Special Conversation 1
11230213.Text: When I was saved by the Garden, I wanted to be a killer just like them. Ha... haha... how dare they say that I am weak! How dare they say that I am not worthy of joining the Garden!

11230214.Title: Special Conversation 2
11230214.Text: "Gekkabijin" is the name I gave to myself. Not everyone is qualified to receive a name from the Garden. But now, if I become the strongest killer in the Garden with your power... Can't wait to see the look on that so-called Mentor's face!

11230215.Title: Special Conversation 3
11230215.Text: That "cherry blossom" move almost killed me, but with you around... I should be able to handle it easily. Hmph... it should be her turn next!

11230216.Title: Full Compliance
11230216.Text: Thank you, Chief. After I take down all the Garden killers, I will gift you their heads! Then finally... finally I will get to enjoy you!

11230217.Title: Idle
11230217.Text: Whenever I think about the beautiful flowers withering away in this city... I become overjoyed!

11230218.Title: Annoyed
11230218.Text: Heart, artery, brain... where do you want to be cut open?

11230219.Title: Special Attention
11230219.Text: Do you pay so much attention to me because you're afraid I'll attack you?

11230221.Title: Dispatch
11230221.Text: You're sending me out? It must be a thrilling mission, right?

11230222.Title: Dispatch Complete
11230222.Text: Ah... what a bummer. I thought I could meet a worthy foe.

11230225.Title: Join Team
11230225.Text: I hope my opponent this time can put up a tough fight.

11230226.Title: Danger!
11230226.Text: Who dares to steal my prey from me...

11230232.Title: Upgrade Skill
11230232.Text: You increase my power even though you know I'm dangerous. Do you think I'm no threat to you?

11240101.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11240101.Text: Do you know who you just captured?! I... I'm the uncrowned queen of the Syndicate, the killer marksman of the toughest gang! Ahhh, don't hit me, please! I'll cooperate! I'll do anything you want!

11240102.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11240102.Text: I told you a long time ago, I'm the strongest. Hey! Listen to me!

11240105.Title: Win Battles
11240105.Text: Hmph. All thanks to invincible me.

11240106.Title: Lose Battles
11240106.Text: Bad luck... it was just bad luck!

11240107.Title: Ultimate Skill
11240107.Text: You... you forced me to do this!

11240109.Title: Greeting
11240109.Text: Huh? Oh, it's Chief. What do you want to play today? Poker? Dice? Mahjong? You don't want to play? Don't be so uptight. Doing nothing is boring!

11240110.Title: Conversation 1
11240110.Text: Chief, want to go to the Syndicate with me? Don't worry, with me there, no one will dare mess with us! Oh, right! Remember to take the Bureau's car.

11240111.Title: Conversation 2
11240111.Text: If someone is looking for me and mentions something about repaying a debt... please cover for me, Chief. I might as well be dead if those loan sharks find me.

11240112.Title: Conversation 3
11240112.Text: Ahhh, Chief, can you give me the comic book from that shelf? Not that one, that one. No, not that one... eh, forget it. You sit. I'll do it myself.

11240113.Title: Special Conversation 1
11240113.Text: A blackout? Yes, I did that! Impressed? I singlehandedly cut the Syndicate's power for a week! Aren't I amazing? Oh please praise me... please...

11240114.Title: Special Conversation 2
11240114.Text: I'm delicate, and I love to chat and gossip. I'm not really good at anything, and I always seem to annoy everyone. You must get a headache from meeting someone like me... haha... thank you...

11240115.Title: Special Conversation 3
11240115.Text: Shush! Be quiet! I'm practicing archery! Oh... someday, I will be able to effortlessly hit the target!

11240116.Title: Full Compliance
11240116.Text: Actually, the name I used before EMP is Emy Pan... oh, it's nothing. It's just that... I'm really happy to meet you, Chief.

11240117.Title: Idle
11240117.Text: Chief! Chief! Chief! Talk to me! Nobody is chatting with me! I'd die! Really! Really! Chief...

11240118.Title: Annoyed
11240118.Text: Ahhhh! You can't be serious, Chief! You'd really do this to someone as grotesque as me? Spare me...

11240119.Title: Special Attention
11240119.Text: Oh Chief, I didn't expect you to remember me! Since you came, have a seat and let's chat! I'm bored to death over here...

11240121.Title: Dispatch
11240121.Text: One of my favorite things to do is saying "no" to arrogant guys... just kidding! I'll go, I'll go.

11240123.Title: Level Up
11240123.Text: Combat power should exceed 5 by now!

11240132.Title: Upgrade Skill
11240132.Text: I told you a long time ago, I'm the strongest. Hey! Listen to me!

112401100.Title: Attire Obtained
112401100.Text: After encountering the Uncrowned Queen in a dark alley, your first instinct is to walk towards me instead of running away. Now that's something you don't see every day! You've earned EMP's admiration. Cough up your name.

112401101.Title: Greeting
112401101.Text: Come on, let's go take a walk around the block. Hey don't worry, no one in Syndicate would dare pick on EMP. By the way, you... walk in front of me.

112401102.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
112401102.Text: That... Minos Bureau of Crisis Control you mentioned, what do they usually do? Ah, it's fine, don't be nervous. As the boss, I just want to know how much mettle my underling's got!

112401103.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
112401103.Text: I've resolved all the disorders around here lately! Now the only thing that interests me is scamming... Um, I mean, training talented people with great potential like you! You should keep learning from me!

112401104.Title: Idle
112401104.Text: You see her? Next time you meet her, remember to call her Big Sis. Even though she's only a few months old, she's also a founding member of the gang! You must show her the respect she deserves.

112401105.Title: Annoyed
112401105.Text: You've only been here for a few days and you've forgotten your place already?

112401106.Title: Special Attention
112401106.Text: I haven't seen that little thug with the water pipe in a while. I took a heavy blow from her last time and I haven't fully recovered... If I see her again, I must repay her properly.

112401107.Title: Level Up
112401107.Text: Where are you going... The West District? Ahem, um... Nothing, I choked on something... But, are... are you sure? That's the Legion's territory.

112401110.Title: Attire Obtained
112401110.Text: Thou hast discovered my secret... Then stay here with me forever! C'mon, quit gawking! This is the time for you to say, "In your dream, Dreadlord! Not even over my dead body!"

112401111.Title: Level Up
112401111.Text: Hehe, see this shining magic tattoo? I am not bald, and I get stronger!

112401112.Title: Greeting
112401112.Text: Hey, you're just in time to see the love of my life. Isn't it a masterpiece? Great storyboard and plot, right? What? The love of my life wasn't this one last time we met? Ummm... Well, I just made the mistake that all manga otaku make!

112401113.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
112401113.Text: Ta-da! Check my babies out! This room of comics is the kingdom I have built for myself! Many are already out-of-print! Thanks to these treasures, I can usurp... ahem, I mean, achieve this lofty status in the comic club!

112401114.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
112401114.Text: If you sincerely want to read it, it's not like I can't lend it to you, but strings attached: first, you can't soil the fold-outs; second, you can't lend it to anyone else; and third, the next time I have to go stand in line to buy some special edition comic books, you will approve my leave permit.

112401115.Title: Idle
112401115.Text: It's the guy posting spoilers again! I have reported so many times but no use! This forum is garbage! Arghhhhh! You left me with no choice but to do this! Just wait and see, your server is gone!

112401116.Title: Annoyed
112401116.Text: "Hands off" is rule No.1 of the adventure code, okay? If you continue to be so harum-scarum, you might trigger the spell sealed in my equipment. Humph, that'll be fun to watch!

112401117.Title: Special Attention
112401117.Text: It's not that I'm stingy, but this is a random special edition that came with the limited color illustration! And I had to buy two other unsalable books to get it. I swore I'd never let it fall into the hands of outsiders!

11240201.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11240201.Text: Eastside Firefighting Ambassador Flora reporting for duty! Wherever I am, not a single spark will appear! Really!

11240202.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11240202.Text: This makes putting out fires a lot easier. You can look forward to my performance, Chief.

11240203.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11240203.Text: If only I had this power before the big fire... but now, I can do more!

11240205.Title: Win Battles
11240205.Text: Preparing to return. Currently at the handover scene.

11240206.Title: Lose Battles
11240206.Text: The fire is out of control.

11240208.Title: Die in Battles
11240208.Text: There are still people who are... who are...

11240209.Title: Greeting
11240209.Text: Good morning, Chief. Remember to check the fire equipment regularly. Safety first!

11240210.Title: Conversation 1
11240210.Text: I don't like to use the firefighter's ax... I always hurt my teammates by accident.

11240211.Title: Conversation 2
11240211.Text: My ex-coworkers always act weird around me. Am I being ostracized?

11240212.Title: Conversation 3
11240212.Text: Give me anything with a hose and I can put out a fire! Hehe... it's just a matter of precision.

11240213.Title: Special Conversation 1
11240213.Text: Sorry, I don't hate people who use flames as weapons, but... forget it. I will definitely keep an eye on them. After all, the best cure is prevention!

11240214.Title: Special Conversation 2
11240214.Text: I once thought I could also help others as a firefighting ambassador, until I saw the burning buildings and heard those wailing for help. It was then that I realized where I truly belonged: in the middle of a firestorm.

11240215.Title: Special Conversation 3
11240215.Text: I prefer long hair over short hair, but it's really inconvenient to have long hair while fighting fires.

11240216.Title: Full Compliance
11240216.Text: Even though there are no fire hazards here, I get to help more people. Thank you, Chief... this was what I wanted.

11240217.Title: Idle
11240217.Text: Uhhh... how high should I aim the hose? One sec! Let me check the manual.

11240218.Title: Annoyed
11240218.Text: Don't distract me! I need to train!

11240219.Title: Special Attention
11240219.Text: It's my job to teach you about fire safety! Please turn to the first page of the fire safety manual!

11240221.Title: Dispatch
11240221.Text: Flora is all prepared and waiting to go.

11240222.Title: Dispatch Complete
11240222.Text: Mission accomplished. Flora has returned to the brigade!

11240225.Title: Join Team
11240225.Text: Gear up and prepare to go!

11240232.Title: Upgrade Skill
11240232.Text: This makes putting out fires a lot easier. You can look forward to my performance, Chief.

11250101.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11250101.Text: If possible, I'd like to stay in the kitchen, preferably in cold storage... ah, sorry! I didn't mean to trouble you. I promise not to do anything weird.

11250102.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11250102.Text: Shiver... was that what it feels like in absolute zero?

11250103.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11250103.Text: From now on, whether in cooking or in battle, I will never doubt myself again!

11250104.Title: Level Start
11250104.Text: There's got to be a better candidate than me... right?

11250105.Title: Win Battles
11250105.Text: We survived...! Thanks to everyone's efforts.

11250109.Title: Greeting
11250109.Text: It's a bit hot today... Chief, I concocted a new flavor of shaved ice. Want to try it? You won't be disappointed.

11250110.Title: Conversation 1
11250110.Text: Chief, you know which vegetable has the worst eyesight?... They all have equally bad eyesight, because vegetables don't have eyes! Haha... ha... I'm sorry I suck at everything...!

11250111.Title: Conversation 2
11250111.Text: I can't taste hot dishes, yet I dream of becoming a chef... sorry, you must think I'm weird.

11250112.Title: Conversation 3
11250112.Text: The DisCity Blue Ribbon Culinary School is the most prestigious cooking school of all time. Every student here will become a celebrity chef one day... everyone except me. I've repeated the same grade for three years already and still haven't been able to graduate...

11250113.Title: Special Conversation 1
11250113.Text: To pass the exams and be accepted by everyone, I turned my back on the recipes that had accompanied me all my life. I learned "normal" recipes and made what I could never taste... later, I obtained my degree, but lost something more precious.

11250114.Title: Special Conversation 2
11250114.Text: I know my recipes aren't the kind that everyone likes... but... low-temperature dishes have their own unique flavors. I really don't want to give up on them!

11250115.Title: Special Conversation 3
11250115.Text: It's scary to be "different from everyone else"... if everyone else thinks something is sweet, you must also think that it's sweet... if everyone else thinks something is sour, you must also think that it's sour... otherwise, you will become the "weirdo"...

11250116.Title: Full Compliance
11250116.Text: Thank you, Chief, for giving me a place to stay. Thank you for letting me cook whatever I want and for chatting with me, even though I make every conversation awkward... from now on, I will accommodate your wishes no matter what they are. I promise!

11250117.Title: Idle
11250117.Text: Looks like I'm no longer needed here. Hmm... can I take a look in the kitchen? Just a peek.

11250119.Title: Special Attention
11250119.Text: Chief? Are you here to supervise me? I'm sorry, I won't use the freezer behind your back... really.

11250121.Title: Dispatch
11250121.Text: Um... can I shop for some ingredients on my way back?

11250122.Title: Dispatch Complete
11250122.Text: I'm sorry, Chief, I think... I have a heatstroke...

11250123.Title: Level Up
11250123.Text: ... hmm? I think I sensed a bit of taste!

11250125.Title: Join Team
11250125.Text: ... are you sure you want to leave this to me?

11250132.Title: Upgrade Skill
11250132.Text: Shiver... was that what it feels like in absolute zero?

112501100.Title: Attire Obtained
112501100.Text: This feels nice... Ah! Ch-Chief! Wh... when did you come? I'm sorry, but can I please stay here for a bit longer...? I'll definitely clean up the fridge later!

112501102.Title: Greeting
112501102.Text: Chief, would you care to join me? It's different from the icehouse of the Blue Ribbon Culinary School. It doesn't give you goosebumps at all! It feels just right.

112501103.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
112501103.Text: If anyone saw me like this, words about me being a "giant weirdo" will surely be spread even further. What? You think it's not bad? Hehehe... That's nice.

112501104.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
112501104.Text: I've got an idea! Before we go out to the pool, why don't we make some snow cones with these fruits? They'll be perfect for relieving summer heat!

112501105.Title: Idle
112501105.Text: One day, the strawberry cone and the chocolate cone swam together in a race. Guess who won? The answer is neither, because they both melted in the sea! Ah... I'm sorry... I must be delirious from the heat to tell this horrible joke... You don't have to force yourself to laugh!

112501106.Title: Annoyed
112501106.Text: Oh! Your hands are so cold, not quite the same as usual! It seems to be even more chilling than liquid nitrogen! Hmm? Is this... the power of the shackles? Amazing!

112501107.Title: Special Attention
112501107.Text: I thought I'd packed the right clothes for summer, but they are still not cool enough. I was this close to becoming one of the water vaporizers...

11250201.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11250201.Text: Hmph. Finally found me. It's fine. As long as the guitar is still here, anywhere will do.

11250202.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11250202.Text: Yes, that's it! Quick, give me a paper and pen! A new tune came to me, I need to jot it down!

11250203.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11250203.Text: I can wow the audience even with a harp.

11250208.Title: Die in Battles
11250208.Text: Can't even... get into... a 27-year-old club... hahaha...

11250209.Title: Greeting
11250209.Text: Good timing. Let me hear your demo.

11250210.Title: Conversation 1
11250210.Text: As long as I'm still alive, those records companies can fuck off. No way in hell would I let them steal Anavrin's songs.

11250211.Title: Conversation 2
11250211.Text: My favorite food? Coffee with milk, and strawberry cake... what did you expect? You thought I could live on alcohol alone?

11250212.Title: Conversation 3
11250212.Text: My dad always used to say that God blessed me with musical talent so I wouldn't take the wrong path... Haha, pity I don't believe in God, nor did I choose the right path.

11250213.Title: Special Conversation 1
11250213.Text: Back then, our lead singer would always holler about burning this city to ashes. Ironically, he became the first of the bunch to burn to ashes.

11250214.Title: Special Conversation 2
11250214.Text: Maybe because it happened so long ago, but I don't hate her so much anymore. As long as she stops plotting against Anavrin, she can do whatever she wants. I won't stop her anymore.

11250215.Title: Special Conversation 3
11250215.Text: When this is all over... If that day comes, I want to keep on performing. Of course, I'll leave you a front row seat. Don't you dare not show up.

11250216.Title: Full Compliance
11250216.Text: In the past few years, all I had was this guitar. Now... I don't want to sound corny, but thank you for being by my side.

11250217.Title: Idle
11250217.Text: But I'm a creep, I'm a weirdo. What the hell am I doing here? I don't belong here.

11250219.Title: Special Attention
11250219.Text: Of course I care about the audience, but don't wag your finger at me and bullshit before the song is even finished. Got it?

11250221.Title: Dispatch
11250221.Text: Perfect! I can meet some old friends on the way.

11250222.Title: Dispatch Complete
11250222.Text: Come as you are, as you were, as I want you to be.

11250225.Title: Join Team
11250225.Text: Bass drummer, get ready! The performance is about to start!

11250232.Title: Upgrade Skill
11250232.Text: Yes, that's it! Quick, give me a paper and pen! A new tune came to me, I need to jot it down!

11260101.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11260101.Text: Hi, I'm Macchiato, client manager at Eastside Bank. Would you like to try our program... ah, you're the Chief here? My apologies. I subconsciously spew these lines whenever I meet someone new. I will definitely cooperate with you.

11260102.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11260102.Text: Is this what you wanted? I see. I will satisfy you.

11260103.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11260103.Text: Get ready for an unprecedented feast for the senses.

11260104.Title: Level Start
11260104.Text: I will give everyone the motivation to keep going.

11260105.Title: Win Battles
11260105.Text: My hand is sore... but I'm very happy.

11260106.Title: Lose Battles
11260106.Text: What do I do, it's over... I'm going to die...

11260107.Title: Ultimate Skill
11260107.Text: Feel the joy with your heart...

11260108.Title: Die in Battles
11260108.Text: I can't die... I still have to...

11260109.Title: Greeting
11260109.Text: Chief, you're back? I put yesterday's work report on your desk already. Would you like something to drink? Coffee, tea or something else? I'll prepare it for you.

11260110.Title: Conversation 1
11260110.Text: Physical pain is short-lived, but mental pleasure brings long-lasting satisfaction—or so they say. Would you like to try it?

11260111.Title: Conversation 2
11260111.Text: Eastside Bank's new wealth management program is superb! It's low-risk, high-return and boasts an annualized return of 12%. I joined it myself. Chief, are you really not going to consider it?

11260112.Title: Conversation 3
11260112.Text: It's good to have a nine-to-five job. This way, I'll have enough time to pursue my "hobbies".

11260113.Title: Special Conversation 1
11260113.Text: When my younger siblings get jobs, I will truly be free. When that day comes, I want to become a truck driver in Sandsea, or a rock drummer in the Syndicate... as long as I can leave Eastside.

11260114.Title: Special Conversation 2
11260114.Text: Life in Eastside is too depressing. Sales quotas, debts, stocks, emotions... Everyone has countless things to worry about. Maybe that's why they need me.

11260115.Title: Special Conversation 3
11260115.Text: This might sound a bit ungrateful, but I dislike the title "Dominatrix"... However, if it's what you desire, Chief, I'm willing to be your personal dominatrix.

11260116.Title: Full Compliance
11260116.Text: In the past, I somewhat resisted this power and identity. But ever since you showed up, I realized that satisfaction truly does exist... perhaps I'm addicted to you, dear Chief.

11260117.Title: Idle
11260117.Text: Welcome to Eastside Bank! Oh, I mean MBCC... sorry, I was dozing off just now.

11260118.Title: Annoyed
11260118.Text: If you're really stressed, I can help you destress.

11260119.Title: Special Attention
11260119.Text: I've never been a secretary before. What do I need to do? Is satisfying all of your needs enough?

11260121.Title: Dispatch
11260121.Text: I will complete this mission for sure.

11260122.Title: Dispatch Complete
11260122.Text: Mission accomplished. Who do I find to write off the expenses?

11260125.Title: Join Team
11260125.Text: It might hurt a little. Is that fine?

11260132.Title: Upgrade Skill
11260132.Text: Is this what you wanted? I see. I will satisfy you.

112601100.Title: Attire Obtained
112601100.Text: Sure, if that's what you need, I'll raise the whip for you again... to satisfy the deepest desire within you.

112601101.Title: Level Up
112601101.Text: How about that? Do you feel light as a feather now?

112601102.Title: Greeting
112601102.Text: Do you want a reward from me too? That's all right, don't be shy... I will accept every side of you.

112601103.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
112601103.Text: Sure you can't go on? Hang in there a little longer. I promise to take you to heaven at just the right moment... Trust me... I know your limits quite well.

112601104.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
112601104.Text: Here, open your mouth. This is your reward for being obedient and cooperative... Let's enjoy it together.

112601105.Title: Idle
112601105.Text: Ah... Very nice, everyone is sated...

112601106.Title: Annoyed
112601106.Text: Are you so eager? Then get into position, and don't move around...

112601107.Title: Special Attention
112601107.Text: If you want it, just nod, and I'll show you... the sweetest reward.

11260201.Title: Obtain the Sinner
11260201.Text: Arresting someone without evidence? What a good dog you are. I must say, this tasteless dump really suits you.

11260202.Title: Raise to Phase 1
11260202.Text: Ugh, don't annoy me with matters unrelated to art.

11260203.Title: Raise to Phase 3
11260203.Text: Who cares about powerful illusions? They can never replace real paintbrushes.

11260204.Title: Level Start
11260204.Text: You need to keep up. I'm not going to wait for you if you fall behind.

11260205.Title: Win Battles
11260205.Text: It is your honor to enjoy my feast for the senses.

11260207.Title: Ultimate Skill
11260207.Text: How tacky! It must be destroyed!

11260209.Title: Greeting
11260209.Text: How are you planning to waste your worthless life today? Actually, there's no need to answer. I'm not interested. It was just a polite greeting on my part.

11260210.Title: Conversation 1
11260210.Text: When I got into that car accident, half the Eastside art world secretly cheered. Those crass imbeciles didn't realize that as a painter, I simply stole some of their business, but as a critic, I could destroy them completely.

11260211.Title: Conversation 2
11260211.Text: What's the difference between those mindless paintings and that useless head on your shoulders?

11260212.Title: Conversation 3
11260212.Text: There is no authoritative standard for artistic expression. It's delusional to think that a few million DisCoins can define the value of a work. These Eastside upstarts are even shallower than you.

11260213.Title: Special Conversation 1
11260213.Text: Can I use your art forum account? I just wrote a review, but when I tried to post it, I discovered that my account had been banned.

11260214.Title: Special Conversation 2
11260214.Text: Don't give up just because I always say you're worthless! You have merits too! For example, you're... um... you're kind!

11260215.Title: Special Conversation 3
11260215.Text: I'm the critic who has made the biggest contribution to improving the art world. How dare they call me a shrew? Fine. I'll be the shrew as long as my words can awaken those incompetent fools.

11260216.Title: Full Compliance
11260216.Text: Upon closer inspection, your face is actually quite attractive.... what a pity, we met too late. No time to paint a portrait of you now.

11260217.Title: Idle
11260217.Text: Sigh! Turned out crooked again... My hand can't even draw a straight line anymore...

11260219.Title: Special Attention
11260219.Text: Unless you've suddenly become enlightened enough to discuss the role of color in the emotional expression of the painting Rebecca, don't bother me. I have several critiques to write, and I have no time to waste with you.

11260221.Title: Dispatch
11260221.Text: Just don't take me anywhere tacky.

11260222.Title: Dispatch Complete
11260222.Text: Have you been waiting here all this time? Seems like the position of Chief is an idle job.

11260223.Title: Level Up
11260223.Text: Thank you... why, is it weird for me to say thank you?

11260225.Title: Join Team
11260225.Text: These hideous things really disgust me. Let's get this over with.

11260232.Title: Upgrade Skill
11260232.Text: Ugh, don't annoy me with matters unrelated to art.

112602100.Title: Attire Obtained
112602100.Text: Surprised to see me? It's nice and quiet here. I won't be disturbed. It's the perfect place for writing my critiques.

112602101.Title: Level Up
112602101.Text: Comment sent. Now, onto the next one...

112602102.Title: Greeting
112602102.Text: If you're not put off by my comments of you from head to toe, there's an empty chair over there for you.

112602103.Title: Ordinary Contact 1
112602103.Text: The cocoon has turned into a butterfly after a winter on the branch. The once-dead hyacinth is now budding again... So many miracles can happen in the greenhouse... What about in life?

112602104.Title: Ordinary Contact 2
112602104.Text: Ha, they call me jealous? Why should I be jealous of those speculators who know nothing other than marketing? All that publicity can't hide the fact that their works are trash.

112602105.Title: Idle
112602105.Text: I can see a hint of creativity here... but the use of colors is too boring... It can be bolder...

112602106.Title: Annoyed
112602106.Text: The plants here are in need of some fertilizer... I see you're quite the material for it, huh?

112602107.Title: Special Attention
112602107.Text: As the Chief, have you got nothing else to do besides staring at me? Go water the plants if you're so bored. The watering can is right there.
